CEILINGLIGHT_CHANDELIER.DESC: Designers are not liable for injuries obtained by swinging from this fixture.
CEILINGLIGHT_CHANDELIER.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Schmancy Chandelier</link>

DININGTABLE_LOG.DESC: The unfinished tabletop is a valuable source of splinters- uh, toothpicks!
DININGTABLE_LOG.NAME: <link=\"DININGTABLE\">Rustic Mess Table</link>

MANUALGENERATOR_ELLIPTICAL.DESC: A low-impact aerobic workout for fitness-fueled colonies!
MANUALGENERATOR_ELLIPTICAL.NAME: <link=\"MANUALGENERATOR\">Elliptical Generator</link>

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_BASIC_ORANGE.DESC: Dyed with gorgeously saturated toxic pigments!
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_BASIC_ORANGE.NAME: Crisp Cadmium Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_BASIC_PURPLE_WILDBERRY.DESC: The shoulders are as purple as a paleontologist's prose.
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_BASIC_PURPLE_WILDBERRY.NAME: Crisp Violet Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_CHAMELEO.DESC: Slow and steady wins the (space) race, right?
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_CHAMELEO.NAME: Dartle Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Understated elegance topped with a solid-gold collar that protects against sharp space objects and surprise tickle attacks.
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_PACULACANTH.DESC: It makes the wearer feel like a very big fish in a small pond.
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_PACULACANTH.NAME: Jawbo Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_RAPTOR.DESC: Each feather was painstakingly secured to the suit fabric by hand.
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_RAPTOR.NAME: Rhex Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_STEGO.DESC: The tail attachment has a tendency to knock things over.
PERMIT_ATMOSUIT_STEGO.NAME: Lumb Atmo Suit

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_80S.DESC: Just big enough to hold a single lip balm whose lid keeps coming off.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_80S.NAME: Fannypack Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_CHAMELEO.DESC: An atmo belt inspired by the most unbothered critter on the planetoid.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_CHAMELEO.NAME: Dartle Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_CIRCUIT.DESC: The belt itself is not bionic, but the Duplicant wearing it probably is.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_CIRCUIT.NAME: Bionic Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: The only acceptable atmo belt for exalted space explorers.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_PACULACANTH.DESC: An atmo belt inspired by an aquatic behemoth.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_PACULACANTH.NAME: Jawbo Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_RAPTOR.DESC: An atmo belt inspired by the mighty apex predator.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_RAPTOR.NAME: Rhex Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_STEGO.DESC: An atmo belt inspired by the blissfully blank herbivore.
PERMIT_ATMO_BELT_STEGO.NAME: Lumb Atmo Belt

PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_80S.DESC: A funky fresh pair of hand coverings.
PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_80S.NAME: Radical Atmo Gloves

PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_BIOCIRCUIT.DESC: Eye-catching accents ensure that the wearer knows where their hands are at all times.
PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_BIOCIRCUIT.NAME: Bionic Atmo Gloves

PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_CHAMELEO.DESC: The added fingertip seams are a sensory nightmare for some.
PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_CHAMELEO.NAME: Dartle Atmo Gloves

PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Thick engineered \"leather\" hand protectors and polished Neutronium cuffs keep little Duplicant fingers safe, no matter what they're tempted to touch.
PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Atmo Gloves

PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_RAPTOR.DESC: Wiggling the fingers makes the feathers rustle.
PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_RAPTOR.NAME: Rhex Atmo Gloves

PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_STEGO.DESC: These gloves are the epitome of \"heavy-handed\".
PERMIT_ATMO_GLOVES_STEGO.NAME: Lumb Atmo Gloves

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_80S.DESC: A choice lid keeps things copacetic out here in the cosmos.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_80S.NAME: Radical Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_BIOCIRCUIT.DESC: Featuring 360-degree panoramic views and cool non-functional neck buttons.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_BIOCIRCUIT.NAME: Bionic Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_CHAMELEO.DESC: Pranksters often spear small items on one of the horns and see how long it takes the wearer to notice.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_CHAMELEO.NAME: Dartle Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_GAUDYSWEATER_PURPLE.DESC: Makes facial features appear farther away.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_GAUDYSWEATER_PURPLE.NAME: Deepset Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: A truly magnificent noggin protector that makes every errand feel like an epic expedition.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_PACULACANTH.DESC: The official helmet of the hangry space explorer.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_PACULACANTH.NAME: Jawbo Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_RAPTOR.DESC: Warning: do not headbutt colleagues while wearing this helmet.
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_RAPTOR.NAME: Rhex Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_STEGO.DESC: Listen, it's not about looking smart. Or being smart. Or...what was the question?
PERMIT_ATMO_HELMET_STEGO.NAME: Lumb Atmo Helmet

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_80S.DESC: Can you do the Running Man in space? With these, maybe.
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_80S.NAME: Radical Atmo Boots

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_BASIC_GREEN.DESC: They leave a trail of moist bootprints for others to follow.
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_BASIC_GREEN.NAME: Swampy Atmo Boots

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_CHAMELEO.DESC: For meandering safely through hostile environments.
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_CHAMELEO.NAME: Dartle Atmo Boots

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Protective footwear that shines with the promise of safety and new adventures.
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Atmo Boots

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_PACULACANTH.DESC: They're always a bit damp. But they work!
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_PACULACANTH.NAME: Jawbo Atmo Boots

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_RAPTOR.DESC: The official protective footwear of the apex predator.
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_RAPTOR.NAME: Rhex Atmo Boots

PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_STEGO.DESC: Weighted boots built to clomp through extreme environments.
PERMIT_ATMO_SHOES_STEGO.NAME: Lumb Atmo Boots

PERMIT_BALLOON_BABYRHEX_EGG.DESC: These balloons are so cute that they often get popped by overenthusiastic critter fans.
PERMIT_BALLOON_BABYRHEX_EGG.NAME: Poppable Lil' Predators

PERMIT_BALLOON_BABYSTEGO_EGG.DESC: A happy little trio of inflatable critters. Now with blep.
PERMIT_BALLOON_BABYSTEGO_EGG.NAME: Bug-Eyed Blep

PERMIT_BED_COTTAGE.DESC: Little scraps of textile waste make a cozy bedcover when they're stapled together by hand.
PERMIT_BED_COTTAGE.NAME: <link=\"BED\">Quilt Cot</link>

PERMIT_BED_JORGE.DESC: One person's junk is another person's bespoke bed.
PERMIT_BED_JORGE.NAME: <link=\"BED\">DIY Cot</link>

PERMIT_BOILER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: An ostentatious immersion heater that gives cool liquids the royal treatment.
PERMIT_BOILER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDHEATER\">Regal Neutronium Liquid Tepidizer</link>

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_CHARCOAL_OBELUS.DESC: The dark color makes it less obvious that these are supposed to be worn underneath clothes.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_CHARCOAL_OBELUS.NAME: Charcoal Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_ELECTRO_SWEETLE.DESC: Electric-blue longjohns with someone's name and password sewn into the tag.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_ELECTRO_SWEETLE.NAME: Electro Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_FLINT_ASH.DESC: Stony gray longjohns with stretchy contrast stitching.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_FLINT_ASH.NAME: Flint Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_GRAPE_ALKALI.DESC: Purple longjohns for the comfy intellectual.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_GRAPE_ALKALI.NAME: Cerebra Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_MUCK_EARWAX.DESC: Cozy brown longjohns infused with moisturizing muck molecules.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_MUCK_EARWAX.NAME: Muck Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_PEAGREEN_GLITCH.DESC: Made with bioengineered pea-pod fabric that features sixteen-way stretch and a mild vegetable scent.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_PEAGREEN_GLITCH.NAME: Greenpeas Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_PETAL_NEONPINK.DESC: Vibrant pink longjohns that fold into their own pocket for convenience.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_PETAL_NEONPINK.NAME: Petal Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_QUANTUM_RADGLO.DESC: In another universe, these are actually considered capri pants.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_QUANTUM_RADGLO.NAME: Quantum Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_RUSTY_GRUBBY.DESC: The vivid hue of these longjohns was achieved using only the finest tetanus-free dyes. Well, mostly.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_RUSTY_GRUBBY.NAME: Rusty Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_SATSUMA_RESIN.DESC: Safety is paramount, especially for anyone who's doing construction work in their skivvies.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_SATSUMA_RESIN.NAME: Hi-Vis Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_SYMBIO_OAKMOLT.DESC: Longjohns that form a symbiotic relationship with their wearer after just two wears.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_SYMBIO_OAKMOLT.NAME: Symbio Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_WORTSEED_CHROMO.DESC: Wort're you wearing? Longjohns as workwear!?
PERMIT_BOTTOM_GOTCH_WORTSEED_CHROMO.NAME: Wortseed Skivvies

PERMIT_BOTTOM_REGAL_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: These tailored uniform pants come in a rich, deep neutronium-inspired hue that pairs well with gold.
PERMIT_BOTTOM_REGAL_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Uniform Pants

PERMIT_CO2SCRUBBER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Swiftly and discreetly pulls carbon dioxide out of the air, like a butler pulling an uninvited guest out of a gala.
PERMIT_CO2SCRUBBER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"CO2SCRUBBER\">Regal Neutronium Carbon Skimmer</link>

PERMIT_COOKINGSTATION_GOURMET_COTTAGE.DESC: It makes quality meal recipes feel more...approachable.
PERMIT_COOKINGSTATION_GOURMET_COTTAGE.NAME: <link=\"GOURMETCOOKINGSTATION\">Rustic Gas Range</link>

PERMIT_CORNER_TILE_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Someone once suggested that ornate corner trim tiles be called \"cornate\" tiles. Thankfully, they were overruled.
PERMIT_CORNER_TILE_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"CORNERMOULDING\">Regal Neutronium Corner Trim</link>

PERMIT_CROWN_MOULDING_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Installing elegant crown moulding is a clever way to distract visitors from unswept tunnel floors.
PERMIT_CROWN_MOULDING_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"CROWNMOULDING\">Regal Neutronium Ceiling Trim</link>

PERMIT_ELECTROLYZER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: The oxygenated air produced by this building smells...superior, somehow.
PERMIT_ELECTROLYZER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"ELECTROLYZER\">Regal Neutronium Electrolyzer</link>

PERMIT_ELEGANTBED_HATCH.DESC: It is extremely unlikely to close while someone is inside.
PERMIT_ELEGANTBED_HATCH.NAME: <link=\"LUXURYBED\">Hatch Bed</link>

PERMIT_ELEGANTBED_PIPSQUEAK.DESC: Perfect for side sleepers and little spoons.
PERMIT_ELEGANTBED_PIPSQUEAK.NAME: <link=\"LUXURYBED\">Pipsqueak Bed</link>

PERMIT_FLOORLAMP_COTTAGE.DESC: It makes Duplicants feel like they're about to be read a bedtime story.
PERMIT_FLOORLAMP_COTTAGE.NAME: <link=\"FLOORLAMP\">Storytime Lamp</link>

PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_JAWBO.DESC: It is safe to say that no critter ever mocked the Jawbo for having four eyes.
PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_JAWBO.NAME: The Dangler

PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_RHEX.DESC: This display model's open jaw makes it an unsuitable shape for after-hours bowling.
PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_RHEX.NAME: Roar O'Saurus

PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_SHELLONOIDIS.DESC: It's unclear whether this sculpture is based on a long-extinct creature, or a very vivid dream.
PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_SHELLONOIDIS.NAME: Uncanny Carapace

PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_STEGO.DESC: Some Duplicants like to crawl into this Lumb sculpture and run a spoon over the ribs like a musical instrument.
PERMIT_FOSSILSCULPTURE_IDLE_STEGO.NAME: Pointy Plates

PERMIT_FRIDGE_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: It's so polished that there's a chance Duplicants might get lost in their own reflection.
PERMIT_FRIDGE_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"REFRIGERATOR\">Regal Neutronium Refrigerator</link>

PERMIT_GASSTORAGE_DARTLE.DESC: The splotchy parts have an unsettlingly leather-like texture.
PERMIT_GASSTORAGE_DARTLE.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Dartle Gas Reservoir</link>

PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_A.DESC: Clean lines, clean energy...as long as the operator doesn't sweat all over the wheel.
PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_A.NAME: <link=\"MANUALGENERATOR\">Sleek Manual Generator</link>

PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_B.DESC: It looks like someone dug this out of an old rocket hangar.
PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_B.NAME: <link=\"MANUALGENERATOR\">Clunky Manual Generator</link>

PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_CYBERPUNK.DESC: Take a spin on the party wheel! It generates raver vibes as well as power.
PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_CYBERPUNK.NAME: <link=\"MANUALGENERATOR\">Retro LED Manual Generator</link>

PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Some folks climb up the corporate ladder, others race on the aristocratic wheel.
PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"MANUALGENERATOR\">Regal Neutronium Manual Generator</link>

PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_ROCK.DESC: It gets off to a rocky start, but it works so well that there's no point reinventing it.
PERMIT_GENERATORMANUAL_ROCK.NAME: <link=\"MANUALGENERATOR\">Rustic Manual Generator</link>

PERMIT_GENERATORPHOS_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: This building's high-gloss finish never loses its shine, no matter how many layers of coal dust it's coated in.
PERMIT_GENERATORPHOS_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"GENERATOR\">Regal Neutronium Coal Generator</link>

PERMIT_GLOVES_BASIC_BLUE_WHEEZEWORT.DESC: A good, solid pair of blue gloves that go with everything.
PERMIT_GLOVES_BASIC_BLUE_WHEEZEWORT.NAME: Basic Wheezy Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_BASIC_BROWN.DESC: A good, solid pair of brown gloves that go with everything.
PERMIT_GLOVES_BASIC_BROWN.NAME: Basic Frass Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_BASIC_GRIME.DESC: A good, solid pair of brown gloves that go with everything.
PERMIT_GLOVES_BASIC_GRIME.NAME: Basic Grime Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_CUFFLESS_SHINY_ALGAE.DESC: For the Duplicant who thinks \"Geiger counter\" is the academic term for counting on one's fingers.
PERMIT_GLOVES_CUFFLESS_SHINY_ALGAE.NAME: Geiger Glovelets

PERMIT_GLOVES_FUTURESPACE_BLUE.DESC: One metallic wrist ruffle is fancy. These gloves have two.
PERMIT_GLOVES_FUTURESPACE_BLUE.NAME: Future Chic Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_CHARCOAL_OBELUS.DESC: Almost-black gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_CHARCOAL_OBELUS.NAME: Striped Charcoal Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_ELECTRO_SWEETLE.DESC: Electric-blue gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_ELECTRO_SWEETLE.NAME: Striped Electro Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_FLINT_ASH.DESC: Stony gray gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_FLINT_ASH.NAME: Striped Flint Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_GRAPE_ALKALI.DESC: Pensive purple gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_GRAPE_ALKALI.NAME: Striped Cerebra Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_MUCK_EARWAX.DESC: Serious brown gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist, for whimsy.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_MUCK_EARWAX.NAME: Striped Muck Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_PEAGREEN_GLITCH.DESC: Lunchroom-green gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_PEAGREEN_GLITCH.NAME: Striped Greenpeas Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_PETAL_NEONPINK.DESC: Bright pink gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_PETAL_NEONPINK.NAME: Striped Petal Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_QUANTUM_RADGLO.DESC: Radioactive-green with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_QUANTUM_RADGLO.NAME: Striped Quantum Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_RUSTY_GRUBBY.DESC: Rust-red gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_RUSTY_GRUBBY.NAME: Striped Rusty Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_SATSUMA_RESIN.DESC: Safety-orange gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_SATSUMA_RESIN.NAME: Striped Hi-Vis Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_SYMBIO_OAKMOLT.DESC: Bright aquamarine with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_SYMBIO_OAKMOLT.NAME: Striped Symbio Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_WORTSEED_CHROMO.DESC: Wheezewort-colored gloves with a sporty stripe at the wrist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_GOTCH_WORTSEED_CHROMO.NAME: Striped Wortseed Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_01.DESC: Slapshots are allowed, slapping is not.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_01.NAME: Slapshot Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_02.DESC: Designed to cause disappointment for opponents.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_02.NAME: Blocker Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_03.DESC: Hold your head high, and your hockey stick higher.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_03.NAME: High-Stick Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_04.DESC: When two scientists disagree, there is only one solution.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_04.NAME: Faceoff Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_05.DESC: Can only be worn by this season's Most Valuable Physicist.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_05.NAME: MVP Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_07.DESC: Marks the wearer as someone who once received three high-fives in a single day.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_07.NAME: Hat-Trick Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_08.DESC: Keeps your hands warm when things take longer than scheduled.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_08.NAME: Overtime Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_09.DESC: High contrast colors for effective gesturing through plexiglass.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_09.NAME: Penalty Box Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_10.DESC: They're not afraid to get a little dirty.
PERMIT_GLOVES_HOCKEY_10.NAME: Enforcer Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Manufacturer's note: These gloves will not transform touched objects into gold or neutronium.
PERMIT_GLOVES_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Golden Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_PUFFER_ORANGE.DESC: A cozy little orange puffer jacket for every finger.
PERMIT_GLOVES_PUFFER_ORANGE.NAME: Cadmium Jelly Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_SNAPJACKET_BRINE.DESC: Some adventurers are a little salty, which is to be expected.
PERMIT_GLOVES_SNAPJACKET_BRINE.NAME: Brine Gloves

PERMIT_GLOVES_VSUIT_STELLAR.DESC: Interstellar flights call for truly stellar gloves.
PERMIT_GLOVES_VSUIT_STELLAR.NAME: Stellar Flight Gloves

PERMIT_HEADQUARTERS_CERES.DESC: A basic model designed with portability and sub-zero temperatures in mind.
PERMIT_HEADQUARTERS_CERES.NAME: <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Frosty Printing Pod</link>

PERMIT_HQBASE_CYBERPUNK.DESC: There's something profoundly hopeful about it.
PERMIT_HQBASE_CYBERPUNK.NAME: <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Retro LED Printing Pod</link>

PERMIT_HQBASE_DINO.DESC: Reclaimed by nature after centuries of neglect. It's a wonder that it still works.
PERMIT_HQBASE_DINO.NAME: <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Forgotten Printing Pod</link>

PERMIT_HQBASE_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: A grandiose machine that makes even the most haphazard colony feel like a distinguished outpost.
PERMIT_HQBASE_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Regal Neutronium Printing Pod</link>

PERMIT_ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_IDLE_BAMMOTH.DESC: It's not a real party until someone tries to feed the sculpture a Frost Bun.
PERMIT_ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_IDLE_BAMMOTH.NAME: What A Hoot

PERMIT_ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_IDLE_WOOD_DE.DESC: Often showcased in pairs, with one on each side of the doorway.
PERMIT_ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_IDLE_WOOD_DE.NAME: Glam Guardian

PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_HATCHSTONE.DESC: A black jet suit with a soft periwinkle sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_HATCHSTONE.NAME: Hatchstone Stealth Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_KELLY.DESC: A black jet suit with a peppy green sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_KELLY.NAME: Algae Stealth Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_RED.DESC: A black jet suit with an impressive red sternum protector. Definitely not a red shirt. Nope, nuh-uh, no way.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_RED.NAME: Garnet Stealth Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_TORPOR.DESC: A black jet suit with a slick gray sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_TORPOR.NAME: Torpor Stealth Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_ULTRA.DESC: A black jet suit with a dramatic blue sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_BLACK_ULTRA.NAME: Ultra Stealth Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: In the event of a formal-attire emergency, the golden starburst belt buckle can double as an avant-garde monocle.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_WHITE_ATOMIC.DESC: A white jet suit with a hazard-orange sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_WHITE_ATOMIC.NAME: Crisp Atomic Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_WHITE_CHARCOAL.DESC: A white jet suit with a fierce dark gray sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_WHITE_CHARCOAL.NAME: Crisp Charcoal Jet Suit

PERMIT_JETSUIT_WHITE_MAGENTA.DESC: A white jet suit with a warm coral-hued sternum protector.
PERMIT_JETSUIT_WHITE_MAGENTA.NAME: Crisp Therma Jet Suit

PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_GLOOM.DESC: Gray technical gloves for jet-setting Duplicants.
PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_GLOOM.NAME: Gloom Jet Gloves

PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: These gloves feature heavy neutronium-inspired cuffs that keep them securely attached no matter how fast the wearer is jettin' around.
PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Jet Gloves

PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_OBELUS.DESC: Medium-gray technical gloves for jet-setting Duplicants.
PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_OBELUS.NAME: Obelus Jet Gloves

PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_ORANGE.DESC: Orange technical gloves for jet-setting Duplicants.
PERMIT_JET_GLOVES_ORANGE.NAME: Cadmium Jet Gloves

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_ATOMIC_GLOOM.DESC: A flashy orange flight helmet for jettin' around the colony like a happy little warning label.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_ATOMIC_GLOOM.NAME: Atomic Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_CHARCOAL_ORANGE.DESC: A sharp black-and-orange flight helmet for jettin' around the colony.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_CHARCOAL_ORANGE.NAME: Hornet Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_HATCHSTONE_OBELUS.DESC: A light blue-purple flight helmet for jettin' around the colony.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_HATCHSTONE_OBELUS.NAME: Hatchstone Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_KELLY_OBELUS.DESC: A chlorophyll-green flight helmet for jettin' around the colony.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_KELLY_OBELUS.NAME: Algae Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_MAGENTA_OBELUS.DESC: A coral-hued flight helmet for jettin' around the colony in vacation mode.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_MAGENTA_OBELUS.NAME: Therma Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_RED_OBELUS.DESC: A serious-as-a-research-grant red flight helmet for jettin' around the colony.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_RED_OBELUS.NAME: Garnet Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_TORPOR_OBELUS.DESC: A pale gray flight helmet for workers who drift in and out of daydreams mid-flight.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_TORPOR_OBELUS.NAME: Torpor Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_ULTRA_OBELUS.DESC: A rich blue flight helmet for jettin' around the colony.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_00_ULTRA_OBELUS.NAME: Ultra Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_HELMET_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: This showstopper of a helmet really makes Duplicants feel like jet-settin' legends.
PERMIT_JET_HELMET_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Jet Helmet

PERMIT_JET_SHOES_BASIC_BLACK.DESC: Stain-resistant footwear for flight suits. They'll look new forever!
PERMIT_JET_SHOES_BASIC_BLACK.NAME: Black Jet Boots

PERMIT_JET_SHOES_BASIC_WHITE.DESC: Microchannels on the boots' exterior reduce drag and increase dirt accumulation.
PERMIT_JET_SHOES_BASIC_WHITE.NAME: White Jet Boots

PERMIT_JET_SHOES_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: A pair of flight boots designed to be as durable as the mysterious substance that clings to space artifacts.
PERMIT_JET_SHOES_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Jet Boots

PERMIT_JUMPSUIT_ROMPER_TAN_FRASS.DESC: Made from densely woven canvas that compromises breathability without providing any real useful protection from the elements.
PERMIT_JUMPSUIT_ROMPER_TAN_FRASS.NAME: Fieldwork Coveralls

PERMIT_JUMPSUIT_VSUIT_STELLAR.DESC: Flatlock seams on the double V accents reduce drag. They also look nice.
PERMIT_JUMPSUIT_VSUIT_STELLAR.NAME: Aerodynamic Flightsuit

PERMIT_LIQUIDCONDITIONER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Duplicants who can say this building's name three times fast are too undignified to use it.
PERMIT_LIQUIDCONDITIONER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDITIONER\">Regal Neutronium Thermo Aquatuner</link>

PERMIT_LOGIC_XOR_LIGHTCOBALT.NAME: <link=\"LOGICGATEXOR\">Cobalt XOR Gate</link>

PERMIT_METALREFINERY_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Some say it's the most refined-looking metal refinery that ever refined metal.
PERMIT_METALREFINERY_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"METALREFINERY\">Regal Neutronium Metal Refinery</link>

PERMIT_MINERALDEOXIDIZER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Enhances breathability by lending an air of affluence to its surroundings.
PERMIT_MINERALDEOXIDIZER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"MINERALDEOXIDIZER\">Regal Neutronium Oxygen Diffuser</link>

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_BLACK_SMOG.DESC: Keeps fingers snuggled up next to each other, as nature intended.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_BLACK_SMOG.NAME: Smog Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_BLUE_AZULENE.DESC: Very useful for dusting off old reference books.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_BLUE_AZULENE.NAME: Azulene Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_GREEN_ENZYME.DESC: A bit fiddly for handling lab equipment.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_GREEN_ENZYME.NAME: Enzyme Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_ORANGE_TECTONIC.DESC: If you rub them on your hair, you get a little zap.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_ORANGE_TECTONIC.NAME: Tectonic Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_PINK_COSMIC.DESC: Easy to find in the snow.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_PINK_COSMIC.NAME: Cosmic Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_PURPLE_ASTRAL.DESC: They should really be attached to each other by a long string.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_PURPLE_ASTRAL.NAME: Astral Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_WHITE.DESC: What they lack in dexterity, they also lack in stain-resistance.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_WHITE.NAME: White Mittens

PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_YELLOWCAKE.DESC: They're great for stroking one's own face.
PERMIT_MITTENS_KNIT_YELLOWCAKE.NAME: Yellowcake Mittens

PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_A_FROSTY.DESC: The plume curls upward to enable cleaners to sweep the floor around it.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_A_FROSTY.NAME: Squash Stand

PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_B_BIONIC.DESC: Some Duplicants climb things just because they're there.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_B_BIONIC.NAME: Mount Microchip

PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_B_FROSTY.DESC: It's radiant, though it emits no actual light.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_B_FROSTY.NAME: Lumen Landing

PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_C_FROSTY.DESC: Looks and smells just like Bammoth \"business.\"
PERMIT_MONUMENT_BASE_C_FROSTY.NAME: Patty Pose

PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_A_BIONIC.DESC: Featuring the fluttery palms of a delighted Bionic Duplicant.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_A_BIONIC.NAME: Tickled Trunk

PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_A_FROSTY.DESC: Carved sherberries are just about as palatable as real ones.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_A_FROSTY.NAME: Berry Bounty Trunk

PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_B_FROSTY.DESC: Never, ever run while holding spigot seals.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_B_FROSTY.NAME: Seal Snuggles

PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_C_BIONIC.DESC: In this universe, ya get what ya take.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_C_BIONIC.NAME: Hogger Trunk

PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_C_FROSTY.DESC: It's trying to get away from something.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_MID_C_FROSTY.NAME: Recoiling

PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_A_BIONIC.DESC: Each individual ringlet is heavy enough to crush a Duplicant.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_A_BIONIC.NAME: Steela Noggin

PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_A_PREHISTORIC.DESC: A monument topper so mighty that even real Rhexes cower before it.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_A_PREHISTORIC.NAME: Rhex Noggin

PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_B_PREHISTORIC.DESC: Ranchers really look up to it.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_B_PREHISTORIC.NAME: Higby Noggin

PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_C_BIONIC.DESC: The smug mug of a winner.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_C_BIONIC.NAME: Ulti Noggin

PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_C_FROSTY.DESC: A giant Resting Ewwww Face topper.
PERMIT_MONUMENT_UPPER_C_FROSTY.NAME: Liam Noggin

PERMIT_PAINTING_ART_CERES_A.DESC: You cannot choose your family, but you can choose your friends.
PERMIT_PAINTING_ART_CERES_A.NAME: Lady With a Bammini

PERMIT_PAINTING_ART_STEGO.DESC: If this Duplicant had their own private fridge, this is the picture that would be displayed on it.
PERMIT_PAINTING_ART_STEGO.NAME: Safari Selfie

PERMIT_PAINTING_TALL_ART_CERES_A.DESC: The tale of this catch grows more unbelievable with each telling.
PERMIT_PAINTING_TALL_ART_CERES_A.NAME: Catch of the Day

PERMIT_PAINTING_WIDE_ART_CERES_A.DESC: The scale implies that this critter and its friend were larger than most.
PERMIT_PAINTING_WIDE_ART_CERES_A.NAME: Babe the Blue Flox

PERMIT_PAINTING_WIDE_ART_RHEX.DESC: The fact that this was just a friendly game was not made clear to everyone involved.
PERMIT_PAINTING_WIDE_ART_RHEX.NAME: Hide and Seek

PERMIT_PANTS_EXTENDEDWAIST_BLUE_WHEEZEWO.DESC: The built-in invisible elastic waistband supports deep belly breathing.
PERMIT_PANTS_EXTENDEDWAIST_BLUE_WHEEZEWO.NAME: High-Waisted Wheezy Pants

PERMIT_PANTS_SUSPENDERS_FRASS.DESC: The suspenders are made from reconstituted wood pulp. They're not stretchy.
PERMIT_PANTS_SUSPENDERS_FRASS.NAME: Arbor Hugger Pants

PERMIT_PANTS_WADER_ALGAE.DESC: Hydrophobic high-waisted pants that also double as protective dinnerwear for messy eaters.
PERMIT_PANTS_WADER_ALGAE.NAME: Fishing Waders

PERMIT_PEDESTAL_ARCADE.DESC: It's playful, though it can't actually be played.
PERMIT_PEDESTAL_ARCADE.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Arcade Pedestal</link>

PERMIT_PEDESTAL_BATTERY.DESC: Items displayed on this pedestal make a really \"power-full\" statement.
PERMIT_PEDESTAL_BATTERY.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Power Bank Pedestal</link>

PERMIT_PEDESTAL_COTTAGE.DESC: A cozy spot to display cherished items.
PERMIT_PEDESTAL_COTTAGE.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Handcrafted Pedestal</link>

PERMIT_PEDESTAL_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: This signet ring-style pedestal makes an opulent home for everything from crown jewels to knickknacks.
PERMIT_PEDESTAL_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Regal Neutronium Pedestal</link>

PERMIT_PEDESTAL_SCREW_BRASS.DESC: A display stand with a warm, brassy industrial aesthetic.
PERMIT_PEDESTAL_SCREW_BRASS.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Brass Pedestal</link>

PERMIT_PEDESTAL_SCREW_CHROME.DESC: A display stand with a cool, steely industrial aesthetic.
PERMIT_PEDESTAL_SCREW_CHROME.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Chrome Pedestal</link>

PERMIT_PJ_BIOCIRCUIT_WILDBERRY.DESC: This plush onesie soothes workers who feel really wired.
PERMIT_PJ_BIOCIRCUIT_WILDBERRY.NAME: Bionic Jammies

PERMIT_PJ_DINO.DESC: Pajamas for the sleepy paleontology buffs in the colony.
PERMIT_PJ_DINO.NAME: Jurassic Jammies

PERMIT_PJ_DINO2.DESC: If all beds were part of a single bed mass, colony life would be one big slumber party.
PERMIT_PJ_DINO2.NAME: Pangaea Jammies

PERMIT_PJ_DINO3.DESC: The label inside reads: \"If at first you can't fall asleep, tri, tri again.\"
PERMIT_PJ_DINO3.NAME: Triassic Jammies

PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_CYBERPUNK.DESC: It's seen things that Duplicants wouldn't believe.
PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_CYBERPUNK.NAME: <link=\"EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS\">Retro LED Mini-Pod</link>

PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_DINO.DESC: Before it was forgotten, it was revered.
PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_DINO.NAME: <link=\"EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS\">Forgotten Mini-Pod</link>

PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_ICE.DESC: It could run for a thousand cycles and still be cool to the touch.
PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_ICE.NAME: <link=\"EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS\">Frosty Mini-Pod</link>

PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: A monument to the highfalutin' hopes and dreams of every spacefarer settling in on a new world.
PERMIT_PORTA_POD_Y_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS\">Regal Neutronium Mini-Pod</link>

PERMIT_RANCHERSTATION_COTTAGE.DESC: Some ranchers believe that a woodsy aesthetic puts critters at ease.
PERMIT_RANCHERSTATION_COTTAGE.NAME: <link=\"RANCHSTATION\">Rustic Grooming Station</link>

PERMIT_RANCHERSTATION_DINO.DESC: These hardy plants survive on the small amounts of drool produced by happy critters during grooming sessions.
PERMIT_RANCHERSTATION_DINO.NAME: <link=\"RANCHSTATION\">Overgrown Grooming Station</link>

PERMIT_RANCHERSTATION_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Mirror, mirror, on the wall...who's the best-groomed of them all?
PERMIT_RANCHERSTATION_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"RANCHSTATION\">Regal Neutronium Grooming Station</link>

PERMIT_RESEARCH_CENTER_CYBERPUNK.DESC: Doin' research for the future, while diggin' the vibes of the past.
PERMIT_RESEARCH_CENTER_CYBERPUNK.NAME: <link=\"RESEARCHCENTER\">Retro LED Research Station</link>

PERMIT_RESPECCER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Duplicants come out feeling very, very fancy, and knowing very, very little.
PERMIT_RESPECCER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"RESETSKILLSSTATION\">Regal Neutronium Skill Scrubber</link>

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_GUL.DESC: The mighty Pacu refuses to explain its philosophy. It simply embodies it.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_GUL.NAME: Stoic Trophy

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_PAC.DESC: Duplicants like to prank their friends by sticking their hands inside and pretending the sculpture has come to life.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_PAC.NAME: Chompionship Trophy

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_PUF.DESC: The face of truly blissful ignorance.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_PUF.NAME: Blank Slate

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_WOO.DESC: The sculptor used a tiny fleck of glass to mimic the mischievous glint of a Flox's eye.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_ACTION_WOO.NAME: Sly Stare

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_CUDDL.DESC: Hindsight may be 20/20, but hind art is priceless.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_CUDDL.NAME: Pip Rump

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_DRECK.DESC: The post-shearing version was considered too risque.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_DRECK.NAME: Drecko Rump

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_PUFT.DESC: Occasionally emits a barely audible toot.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_PUFT.NAME: Puft Rump

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_SHOVE.DESC: Behind every great critter, is that critter's great behind.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_AMAZING_REAR_SHOVE.NAME: Vole Rump

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_CRAP_LOW_ONE.DESC: Was this piece carved by an artist, or gnawed on by a critter? No one knows.
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_CRAP_LOW_ONE.NAME: Chipped Trunk

PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_OKAY_MID_ONE.DESC: A realistic rendition of Sleet Wheat, also known as \"a mouth full of splinters just waiting to happen.\"
PERMIT_SCULPTURE_WOOD_OKAY_MID_ONE.NAME: Wood Grain

PERMIT_SHOES_BASIC_BLUE_WHEEZY.DESC: A fresh pair of Wheezewort-blue shoes that go with everything.
PERMIT_SHOES_BASIC_BLUE_WHEEZY.NAME: Basic Wheezy Shoes

PERMIT_SHOES_BASIC_FRASS.DESC: A fresh pair of brown shoes that go with everything.
PERMIT_SHOES_BASIC_FRASS.NAME: Basic Frass Shoes

PERMIT_SHOES_FUTURESPACE_BLUE.DESC: If they're not stylish yet, they will be someday.
PERMIT_SHOES_FUTURESPACE_BLUE.NAME: Future Chic Booties

PERMIT_SHOES_REGAL_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Classic black work shoes with a lavish gold ankle band.
PERMIT_SHOES_REGAL_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Shoes

PERMIT_SHOES_ROMPER_FRASS_TAN.DESC: Sustainable \"leather\" foot covers made from processed frass.
PERMIT_SHOES_ROMPER_FRASS_TAN.NAME: Frass Leather Shoes

PERMIT_SHORTS_SCOUT_BROWN.DESC: The leather belt doubles as a grab-handle to yank fellow explorers out of harm's way.
PERMIT_SHORTS_SCOUT_BROWN.NAME: Scout Shorts

PERMIT_SMARTSTORAGELOCKER_GRAVITAS.DESC: Someone gave this smart storage bin a makeover.
PERMIT_SMARTSTORAGELOCKER_GRAVITAS.NAME: <link=\"STORAGELOCKERSMART\">Smart-Looking Smart Storage</link>

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_CHARCOAL_OBELUS.DESC: Almost-black crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_CHARCOAL_OBELUS.NAME: Striped Charcoal Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_ELECTRO_SWEETLE.DESC: Electric-blue crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_ELECTRO_SWEETLE.NAME: Striped Electro Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_FLINT_ASH.DESC: Stony gray crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_FLINT_ASH.NAME: Striped Flint Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_GRAPE_ALKALI.DESC: Pensive purple crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_GRAPE_ALKALI.NAME: Striped Cerebra Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_MUCK_EARWAX.DESC: Serious brown crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_MUCK_EARWAX.NAME: Striped Muck Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_PEAGREEN_GLITCH.DESC: Lunchroom-green crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_PEAGREEN_GLITCH.NAME: Striped Greenpeas Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_PETAL_NEONPINK.DESC: Neon pink crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_PETAL_NEONPINK.NAME: Striped Petal Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_QUANTUM_RADGLO.DESC: Radioactive-green crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_QUANTUM_RADGLO.NAME: Striped Quantum Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_RUSTY_GRUBBY.DESC: Rust-red crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_RUSTY_GRUBBY.NAME: Striped Rusty Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_SATSUMA_RESIN.DESC: Safety-orange crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_SATSUMA_RESIN.NAME: Striped Hi-Vis Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_SYMBIO_OAKMOLT.DESC: Bright aquamarine crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_SYMBIO_OAKMOLT.NAME: Striped Symbio Socks

PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_WORTSEED_CHROMO.DESC: Wheezewort-colored crew socks with a helpful stripe to indicate which end the foot goes into.
PERMIT_SOCKS_GOTCH_WORTSEED_CHROMO.NAME: Striped Wortseed Socks

PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_BOTTOM.DESC: If someone can tell the difference between these and actual black pants, they're standing too close.
PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_BOTTOM.NAME: Almost-Black Pants

PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_GLOVES.DESC: Standard uniform gloves for Bionic Duplicants. They do not grant the wearer any special abilities.
PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_GLOVES.NAME: Bionic Gloves

PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_OUTFIT.DESC: The uniform issued to all Bionic Duplicants on their first day in the colony.
PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_OUTFIT.NAME: Standard Bionic Uniform

PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_SHOES.DESC: Standard uniform shoes for Bionic Duplicants.
PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_SHOES.NAME: Bionic Shoes

PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_TOP.DESC: A standard-issue uniform shirt for non-standard Duplicants.
PERMIT_STANDARD_BIONIC_TOP.NAME: Bionic Uniform Shirt

PERMIT_STEAMTURBINE2_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: It exudes power, literally and figuratively.
PERMIT_STEAMTURBINE2_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"STEAMTURBINE2\">Regal Neutronium Steam Turbine</link>

PERMIT_STORAGELOCKER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: When the outside is this extravagant, who cares what's inside?
PERMIT_STORAGELOCKER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"STORAGELOCKER\">Regal Neutronium Storage Bin</link>

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_BLACK.DESC: It's always hard to tell whether the buttons are lined up properly.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_BLACK.NAME: Monochrome Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_BLUE_MIDDLE.DESC: Durable but soft, for workers who need a little extra TLC.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_BLUE_MIDDLE.NAME: Scrub Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_GREEN.DESC: Stays warm and soft, even when damp.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_GREEN.NAME: Swampy Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_PINK_ORCHID.DESC: Neither of these chest pockets are functional.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_PINK_ORCHID.NAME: Flare Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_PURPLE.DESC: Perfectly aligned alternating squares imply a certain work ethic.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_PURPLE.NAME: Fusion Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_WHITE.DESC: For Duplicants at the forefront of flannel formalwear.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_WHITE.NAME: White Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_YELLOW.DESC: Bright minds gravitate toward bright colors.
PERMIT_TOP_FLANNEL_YELLOW.NAME: Flax Flannel Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_ASH_CHARCOAL.DESC: How many cycles has it been since someone last washed this undershirt? It's impossible to tell.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_ASH_CHARCOAL.NAME: Ash Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_BASIN_WORTSEED.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt with extra padding in the underarms to prevent unsightly stains.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_BASIN_WORTSEED.NAME: Basin Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_CANKER_SATSUMA.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt that smells vaguely acidic. No one's sure whether it's citrus or sweat.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_CANKER_SATSUMA.NAME: Canker Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_DUSKY_GRAPE.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt in a twilight shade of purple, for colonists who haven't seen the sun in a very long time.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_DUSKY_GRAPE.NAME: Dusk Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_ENNUI_FLINT.DESC: It's a relatively functional sweat-wicking undershirt, or whatever.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_ENNUI_FLINT.NAME: Ennui Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_FLATUS_MUCK.DESC: An unremarkable beige undershirt that enables the wearer to avoid attention when they're passing gas at parties.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_FLATUS_MUCK.NAME: Flatus Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_GLUON_PETAL.DESC: A soft pink undershirt for pastel-loving particle physicists.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_GLUON_PETAL.NAME: Gluon Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_MUSH_PEAGREEN.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt that effectively hides mush bar stains.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_MUSH_PEAGREEN.NAME: Mush Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_NUKED_QUANTUM.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt the color of microwaved slime!
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_NUKED_QUANTUM.NAME: Nuked Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_PUCE_RUSTY.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt the color of sliced Pacu fillet, without the fishy aroma.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_PUCE_RUSTY.NAME: Puce Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_RIVET_ELECTRO.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt in a really riveting shade of blue.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_RIVET_ELECTRO.NAME: Rivet Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_VITRO_SYMBIO.DESC: A sweat-wicking undershirt in a striking glassy-blue hue.
PERMIT_TOP_GOTCH_VITRO_SYMBIO.NAME: Vitro Base Layer

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_01.DESC: Not to be confused with a \"Snapshot\" jersey, which is made out of old photographs.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_01.NAME: Slapshot Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_02.DESC: Oh, was I in your way? Good.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_02.NAME: Blocker Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_03.DESC: Subtle padding in the neck and chest protects from retaliation.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_03.NAME: High-Stick Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_04.DESC: It makes other colony members see red.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_04.NAME: Faceoff Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_05.DESC: Often worn with the matching gloves to make sure everyone knows.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_05.NAME: MVP Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_07.DESC: Three hypotheses in one paper? Wow!
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_07.NAME: Hat-Trick Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_08.DESC: It's comfy enough to sleep in.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_08.NAME: Overtime Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_09.DESC: There's a troublemaker on every research team.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_09.NAME: Penalty Box Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_10.DESC: It's time to lay down the law. Newton's Law.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_10.NAME: Enforcer Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_11.DESC: You win some, you learn some.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_11.NAME: Hoser Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_12.DESC: Grants the wearer enthusiasm and beginner's luck.
PERMIT_TOP_JERSEY_12.NAME: Rookie Jersey

PERMIT_TOP_METAL_GREY.DESC: Can also be used as a posture corrector.
PERMIT_TOP_METAL_GREY.NAME: All-Metal Jacket

PERMIT_TOP_REGAL_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: The unofficial dress uniform of the super-regal, with a solid gold belt and collar. It's not comfortable, but wow, does it ever look good.
PERMIT_TOP_REGAL_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: Regal Neutronium Uniform Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_SCOUT_WHITE.DESC: A well-tied neckerchief prevents tiny critters from wandering down the back of one's neck.
PERMIT_TOP_SCOUT_WHITE.NAME: Explorer Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_SPACETOP_WHITE.DESC: Swag from a convention that no one remembers attending.
PERMIT_TOP_SPACETOP_WHITE.NAME: Space Expo Shirt

PERMIT_TOP_SWEATER_RIBBED_RUST.DESC: The ribbed knit gets snagged on the tree trunk every single time.
PERMIT_TOP_SWEATER_RIBBED_RUST.NAME: Arbor Hugger Sweater

PERMIT_TOP_SWEATER_WADER_LTBLUE.DESC: It doesn't retain heat, but it shows fish that they're dealing with a pro.
PERMIT_TOP_SWEATER_WADER_LTBLUE.NAME: Woolly Fishing Sweater

PERMIT_TOP_VEST_PUFFER_ORANGE.DESC: Keeps the core warm, lets the pits breathe.
PERMIT_TOP_VEST_PUFFER_ORANGE.NAME: Cadmium Vest

PERMIT_UTILITIES_ELECTRIC_CONDUCT_DIAMON.DESC: Color-coded wires make it easy to see which ones to cut...or not cut.
PERMIT_UTILITIES_ELECTRIC_CONDUCT_DIAMON.NAME: <link=\"WIREREFINEDHIGHWATTAGE\">Bubblegum Conductive Wire</link>

PERMIT_UTILITIES_ELECTRIC_CONDUCT_NET_PI.DESC: Color-coded wires make it easy to see which ones to cut...or not cut.
PERMIT_UTILITIES_ELECTRIC_CONDUCT_NET_PI.NAME: <link=\"WIREREFINEDHIGHWATTAGE\">Gamma Conductive Wire</link>

PERMIT_UTILITIES_ELECTRIC_CONDUCT_SCALE_.DESC: Color-coded wires make it easy to see which ones to cut...or not cut.
PERMIT_UTILITIES_ELECTRIC_CONDUCT_SCALE_.NAME: <link=\"WIREREFINEDHIGHWATTAGE\">Leach Conductive Wire</link>

PERMIT_UTILITYELECTRICBRIDGECONDUCTIVE_D.DESC: Color-coded wire bridges make it easy to see how things are connected.
PERMIT_UTILITYELECTRICBRIDGECONDUCTIVE_D.NAME: Bubblegum Conductive Wire Bridge

PERMIT_UTILITYELECTRICBRIDGECONDUCTIVE_N.DESC: Color-coded wire bridges make it easy to see how things are connected.
PERMIT_UTILITYELECTRICBRIDGECONDUCTIVE_N.NAME: Gamma Conductive Wire Bridge

PERMIT_UTILITYELECTRICBRIDGECONDUCTIVE_S.DESC: Color-coded wire bridges make it easy to see how things are connected.
PERMIT_UTILITYELECTRICBRIDGECONDUCTIVE_S.NAME: Leach Conductive Wire Bridge

PERMIT_WALLS_ARCADE.DESC: For those who miss the carpet-burned elbows of their home planet.
PERMIT_WALLS_ARCADE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Arcade</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_CHAMELEO.DESC: The only known image of an adult Dartle with both eyes wide open. So awake!
PERMIT_WALLS_CHAMELEO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Pixel Dartle</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_CIRCUIT_BOGEY.DESC: Physicists say it changed color the moment it was observed.
PERMIT_WALLS_CIRCUIT_BOGEY.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Quantum Circuit</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_CIRCUIT_LIGHTCOBALT.DESC: It really makes power plants feel like h-Ohm.
PERMIT_WALLS_CIRCUIT_LIGHTCOBALT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Mech Circuit</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_CIRCUIT_PUNK.DESC: Named for the designer's favorite bacteria-munching virus.
PERMIT_WALLS_CIRCUIT_PUNK.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Phage Circuit</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_CHAMELEO.DESC: Viewers remark upon this carving's age, but the real wonder is that its top-heavy subject matter didn't fall on its face more often.
PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_CHAMELEO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Dartle Carving</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_PACULACANTH.DESC: A visual retelling of the terrifying creature that once ate an entire fish farm population without even calling dibs.
PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_PACULACANTH.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Jawbo Carving</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_RAPTOR.DESC: The omission of a prey animal in the creature's jaws is an intentional dig at its famously subpar hunting skills.
PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_RAPTOR.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Rhex Carving</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_STEGO.DESC: This carving was originally found at the site of one of the most renowned farms on the planetoid.
PERMIT_WALLS_FOSSIL_STEGO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Lumb Carving</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_IGLOO.DESC: Snow tile style that won't melt!
PERMIT_WALLS_IGLOO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Ice Panel</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_PACULACANTH.DESC: It's just so dang cute without its rows and rows of jagged teeth.
PERMIT_WALLS_PACULACANTH.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Pixel Jawbo</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_RAPTOR.DESC: Never before has this huge predator looked so much like an escapee from a petting zoo.
PERMIT_WALLS_RAPTOR.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Pixel Rhex</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_SILHOUETTE_PREHISTORICCRITT.DESC: A subtle nod to all prehistoric critters great and small.
PERMIT_WALLS_SILHOUETTE_PREHISTORICCRITT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Shadowy Figures</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_SOUTHWEST.DESC: Southwest of what, Duplicants aren't sure. But they like it.
PERMIT_WALLS_SOUTHWEST.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Southwest</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_STEGO.DESC: Instead of having blank walls, consider blank-stare walls!
PERMIT_WALLS_STEGO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Pixel Lumb</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_STRIPES_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: This sumptuously tufted wall panel transforms basic colony spaces into palatial throne rooms.
PERMIT_WALLS_STRIPES_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Regal Neutronium Tuft</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_CHARCOAL_WHITE.DESC: A dark-gray wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_CHARCOAL_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Charcoal Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_CHILLI_WHITE.DESC: A chili-red wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_CHILLI_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Chili Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_COBALT_WHITE.DESC: A strong blue wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_COBALT_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Cobalt Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_FLAMINGO_WHITE.DESC: A vivid pink wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_FLAMINGO_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Petal Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_KELLY_WHITE.DESC: An algae-green wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_KELLY_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Algae Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_LEMON_WHITE.DESC: A bright yellow wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_LEMON_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Brightslug Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_SATSUMA_WHITE.DESC: A safety-orange wallpaper with one crisp white corner cut out, for modular styling.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_SATSUMA_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Hi-Vis Corner</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_CHARCOAL.DESC: This wallpaper features a dark-gray triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_CHARCOAL.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Charcoal Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_CHILLI.DESC: This wallpaper features a chili-red triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_CHILLI.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Chili Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_COBALT.DESC: This wallpaper features a cobalt-blue triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_COBALT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Cobalt Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_FLAMINGO.DESC: This wallpaper features a vivid pink triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_FLAMINGO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Petal Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_KELLY.DESC: This wallpaper features an algae-green triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_KELLY.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Algae Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_LEMON.DESC: This wallpaper features a bright yellow triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_LEMON.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Brightslug Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_SATSUMA.DESC: This wallpaper features a safety-orange triangle pointing into a vast expanse of nothingness.
PERMIT_WALLS_TRIANGLE_WHITE_SATSUMA.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Hi-Vis Point</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_WOOD_PANEL.DESC: Even labs can be dressed up as log cabins!
PERMIT_WALLS_WOOD_PANEL.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Wood Panel</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_CHARCOAL_WHITE.DESC: The dark-gray triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_CHARCOAL_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Charcoal X</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_CHILLI_WHITE.DESC: The chili-red triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_CHILLI_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Chili X</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_COBALT_WHITE.DESC: The cobalt-blue triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_COBALT_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Cobalt X</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_FLAMINGO_WHITE.DESC: The petal-pink triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_FLAMINGO_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Petal X</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_KELLY_WHITE.DESC: The algae-green triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_KELLY_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Algae X</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_LEMON_WHITE.DESC: The bright yellow triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_LEMON_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Brightslug X</link>

PERMIT_WALLS_X_SATSUMA_WHITE.DESC: The safety-orange triangles on this wallpaper look like an X marking the spot...or an hourglass marking the passage of time.
PERMIT_WALLS_X_SATSUMA_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Hi-Vis X</link>

PERMIT_WATERPUMP_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: Some Duplicants dream of stealing the wrought gold pump handle to use as a fancy walking cane.
PERMIT_WATERPUMP_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION\">Regal Neutronium Water Pump</link>

PERMIT_WATERPURIFIER_NEUTRONIUM.DESC: The clean water produced by this gilded filtration system has an unmistakably rich flavor.
PERMIT_WATERPURIFIER_NEUTRONIUM.NAME: <link=\"WATERPURIFIER\">Regal Neutronium Water Sieve</link>

UNDERCONSTRUCTIONNOWORKER.TOOLTIP: Building will be constructed once a Duplicant is available

UNDERPRESSURE.NAME: Low Air Pressure
UNDERPRESSURE.TOOLTIP: A minimum atmospheric pressure of {TargetPressure} is needed for this building to operate

UNUSABLEGUNKED.NAME: Out of Order: Gunk
UNUSABLEGUNKED.TOOLTIP: Someone dumped <link=\"LIQUIDGUNK\">Gunk</link> here instead of in a <link=\"GUNKEMPTIER\">Gunk Extractor</link>\n\nThis amenity requires maintenance

VALVE.NAME: Max Flow Rate: {MaxFlow}
VALVE.TOOLTIP: This valve is allowing flow at a volume of {MaxFlow}

VALVEREQUEST.NAME: Requested Flow Rate: {QueuedMaxFlow}
VALVEREQUEST.TOOLTIP: Waiting for a Duplicant to adjust flow rate

WAITINGFORMATERIALS.TOOLTIP: These materials will be delivered once a Duplicant is available

WAITINGFORRADIATION.NAME: Awaiting Radbolts
WAITINGFORRADIATION.TOOLTIP: This building requires Radbolts to function\n\nOpen the Radiation Overlay {Hotkey/Overlay15} to view this building's radiation port

WAITINGFORREPAIRMATERIALS.NAME: Awaiting Repair Delivery\n{ItemsRemaining}\n
WAITINGFORREPAIRMATERIALS.TOOLTIP: These materials must be delivered before this building can be repaired

WAITINGTOLAND.NAME: Waiting to land on {Destination}
WAITINGTOLAND.TOOLTIP: This rocket is waiting for an available Rcoket Platform on {Destination}

WARPCONDUITPARTNERDISABLED.NAME: Teleporter Disabled ({x}/2)
WARPCONDUITPARTNERDISABLED.TOOLTIP: This teleporter cannot be used until both the transmitting and receiving sides have been activated

WARPPORTALCHARGING.NAME: Recharging: {charge}
WARPPORTALCHARGING.TOOLTIP: This teleporter will be ready for use in {cycles} cycles

WATTSON.NAME: Next Print: {TimeRemaining}
WATTSON.TOOLTIP: The Printing Pod can print out new Duplicants and useful resources over time.\nThe next print will be ready in {TimeRemaining}

WATTSONGAMEOVER.NAME: Colony Lost
WATTSONGAMEOVER.TOOLTIP: All Duplicants are dead or incapacitated

WELL_OVERPRESSURE.NAME: Overpressure
WELL_OVERPRESSURE.TOOLTIP: This well can no longer function due to excessive backpressure

WELL_PRESSURIZING.NAME: Backpressure: {0}
WELL_PRESSURIZING.TOOLTIP: Well pressure increases with each use and must be periodically relieved to prevent shutdown

WINDTUNNELINTAKE.NAME: Intake Requires Gas
WINDTUNNELINTAKE.TOOLTIP: A wind tunnel requires <style=\"KKeyword\">Gas</style> at the top and bottom intakes in order to operate\n\nThe intakes for this wind tunnel don't have enough gas to operate

WIRECIRCUITSTATUS.NAME: Current Load: {CurrentLoadAndColor} / {MaxLoad}
WIRECIRCUITSTATUS.TOOLTIP: The current <style=\"KKeyword\">Power</style> load on this wire\n\nOverloading a wire will cause damage to the wire over time and cause it to break

WIRECONNECTED.NAME: Wire Connected
WIRECONNECTED.TOOLTIP: This wire is connected to a network

WIREDISCONNECTED.NAME: Wire Disconnected
WIREDISCONNECTED.TOOLTIP: This wire is not connecting a <style=\"KKeyword\">Power</style> consumer to a <style=\"KKeyword\">Power</style> generator

WIREMAXWATTAGESTATUS.NAME: Potential Load: {TotalPotentialLoadAndColor} / {MaxLoad}
WIREMAXWATTAGESTATUS.TOOLTIP: How much wattage this network will draw if all <style=\"KKeyword\">Power</style> consumers on the network become active at once

WIRENOMINAL.NAME: Wire Nominal
WIRENOMINAL.TOOLTIP: This wire is able to handle the wattage it is receiving

WORKING.NAME: Normal
WORKING.TOOLTIP: This building is working as intended

WORKREQUIRESMINION.NAME: Duplicant Operation Required
WORKREQUIRESMINION.TOOLTIP: A Duplicant must be present to complete this operation

DISABLE_AUTODISINFECT.NAME: Disable Disinfect
DISABLE_AUTODISINFECT.TOOLTIP: Do not automatically disinfect this building

ENABLE_AUTODISINFECT.NAME: Enable Disinfect
ENABLE_AUTODISINFECT.TOOLTIP: Automatically disinfect this building when it becomes contaminated

DISABLE_AUTOMATIONONLY.NAME: Enable Manual
DISABLE_AUTOMATIONONLY.TOOLTIP: This building's storage may be accessed by both Duplicants and Auto-Sweeper buildings

ENABLE_AUTOMATIONONLY.NAME: Disable Manual
ENABLE_AUTOMATIONONLY.TOOLTIP: This building's storage may be accessed by Auto-Sweepers only\n\nDuplicants will not be permitted to add or remove materials from this building

ADVANCEDAPOTHECARY.DESC: Some medications help prevent diseases, while others aim to alleviate existing illness.
ADVANCEDAPOTHECARY.EFFECT:
Produces <link="MEDICINE">Medicine</link> to cure most basic <link="DISEASE">Diseases</link>.

Duplicants must possess the Medicine Compounding <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to fabricate medicines.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
ADVANCEDAPOTHECARY.NAME: <link=\"ADVANCEDAPOTHECARY\">Nuclear Apothecary</link>

ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE.COLONY_HAS_BOOSTER_ASSIGNED_COUNT: My colony has {0} Bionic Duplicant(s) with this booster assigned
ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE.COLONY_HAS_BOOSTER_ASSIGNED_NONE: My colony has no Bionic Duplicants with this booster assigned
ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE.DESC: Soldering stations allow Duplicants to build helpful Flydo retriever bots.
ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE.EFFECT: Produces advanced electronics and bionic <link=\"BIONICUPGRADE\">Boosters</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE.NAME: <link=\"ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE\">Soldering Station</link>

ADVANCEDDOCTORSTATION.DESC: Disease clinics require power, but treat more serious illnesses than sick bays alone.
ADVANCEDDOCTORSTATION.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to administer powerful treatments to sick Duplicants.\n\nDuplicants must possess the Advanced Medical Care <link=\"ROLES\">Skill</link> to treat peers.
ADVANCEDDOCTORSTATION.NAME: <link=\"ADVANCEDDOCTORSTATION\">Disease Clinic</link>

ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER.DESC: Super computers unlock higher technology tiers than research stations alone.
ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER.EFFECT:
Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Advanced Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes <link="WATER">Water</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RESEARCHING1">Advanced Research</link> skill.
ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER.NAME: <link=\"ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER\">Super Computer</link>

AIRBORNECREATURELURE.DESC: Lures can relocate Pufts or Shine Bugs to specific locations in my colony.
AIRBORNECREATURELURE.EFFECT: Attracts one type of airborne critter at a time.\n\nMust be baited with <link=\"SLIMEMOLD\">Slime</link> or <link=\"PHOSPHORITE\">Phosphorite</link>.
AIRBORNECREATURELURE.NAME: <link=\"AIRBORNECREATURELURE\">Airborne Critter Lure</link>

AIRBORNECRITTERCONDO.DESC: Triggers natural nesting instincts and improves critters' moods.
AIRBORNECRITTERCONDO.EFFECT: A hanging respite area for adult <link=\"PUFT\">Pufts</link>, <link=\"MOOSPECIES\">Gassy Moos</link> and <link=\"LIGHTBUG\">Shine Bugs</link>.
AIRBORNECRITTERCONDO.NAME: <link=\"AIRBORNECRITTERCONDO\">Airborne Critter Condo</link>

AIRCONDITIONER.DESC: A thermo regulator doesn't remove heat, but relocates it to a new area.
AIRCONDITIONER.EFFECT: Cools the <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> piped through it, but outputs <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link> in its immediate vicinity.
AIRCONDITIONER.NAME: <link=\"AIRCONDITIONER\">Thermo Regulator</link>

AIRFILTER.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"SAND\">Sand</link> to filter <link=\"CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN\">Polluted Oxygen</link> from the air, reducing <link=\"DISEASE\">Disease</link> spread.
AIRFILTER.NAME: <link=\"AIRFILTER\">Deodorizer</link>

ALGAEDISTILLERY.DESC: Algae distillers convert disease-causing slime into algae for oxygen production.
ALGAEDISTILLERY.NAME: <link=\"ALGAEDISTILLERY\">Algae Distiller</link>

ALGAEHABITAT.DESC: Algae colony, Duplicant colony... we're more alike than we are different.
ALGAEHABITAT.EFFECT: Consumes <link=\"ALGAE\">Algae</link> to produce <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> and remove some <link=\"CARBONDIOXIDE\">Carbon Dioxide</link>.\n\nGains a 10% efficiency boost in direct <link=\"LIGHT\">Light</link>.
ALGAEHABITAT.NAME: <link=\"ALGAEHABITAT\">Algae Terrarium</link>

APOTHECARY.DESC: Some medications help prevent diseases, while others aim to alleviate existing illness.
APOTHECARY.EFFECT:
Produces <link="MEDICINE">Medicine</link> to cure most basic <link="DISEASE">Diseases</link>.

Duplicants must possess the Medicine Compounding <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to fabricate medicines.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
APOTHECARY.NAME: <link=\"APOTHECARY\">Apothecary</link>

ARCADEMACHINE.DESC: Komet Kablam-O!\nFor up to two players.
ARCADEMACHINE.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to play video games on their breaks.\n\nIncreases Duplicant <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.
ARCADEMACHINE.NAME: <link=\"ARCADEMACHINE\">Arcade Cabinet</link>

ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION.DESC: Discover the mysteries of the past.
ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION.EFFECT: Analyses and extracts <link=\"UNOBTANIUM\">Neutronium</link> from artifacts of interest.
ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION.NAME: <link=\"ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION\">Artifact Analysis Station</link>
ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION.PAYLOAD_DROP_RATE_TOOLTIP: This artifact has a {chance} to drop a Vacillator Recharge when analyzed at the <link=\"ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION\">Artifact Analysis Station</link>

ARTIFACTCARGOBAY.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store any artifacts they uncover during space missions.

Artifacts become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
ARTIFACTCARGOBAY.NAME: <link=\"ARTIFACTCARGOBAY\">Artifact Transport Module</link>

ASTRONAUTTRAININGCENTER.DESC: Duplicants must complete astronaut training in order to pilot space rockets.
ASTRONAUTTRAININGCENTER.EFFECT: Trains Duplicants to become <link=\"ROCKETPILOTING1\">Astronaut</link>.\n\nDuplicants must possess the <link=\"ROCKETPILOTING1\">Astronaut</link> trait to receive training.
ASTRONAUTTRAININGCENTER.NAME: <link=\"ASTRONAUTTRAININGCENTER\">Space Cadet Centrifuge</link>

AUTOMINER.DESC: A robo-miner's range can be viewed at any time by selecting the building.
AUTOMINER.EFFECT: Automatically digs out all materials in a set range.
AUTOMINER.NAME: <link=\"AUTOMINER\">Robo-Miner</link>

BATTERY.DESC: Batteries allow power from generators to be stored for later.
BATTERY.EFFECT: Stores <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> from generators, then provides that power to buildings.\n\nLoses charge over time.
BATTERY.NAME: <link=\"BATTERY\">Battery</link>

BATTERYMEDIUM.DESC: Larger batteries hold more power and keep systems running longer before recharging.
BATTERYMEDIUM.EFFECT: Stores <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> from generators, then provides that power to buildings.\n\nSlightly loses charge over time.
BATTERYMEDIUM.NAME: <link=\"BATTERYMEDIUM\">Jumbo Battery</link>

BATTERYMODULE.DESC: Charging a battery module before takeoff makes it easier to power buildings during flight.
BATTERYMODULE.EFFECT:
Stores the excess <link="POWER">Power</link> generated by a Rocket Engine or <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.

Provides stored power to <link="ROCKETINTERIORPOWERPLUG">Interior Rocket Outlets</link>.

Loses charge over time. 

Must be built via Rocket Platform.
BATTERYMODULE.NAME: <link=\"BATTERYMODULE\">Battery Module</link>

BATTERYSMART.ACTIVATE_TOOLTIP: Sends a Green Signal when battery is less than {0}% charged, until it is {1}% (High Threshold) charged
BATTERYSMART.DEACTIVATE_TOOLTIP: Sends a Red Signal when battery is {0}% charged, until it is less than {1}% (Low Threshold) charged
BATTERYSMART.DESC: Smart batteries send a Green Signal when they require charging.
BATTERYSMART.EFFECT: Stores Power from generators, then provides that power to buildings. Sends a Green Signal or Red Signal based on the configuration of the Logic Activation Parameters. Very slightly loses charge over time.
BATTERYSMART.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when battery is less than Low Threshold charged, until High Threshold is reached again
BATTERYSMART.LOGIC_PORT_INACTIVE: Sends a Red Signal when the battery is more than High Threshold charged, until Low Threshold is reached again
BATTERYSMART.NAME: <link=\"BATTERYSMART\">Smart Battery</link>

BEACHCHAIR.DESC: Soak up some relaxing sun rays.
BEACHCHAIR.EFFECT: Duplicants can relax by lounging in <link=\"LIGHT\">Sunlight</link>.\n\nIncreases Duplicant <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.
BEACHCHAIR.LIGHTEFFECT_HIGH_TOOLTIP: Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if this building is in at least {lux} light.
BEACHCHAIR.LIGHTEFFECT_LOW_TOOLTIP: Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if this building is in light dimmer than {lux}.
BEACHCHAIR.NAME: <link=\"BEACHCHAIR\">Beach Chair</link>

BED.DESC: Duplicants without a bed will develop sore backs from sleeping on the floor.
BED.EFFECT: Gives one Duplicant a place to sleep.\n\nDuplicants will automatically return to their cots to sleep at night.

SCIENCELAB.DESC: For the Duplicant who dreams of scientific discoveries.
SCIENCELAB.NAME: <link=\"BED\">Lab Cot</link>

STARCURTAIN.DESC: Now Duplicants can sleep beneath the stars without wearing an Atmo Suit to bed.
STARCURTAIN.NAME: <link=\"BED\">Stargazer Cot</link>

STAYCATION.DESC: Like a weekend away, except... not.
STAYCATION.NAME: <link=\"BED\">Staycation Cot</link>

STRINGLIGHTS.DESC: Wrapped in shiny gold stars, to help sleepy Duplicants feel accomplished.
STRINGLIGHTS.NAME: Good Job Cot

BED.NAME: <link=\"BED\">Cot</link>

BEEHIVE.DESC:
A moderately <link="RADIATION">Radioactive</link> nest made by <link="BEE">Beetas</link>.

Converts <link="URANIUMORE">Uranium Ore</link> into <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link> when worked by a Beeta.
Will not function if ground below has been destroyed.
BEEHIVE.EFFECT: The cozy home of a Beeta.
BEEHIVE.NAME: <link=\"BEEHIVE\">Beeta Hive</link>

BIODIESELENGINE.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
BIODIESELENGINE.EFFECT:
Burns <link="REFINEDLIPID">Biodiesel</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Biodiesel Engines have generous height restrictions, ideal for hauling a larger number of modules.

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BIODIESELENGINE.NAME: <link=\"BIODIESELENGINE\">Biodiesel Engine</link>

BIODIESELENGINECLUSTER.DESC: More powerful rocket engines can propel heavier burdens.
BIODIESELENGINECLUSTER.EFFECT:
Burns <link="REFINEDLIPID">Biodiesel</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Biodiesel Engines have generous height restrictions, ideal for hauling many modules.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>, and requires an oxidizer tank.

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BIODIESELENGINECLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"BIODIESELENGINECLUSTER\">Biodiesel Engine</link>

BOTTLEEMPTIER.DESC: A bottle emptier's Element Filter can be used to designate areas for specific liquid storage.
BOTTLEEMPTIER.EFFECT: Empties bottled <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquids</link> back into the world.
BOTTLEEMPTIER.NAME: <link=\"BOTTLEEMPTIER\">Bottle Emptier</link>

BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITGAS.DESC: A canister drainer's Element Filter can designate areas for specific gas storage.
BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITGAS.NAME: <link=\"BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITGAS\">Canister Drainer</link>

BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITLIQUID.DESC: A bottle drainer's Element Filter can be used to designate areas for specific liquid storage.
BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITLIQUID.NAME: <link=\"BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITLIQUID\">Bottle Drainer</link>

BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS.DESC: A canister emptier's Element Filter can designate areas for specific gas storage.
BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS.EFFECT: Empties <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> canisters back into the world.
BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS.NAME: <link=\"BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS\">Canister Emptier</link>

BUNKERDOOR.DESC: A massive, slow-moving door which is nearly indestructible.
BUNKERDOOR.EFFECT: Blocks <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> and <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.\n\nCan withstand extremely high pressures and impacts.
BUNKERDOOR.NAME: <link=\"BUNKERDOOR\">Bunker Door</link>

BUNKERTILE.DESC: Bunker tile can build strong shelters in otherwise dangerous environments.
BUNKERTILE.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.\n\nCan withstand extreme pressures and impacts.
BUNKERTILE.NAME: <link=\"BUNKERTILE\">Bunker Tile</link>

CAMPFIRE.DESC: Wood heaters dry out soggy feet and help Duplicants forget how cold they are.
CAMPFIRE.EFFECT: Consumes <link=\"WOOD\">Wood</link> in order to <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link> chilly surroundings.
CAMPFIRE.NAME: <link=\"CAMPFIRE\">Wood Heater</link>

CANVAS.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
CANVAS.EFFECT: Increases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.\n\nMust be painted by a Duplicant.

ART_A.DESC: A sweet, amateurish interpretation of the Duplicant form.
ART_A.NAME: <link=\"ARTA\">Doodle Dee Duplicant</link>

ART_B.DESC: The fast-food equivalent of high art.
ART_B.NAME: <link=\"ARTB\">Midnight Meal</link>

ART_C.DESC: Some viewers swear they've seen it blink.
ART_C.NAME: <link=\"ARTC\">Dupa Leesa</link>

ART_D.DESC: If art could speak, this piece would be far less popular.
ART_D.NAME: <link=\"ARTD\">The Screech</link>

ART_E.DESC: Scratching and sniffing the flower yields no scent.
ART_E.NAME: <link=\"ARTE\">Fridup Kallo</link>

ART_F.DESC: Portrait of a leader astride their mighty steed.
ART_F.NAME: <link=\"ARTF\">Moopoleon Bonafarte</link>

ART_G.DESC: The raw emotion conveyed here often renders viewers speechless.
ART_G.NAME: <link=\"ARTG\">Expressive Genius</link>

ART_H.DESC: A candid moment of affection between two organisms.
ART_H.NAME: <link=\"ARTH\">The Smooch</link>

ART_I.DESC: A multi-layered exploration of the artist as a subject.
ART_I.NAME: <link=\"ARTI\">Self-Self-Self Portrait</link>

ART_J.DESC: A painting that captures the true nature of hunger.
ART_J.NAME: <link=\"ARTJ\">Nikola Devouring His Mush Bar</link>

ART_K.DESC: The perfect painting for dark, dank spaces.
ART_K.NAME: <link=\"ARTK\">Sketchy Fungi</link>

ART_L.DESC: The furry hat helped keep the artist's bandage on.
ART_L.NAME: <link=\"ARTL\">Post-Ear Era</link>

ART_N.DESC: Most Duplicants believe that the balloon in this image is about to be caught.
ART_N.NAME: <link=\"ARTN\">Always Hope</link>

ART_P.DESC: It is a cruel guest who does not RSVP.
ART_P.NAME: <link=\"ARTP\">Pour Soul</link>

ART_Q.DESC: The only kind of gift that poorly behaved Duplicants can expect to receive.
ART_Q.NAME: <link=\"ARTQ\">Ore Else</link>

ART_R.DESC: It combines two things that everyone loves: pips and lasers.
ART_R.NAME: <link=\"ARTR\">Lazer Pipz</link>

CANVAS.NAME: <link=\"CANVAS\">Blank Canvas</link>

CANVASTALL.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
CANVASTALL.EFFECT: Moderately increases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.\n\nMust be painted by a Duplicant.

ART_TALL_A.DESC: Even amateur art is essential to life.
ART_TALL_A.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLA\">Ode to O2</link>

ART_TALL_D.DESC: It doesn't have to taste good, it's art.
ART_TALL_D.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLD\">Pickled Meal Lice II</link>

ART_TALL_E.DESC: Rumor has it that the model was self-conscious about their uneven eyebrows.
ART_TALL_E.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLE\">Fruit Face</link>

ART_TALL_G.DESC: A poetic ink painting depicting the beginning of an end.
ART_TALL_G.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLG\">A Farewell at Sunrise</link>

ART_TALL_H.DESC: The type of painting that ambitious Duplicants gravitate to.
ART_TALL_H.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLH\">Conqueror of Clusters</link>

ART_TALL_I.DESC: When the future calls, Duplicants answer.
ART_TALL_I.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLI\">Pei Phone</link>

ART_TALL_J.DESC: A poster for a blockbuster film that was never made.
ART_TALL_J.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLJ\">Duplicants of the Galaxy</link>

ART_TALL_K.DESC: The glass and frame are hydrophobic, for easy cleaning.
ART_TALL_K.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLK\">Cubist Loo</link>

ART_TALL_L.DESC: Nearby, a companion animal waited for the object to be thrown.
ART_TALL_L.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLL\">Mirror Ball</link>

ART_TALL_M.DESC: No one likes being interrupted when they're waiting for inspiration to strike.
ART_TALL_M.NAME: <link=\"ARTTALLM\">Do Not Disturb</link>

ART_TALL_P.DESC: There were greasy fingerprints on the canvas even before the paint had dried.
ART_TALL_P.NAME: The Feast

CANVASTALL.NAME: <link=\"CANVASTALL\">Portrait Canvas</link>

CANVASWIDE.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
CANVASWIDE.EFFECT: Moderately increases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.\n\nMust be painted by a Duplicant.

ART_WIDE_A.DESC: The effort is admirable, though the execution is not.
ART_WIDE_A.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEA\">The Twins</link>

ART_WIDE_C.DESC: Food this good deserves to be immortalized.
ART_WIDE_C.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEC\">Still Life with Barbeque and Frost Bun</link>

ART_WIDE_D.DESC: All the other colors in the artist's palette had dried up.
ART_WIDE_D.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDED\">Composition with Three Colors</link>

ART_WIDE_E.DESC: Each tine represents a branch of science.
ART_WIDE_E.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEE\">Behold, A Fork</link>

ART_WIDE_F.DESC: Its companion piece, \"The Astronomer at Work\" was lost in a meteor shower.
ART_WIDE_F.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEF\">The Astronomer at Home</link>

ART_WIDE_G.DESC: For the art collector who doesn't mind a bit of repetition.
ART_WIDE_G.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEG\">Iconic Iteration</link>

ART_WIDE_H.DESC: A daring piece, guaranteed to cause a stir.
ART_WIDE_H.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEH\">La Belle Meep</link>

ART_WIDE_I.DESC: A moody study of the renowned tunneler.
ART_WIDE_I.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEI\">Glorious Vole</link>

ART_WIDE_J.DESC: As far as wave-themed art goes, it's great.
ART_WIDE_J.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEJ\">The Swell Swell</link>

ART_WIDE_K.DESC: The delight on the subjects' faces is contagious.
ART_WIDE_K.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEK\">Flight of the Slicksters</link>

ART_WIDE_L.DESC: A dreamy abundance of swirls, whirls and whorls.
ART_WIDE_L.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEL\">The Shiny Night</link>

ART_WIDE_M.DESC: Things get a bit melty if they're forgotten in the sun.
ART_WIDE_M.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEM\">Hot Afternoon</link>

ART_WIDE_O.DESC: Even just exhaling nearby could damage this historical work.
ART_WIDE_O.NAME: <link=\"ARTWIDEO\">Super Old Mural</link>

CANVASWIDE.NAME: <link=\"CANVASWIDE\">Landscape Canvas</link>

CARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
CARGOBAY.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to store any <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid Materials</link> found during space missions.\n\nStored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
CARGOBAY.NAME: <link=\"CARGOBAY\">Cargo Bay</link>

CARGOBAYCLUSTER.DESC: Holds more than a regular cargo bay.
CARGOBAYCLUSTER.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store most of the <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
CARGOBAYCLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"CARGOBAYCLUSTER\">Large Cargo Bay</link>

CARPETTILE.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.\n\nIncreases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.
CARPETTILE.NAME: <link=\"CARPETTILE\">Carpeted Tile</link>

CEILINGFOSSILSCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative ceiling sculptures.
CEILINGFOSSILSCULPTURE.EFFECT: Majorly increases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.\n\nMust be sculpted by a Duplicant.
CEILINGFOSSILSCULPTURE.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGFOSSILSCULPTURE\">Hanging Fossil Block</link>

CEILINGLIGHT.DESC: Light reduces Duplicant stress and is required to grow certain plants.
CEILINGLIGHT.EFFECT: Provides <link=\"LIGHT\">Light</link> when <link=\"POWER\">Powered</link>.\n\nIncreases Duplicant workspeed within light radius.

BLOSSOM.DESC: For Duplicants who can't keep real plants alive.
BLOSSOM.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Blossom Ceiling Light</link>

DEFAULT_CEILINGLIGHT.DESC: It does not go on the floor.
DEFAULT_CEILINGLIGHT.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Ceiling Light</link>

FAUXPIPE.DESC: The height of plumbing-inspired interior design.
FAUXPIPE.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Faux Pipe Ceiling Light</link>

LABFLASK.DESC: For best results, do not fill with liquids.
LABFLASK.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Lab Flask Ceiling Light</link>

MINING.DESC: The protective cage makes it the safest choice for underground parties.
MINING.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Mining Ceiling Light</link>

POLKADOT.DESC: A fun lampshade for fun spaces.
POLKADOT.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Polka Dot Ceiling Light</link>

RUBIKS.DESC: The initials E.R. are sewn into the lampshade.
RUBIKS.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Puzzle Cube Ceiling Light</link>

CEILINGLIGHT.NAME: <link=\"CEILINGLIGHT\">Ceiling Light</link>

CHECKPOINT.DESC: Checkpoints can be connected to automated sensors to determine when it's safe to enter.
CHECKPOINT.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to pass when receiving a Green Signal.\n\nPrevents Duplicants from passing when receiving a Red Signal.
CHECKPOINT.NAME: <link=\"CHECKPOINT\">Duplicant Checkpoint</link>

CHEMICALREFINERY.DESC: It's like a blender, but better.
CHEMICALREFINERY.EFFECT: Combines <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquids</link> and other inputs into fluid compounds.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate emulsions unless recipes are queued.
CHEMICALREFINERY.NAME: <link=\"CHEMICALREFINERY\">Emulsifier</link>
CHEMICALREFINERY.REFINEDLIPID_RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Biodiesel is a <link=\"COMBUSTIBLELIQUID\">Combustible Liquid</link> used in <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> production.
CHEMICALREFINERY.SALTWATER_RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Salt Water is a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> with insulating and radiation-absorbing properties.

CHLORINATOR.DESC: Bleach stone is useful for sanitation and geotuning.
CHLORINATOR.NAME: <link=\"CHLORINATOR\">Bleach Stone Hopper</link>

CLOTHINGALTERATIONSTATION.DESC: Allows skilled Duplicants to add extra personal pizzazz to their wardrobe.
CLOTHINGALTERATIONSTATION.EFFECT: Upgrades <link=\"FUNKYVEST\">Snazzy Suits</link> into <link=\"CUSTOMCLOTHING\">Primo Garb</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
CLOTHINGALTERATIONSTATION.NAME: <link=\"CLOTHINGALTERATIONSTATION\">Clothing Refashionator</link>

CLOTHINGFABRICATOR.DESC: A textile loom can be used to spin Reed Fiber into wearable Duplicant clothing.
