CLOTHINGFABRICATOR.EFFECT: Tailors Duplicant <link=\"EQUIPMENT\">Clothing</link> items.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
CLOTHINGFABRICATOR.NAME: <link=\"CLOTHINGFABRICATOR\">Textile Loom</link>

CLUSTERCOMMANDMODULE.LOGIC_PORT_READY_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket launch checklist is complete
CLUSTERCOMMANDMODULE.NAME: <link=\"CLUSTERCOMMANDMODULE\">Command Capsule</link>

CLUSTERCRAFTINTERIORDOOR.DESC: A hatch for getting in and out of the rocket.
CLUSTERCRAFTINTERIORDOOR.NAME: <link=\"CLUSTERCRAFTINTERIORDOOR\">Interior Hatch</link>

CLUSTERTELESCOPE.DESC: Telescopes are necessary for studying space, allowing rocket travel to other worlds.
CLUSTERTELESCOPE.EFFECT:
Reveals visitable Planetoids in space, producing <link="DATABANK">Data Banks</link> in the process.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.

Building must be exposed to space to function.
CLUSTERTELESCOPE.NAME: <link=\"CLUSTERTELESCOPE\">Telescope</link>
CLUSTERTELESCOPE.REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: A steady {0} supply is required to sustain working Duplicants.

CLUSTERTELESCOPEENCLOSED.DESC: Telescopes are necessary for studying space, allowing rocket travel to other worlds.
CLUSTERTELESCOPEENCLOSED.EFFECT:
Reveals visitable Planetoids in space... in comfort!

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.

Excellent sunburn protection (100%), partial <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link> protection (50%) .

Building must be exposed to space to function.
CLUSTERTELESCOPEENCLOSED.NAME: <link=\"CLUSTERTELESCOPEENCLOSED\">Enclosed Telescope</link>
CLUSTERTELESCOPEENCLOSED.REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: A steady {0} supply is required to sustain working Duplicants.

CO2ENGINE.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
CO2ENGINE.EFFECT:
Uses pressurized <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> to propel rockets for short range space exploration.

Carbon Dioxide Engines are relatively fast engine for their size but with limited height restrictions.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
CO2ENGINE.NAME: <link=\"CO2ENGINE\">Carbon Dioxide Engine</link>

CO2SCRUBBER.DESC: Skimmers remove large amounts of carbon dioxide, but produce no breathable air.
CO2SCRUBBER.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> to filter <link=\"CARBONDIOXIDE\">Carbon Dioxide</link> from the air.
CO2SCRUBBER.NAME: <link=\"CO2SCRUBBER\">Carbon Skimmer</link>

COMETDETECTOR.DESC: Networks of many scanners will scan more efficiently than one on its own.
COMETDETECTOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal to its automation circuit when it detects incoming objects from space.\n\nCan be configured to detect incoming meteor showers or returning space rockets.
COMETDETECTOR.NAME: <link=\"COMETDETECTOR\">Space Scanner</link>

COMMANDMODULE.DESC: At least one astronaut must be assigned to the command module to pilot a rocket.
COMMANDMODULE.EFFECT: Contains passenger seating for Duplicant <link=\"ASTRONAUTING1\">Astronauts</link>.\n\nA Command Capsule must be the last module installed at the top of a rocket.
COMMANDMODULE.LOGIC_PORT_READY_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket launch checklist is complete
COMMANDMODULE.NAME: <link=\"COMMANDMODULE\">Command Capsule</link>

COMPOST.DESC: Composts safely deal with biological waste, producing fresh dirt.
COMPOST.EFFECT: Reduces <link=\"TOXICSAND\">Polluted Dirt</link>, rotting <link=\"FOOD\">Foods</link>, and discarded organics down into <link=\"DIRT\">Dirt</link>.
COMPOST.NAME: <link=\"COMPOST\">Compost</link>

STATUS_ITEM.NAME: Marked for Emptying
STATUS_ITEM.TOOLTIP: Awaiting a <link=\"PLUMBER\">Plumber</link> to clear this pipe

CONTACTCONDUCTIVEPIPEBRIDGE.DESC: It can transfer heat effectively even if no liquid is passing through.
CONTACTCONDUCTIVEPIPEBRIDGE.EFFECT:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>, allowing extreme <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> exchange with overlapping buildings.

Can function in a vacuum.

Can be run through wall and floor tiles.
CONTACTCONDUCTIVEPIPEBRIDGE.NAME: <link=\"CONTACTCONDUCTIVEPIPEBRIDGE\">Conduction Panel</link>

COOKINGSTATION.DESC: Proper cooking eliminates foodborne disease and produces tasty, stress-relieving meals.
COOKINGSTATION.EFFECT: Cooks a wide variety of improved <link=\"FOOD\">Foods</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
COOKINGSTATION.NAME: <link=\"COOKINGSTATION\">Electric Grill</link>

CORNERMOULDING.DESC: Corner trim is a purely decorative addition for ceiling corners.
CORNERMOULDING.EFFECT: Used to decorate the ceiling corners of rooms.\n\nIncreases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.

DEFAULT_CORNERMOULDING.DESC: It really dresses up a ceiling corner.
DEFAULT_CORNERMOULDING.NAME: <link=\"CORNERMOULDING\">Corner Trim</link>

SHINEORNAMENTS.DESC: Why deck the halls, when you could festoon them?
SHINEORNAMENTS.NAME: <link=\"CORNERMOULDING\">Fancy Bug Corner Garland</link>

CORNERMOULDING.NAME: <link=\"CORNERMOULDING\">Corner Trim</link>

COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.DESC: Planetariums allow the simulated exploration of locations discovered with a telescope.
COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.EFFECT:
Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Interstellar Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes data from <link="RESEARCHMODULE">Research Modules</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.
COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.NAME: <link=\"COSMICRESEARCHCENTER\">Virtual Planetarium</link>

CRAFTINGTABLE.DESC: Crafting stations allow Duplicants to make oxygen masks to wear in low breathability areas.
CRAFTINGTABLE.EFFECT: Produces items and equipment for Duplicant use.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
CRAFTINGTABLE.NAME: <link=\"CRAFTINGTABLE\">Crafting Station</link>

CREATUREAIRTRAP.DESC: It needs to be armed prior to use.
CREATUREAIRTRAP.EFFECT: Attracts and captures airborne <link=\"CREATURES\">Critters</link>.\n\nOnly Duplicants with the <link=\"RANCHING1\">Critter Ranching I</link> skill can arm this trap. It's reusable!
CREATUREAIRTRAP.NAME: <link=\"CREATUREAIRTRAP\">Airborne Critter Trap</link>

CREATUREDELIVERYPOINT.DESC: Duplicants automatically bring captured critters to these relocation points for release.
CREATUREDELIVERYPOINT.EFFECT: Releases trapped <link=\"CREATURES\">Critters</link> back into the world.\n\nCan be used multiple times.
CREATUREDELIVERYPOINT.NAME: <link=\"CREATUREDELIVERYPOINT\">Critter Drop-Off</link>

CREATUREFEEDER.DESC: Critters tend to stay close to their food source and wander less when given a feeder.
CREATUREFEEDER.NAME: <link=\"CREATUREFEEDER\">Critter Feeder</link>

CREATUREGROUNDTRAP.DESC: It's designed for land critters, but flopping fish sometimes find their way in too.
CREATUREGROUNDTRAP.EFFECT: Captures a living <link=\"CREATURES\">Critter</link> for transport.\n\nOnly Duplicants with the <link=\"RANCHING1\">Critter Ranching I</link> skill can arm this trap. It's reusable!
CREATUREGROUNDTRAP.NAME: <link=\"CREATUREGROUNDTRAP\">Critter Trap</link>

CREATURETRAP.DESC: Critter traps cannot catch swimming or flying critters.
CREATURETRAP.EFFECT: Captures a living <link=\"CREATURES\">Critter</link> for transport.\n\nSingle use.
CREATURETRAP.NAME: <link=\"CREATURETRAP\">Critter Trap</link>

CRITTERCONDO.DESC: It's nice to have nice things.
CRITTERCONDO.EFFECT: Provides a comfortable lounge area that boosts <link=\"CREATURES\">Critter</link> happiness.
CRITTERCONDO.NAME: <link=\"CRITTERCONDO\">Critter Condo</link>

CRITTERDROPOFF.DESC: Duplicants automatically bring captured critters to these relocation points for release.
CRITTERDROPOFF.EFFECT: Releases trapped <link=\"CREATURES\">Critters</link> back into the world.\n\nMonitoring and drop-off are limited to the specified species.
CRITTERDROPOFF.NAME: <link=\"CRITTERDROPOFF\">Critter Drop-Off</link>

CRITTERPICKUP.DESC: Duplicants will automatically wrangle excess critters.
CRITTERPICKUP.EFFECT: Ensures the prompt relocation of <link=\"CREATURES\">Critters</link> that exceed the maximum amount set.\n\nMonitoring and pick-up are limited to the specified species.
CRITTERPICKUP.NAME: <link=\"CRITTERPICKUP\">Critter Pick-Up</link>

CROWNMOULDING.DESC: Ceiling trim is a purely decorative addition to one's overhead area.
CROWNMOULDING.EFFECT: Used to decorate the ceilings of rooms.\n\nIncreases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.

DEFAULT_CROWNMOULDING.DESC: Ceiling trim is a purely decorative addition to one's overhead area.
DEFAULT_CROWNMOULDING.NAME: <link=\"CROWNMOULDING\">Ceiling Trim</link>

SHINEORNAMENTS.DESC: Someone spent their entire weekend gluing ribbons to paper Shine Bug cut-outs, and it shows.
SHINEORNAMENTS.NAME: <link=\"CROWNMOULDING\">Fancy Bug Ceiling Garland</link>

CROWNMOULDING.NAME: <link=\"CROWNMOULDING\">Ceiling Trim</link>

CRYOTANK.DEFROSTBUTTONTOOLTIP: A new pal is just an icebreaker away
CRYOTANK.DESC: The tank appears impossibly old, but smells crisp and brand new.\n\nA silhouette just barely visible through the frost of the glass.
CRYOTANK.NAME: <link=\"CRYOTANK\">Cryotank 3000</link>

DATAMINER.DESC: Data banks can also be used to program robo-pilot rocket modules.
DATAMINER.EFFECT: Mass-produces <link=\"DATABANK\">Data Banks</link> that can be processed into <link=\"RESEARCHDLC1\">Data Analysis Research</link> points.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
DATAMINER.NAME: <link=\"DATAMINER\">Data Miner</link>

DECONTAMINATIONSHOWER.DESC: Don't forget to decontaminate behind your ears.
DECONTAMINATIONSHOWER.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> to remove <link=\"DISEASE\">Germs</link> and <link=\"RADIATION\">Radiation</link>.\n\nDecontaminates both Duplicants and their <link=\"EQUIPMENT\">Clothing</link>.
DECONTAMINATIONSHOWER.NAME: <link=\"DECONTAMINATIONSHOWER\">Decontamination Shower</link>

DEEPFRYER.DESC: Everything tastes better when it's deep-fried.
DEEPFRYER.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"TALLOW\">Tallow</link> to cook a wide variety of improved <link=\"FOOD\">Foods</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
DEEPFRYER.NAME: <link=\"DEEPFRYER\">Deep Fryer</link>

OUTSIDE_KITCHEN.NAME: Outside of Kitchen
OUTSIDE_KITCHEN.TOOLTIP: This building must be in a Kitchen before it can be used

DESALINATOR.DESC: Salt can be refined into table salt for a mealtime morale boost.
DESALINATOR.NAME: <link=\"DESALINATOR\">Desalinator</link>

DEVGENERATOR.EFFECT: Generates testing power for late nights.
DEVGENERATOR.NAME: Dev Generator

DEVHEATER.EFFECT: Generates on-demand heat for testing toastiness.
DEVHEATER.NAME: Dev Heater

DEVHEPSPAWNER.DESC: Radbolts are necessary for producing Materials Science research.
DEVHEPSPAWNER.NAME: Dev Radbolt Generator

DEVLIGHTGENERATOR.DESC: Brightens up a dev's darkest hours.
DEVLIGHTGENERATOR.NAME: Dev Light Source

DEVPUMPGAS.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.
DEVPUMPGAS.EFFECT: Draws in <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> and runs it through <link=\"GASPIPING\">Pipes</link>.\n\nMust be immersed in <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
DEVPUMPGAS.NAME: Dev Pump Gas

DEVPUMPLIQUID.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.
DEVPUMPLIQUID.EFFECT: Draws in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Pipes</link>.\n\nMust be submerged in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.
DEVPUMPLIQUID.NAME: Dev Pump Liquid

DEVPUMPSOLID.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send solids to that building.
DEVPUMPSOLID.EFFECT: Generates chosen <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid Materials</link> and runs it through <link=\"SOLIDCONDUIT\">Conveyor Rail</link>
DEVPUMPSOLID.NAME: Dev Pump Solid

DEVRADIATIONGENERATOR.EFFECT: Generates on-demand radiation to keep things clear. Nu-clear.
DEVRADIATIONGENERATOR.NAME: Dev Radiation Emitter

DIAMONDPRESS.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> and <link=\"RADIATION\">Radbolts</link> to crush <link=\"REFINEDCARBON\">Refined Carbon</link> into <link=\"DIAMOND\">Diamond</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued and <link=\"REFINEDCARBON\">Refined Carbon</link> has been discovered.
DIAMONDPRESS.NAME: <link=\"DIAMONDPRESS\">Diamond Press</link>

DININGTABLE.DESC: Duplicants prefer to dine at a table, rather than eat off the floor.
DININGTABLE.EFFECT: Gives one Duplicant a place to eat.\n\nDuplicants will automatically eat at their assigned table when hungry.
DININGTABLE.NAME: <link=\"DININGTABLE\">Mess Table</link>

DIRECTIONALWORLDPUMPLIQUID.DESC: Channels move more volume than pumps and require no power, but need sufficient pressure to function.
DIRECTIONALWORLDPUMPLIQUID.EFFECT: Directionally moves large volumes of <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">LIQUID</link> through a channel.\n\nCan be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.
DIRECTIONALWORLDPUMPLIQUID.NAME: <link=\"DIRECTIONALWORLDPUMPLIQUID\">Liquid Channel</link>

DISTILLATIONCOLUMN.EFFECT: Separates any <link=\"DIRTYWATER\">Contaminated Water</link> piped through it into <link=\"STEAM\">Steam</link> and <link=\"TOXICSAND\">Polluted Dirt</link>.
DISTILLATIONCOLUMN.NAME: <link=\"DISTILLATIONCOLUMN\">Distillation Column</link>

DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.DESC: Planetariums allow the simulated exploration of locations recorded in <link=\"ORBITALRESEARCHDATABANK\">Data Banks</link>.
DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.EFFECT: Conducts <link=\"RESEARCH\">Data Analysis Research</link> to unlock new technologies.\n\nConsumes <link=\"ORBITALRESEARCHDATABANK\">Data Banks</link> generated by exploration.
DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.NAME: <link=\"DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENTER\">Virtual Planetarium</link>

DLC2POITECHUNLOCKS.DESC: A functional research decrypter with one transmission remaining.\n\nIt was designed to support colony survival.
DLC2POITECHUNLOCKS.NAME: Research Portal

DLC4POITECHUNLOCKS.DESC: A functional research decrypter with one transmission remaining.\n\nIt was designed to support colony survival.
DLC4POITECHUNLOCKS.NAME: Research Portal

DOCTORSTATION.DESC: Sick bays can be placed in hospital rooms to decrease the likelihood of disease spreading.
DOCTORSTATION.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to administer basic treatments to sick Duplicants.\n\nDuplicants must possess the Bedside Manner <link=\"ROLES\">Skill</link> to treat peers.
DOCTORSTATION.NAME: <link=\"DOCTORSTATION\">Sick Bay</link>

AUTO.NAME: Auto
AUTO.TOOLTIP: Duplicants open and close this door as needed

DOOR.DESC: Door controls can be used to prevent Duplicants from entering restricted areas.
DOOR.EFFECT: Encloses areas without blocking <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> or <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> flow.\n\nWild <link=\"CREATURES\">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
DOOR.NAME: <link=\"DOOR\">Pneumatic Door</link>

EGGCRACKER.DESC: Raw eggs are an ingredient in certain high quality food recipes.
EGGCRACKER.EFFECT:
Converts viable <link="CREATURES">Critter</link> eggs into cooking ingredients.

Cracked Eggs cannot hatch.

Duplicants will not crack eggs unless tasks are queued.

HANDS.DESC: Just like Mi-Ma used to have.
HANDS.NAME: <link=\"EGGCRACKER\">Handy Cracker</link>

EGGCRACKER.NAME: <link=\"EGGCRACKER\">Egg Cracker</link>

EGGINCUBATOR.DESC: Incubators can maintain the ideal internal conditions for several species of critter egg.
EGGINCUBATOR.EFFECT: Incubates <link=\"CREATURES\">Critter</link> eggs until ready to hatch.\n\nAssigned Duplicants must possess the <link=\"RANCHING1\">Critter Ranching</link> skill.
EGGINCUBATOR.NAME: <link=\"EGGINCUBATOR\">Incubator</link>

ELECTROBANKCHARGER.DESC: Bionic Duplicants rely on a steady supply of power to function.
ELECTROBANKCHARGER.EFFECT: Converts empty <link=\"ELECTROBANK\">Eco Power Banks</link> into fully charged units ready for reuse.
ELECTROBANKCHARGER.NAME: <link=\"ELECTROBANKCHARGER\">Power Bank Charger</link>

ELECTROLYZER.DESC: Water goes in one end, life sustaining oxygen comes out the other.
ELECTROLYZER.EFFECT: Converts <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> into <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> and <link=\"HYDROGEN\">Hydrogen Gas</link>.\n\nBecomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
ELECTROLYZER.NAME: <link=\"ELECTROLYZER\">Electrolyzer</link>

ESCAPEPOD.DESC: Delivers a Duplicant from a stranded rocket to the nearest Planetoid.
ESCAPEPOD.NAME: <link=\"ESCAPEPOD\">Escape Pod</link>

ESPRESSOMACHINE.DESC: A shot of espresso helps Duplicants relax after a long day.
ESPRESSOMACHINE.EFFECT: Provides refreshment for Duplicants on their breaks.\n\nIncreases Duplicant <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.
ESPRESSOMACHINE.NAME: <link=\"ESPRESSOMACHINE\">Espresso Machine</link>

ETHANOLDISTILLERY.DESC: Ethanol distillers convert <link=\"WOOD\">Wood</link> into burnable <link=\"ETHANOL\">Ethanol</link> fuel.
ETHANOLDISTILLERY.NAME: <link=\"ETHANOLDISTILLERY\">Ethanol Distiller</link>

EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS.DESC: A quick and easy substitute, though it'll never live up to the original.
EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS.EFFECT: A portable bioprinter that produces new Duplicants or care packages containing resources.\n\nOnly one Printing Pod or Mini-Pod is permitted per Planetoid.
EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS.NAME: <link=\"EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS\">Mini-Pod</link>

EXTERIORWALL.DESC: Drywall can be used in conjunction with tiles to build airtight rooms on the surface.
EXTERIORWALL.EFFECT: Prevents <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> and <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> loss in space.\n\nBuilds an insulating backwall behind buildings.

BASIC_BLUE_COBALT.DESC: It doesn't cure the blues, so much as emphasize them.
BASIC_BLUE_COBALT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Solid Cobalt</link>

BASIC_GREEN_KELLY.DESC: It's cheaper than having a garden.
BASIC_GREEN_KELLY.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Spring Green</link>

BASIC_ORANGE_SATSUMA.DESC: Less fruit-forward, but just as fresh.
BASIC_ORANGE_SATSUMA.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Solid Satsuma</link>

BASIC_PINK_FLAMINGO.DESC: A bold statement, for bold Duplicants.
BASIC_PINK_FLAMINGO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Solid Pink</link>

BASIC_RED_DEEP.DESC: It really spices up dull walls.
BASIC_RED_DEEP.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Chili Red</link>

BASIC_WHITE.DESC: It's just so fresh and so clean.
BASIC_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Fresh White</link>

CIRCLE_BLUE_COBALT_WHITE.DESC: It can be arranged into giant blue polka dots.
CIRCLE_BLUE_COBALT_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">H2O Wedge</link>

CIRCLE_GREEN_KELLY_WHITE.DESC: It can be arranged into giant green polka dots.
CIRCLE_GREEN_KELLY_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Algae Wedge</link>

CIRCLE_GREY_CHARCOAL_WHITE.DESC: It can be arranged into giant shadowy polka dots.
CIRCLE_GREY_CHARCOAL_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Charcoal Wedge</link>

CIRCLE_ORANGE_SATSUMA_WHITE.DESC: It can be arranged into giant orange polka dots.
CIRCLE_ORANGE_SATSUMA_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Bright Wedge</link>

CIRCLE_PINK_FLAMINGO_WHITE.DESC: It can be arranged into giant pink polka dots.
CIRCLE_PINK_FLAMINGO_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Petal Wedge</link>

CIRCLE_RED_DEEP_WHITE.DESC: It can be arranged into giant red polka dots.
CIRCLE_RED_DEEP_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Magma Wedge</link>

CIRCLE_YELLOW_LEMON_WHITE.DESC: A radiation-free pattern that can be arranged into giant polka dots.
CIRCLE_YELLOW_LEMON_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Yellowcake Wedge</link>

DIAGONAL_BLUE_COBALT_WHITE.DESC: A damp wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_BLUE_COBALT_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">H2O Diagonal</link>

DIAGONAL_GREEN_KELLY_WHITE.DESC: A slippery wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_GREEN_KELLY_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Algae Diagonal</link>

DIAGONAL_GREY_CHARCOAL_WHITE.DESC: A sleek wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_GREY_CHARCOAL_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Charcoal Diagonal</link>

DIAGONAL_ORANGE_SATSUMA_WHITE.DESC: An orange wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_ORANGE_SATSUMA_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Bright Diagonal</link>

DIAGONAL_PINK_FLAMINGO_WHITE.DESC: A pink wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_PINK_FLAMINGO_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Petal Diagonal</link>

DIAGONAL_RED_DEEP_WHITE.DESC: A red wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_RED_DEEP_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Magma Diagonal</link>

DIAGONAL_YELLOW_LEMON_WHITE.DESC: A radiation-free wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
DIAGONAL_YELLOW_LEMON_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Yellowcake Diagonal</link>

FLOPPY_AZULENE_VITRO.DESC: A fun blue print in honor of information storage.
FLOPPY_AZULENE_VITRO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Waterlogged Databank</link>

FLOPPY_BLACK_WHITE.DESC: A chic black-and-white print in honor of information storage.
FLOPPY_BLACK_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Monochrome Databank</link>

FLOPPY_MAGMA_AMINO.DESC: A fun red print in honor of information storage.
FLOPPY_MAGMA_AMINO.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Flashy Databank</link>

FLOPPY_PEAGREEN_BALMY.DESC: A fun green print in honor of information storage.
FLOPPY_PEAGREEN_BALMY.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Lush Databank</link>

FLOPPY_SATSUMA_YELLOWCAKE.DESC: A fun orange print in honor of information storage.
FLOPPY_SATSUMA_YELLOWCAKE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Hi-Vis Databank</link>

ORANGE_JUICE.DESC: If the liquids never hit the floor, is it really a spill?
ORANGE_JUICE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Infinite Spill</link>

PAINT_BLOTS.DESC: There are no mistakes, only cheerful little splotches.
PAINT_BLOTS.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Happy Accidents</link>

PLUS_GREY_CHARCOAL_WHITE.DESC: It's futuristic, so it must be good.
PLUS_GREY_CHARCOAL_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Digital Charcoal</link>

SATSUMA.DESC: Adds some much-needed zest to the room.
SATSUMA.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Satsuma Slice</link>

SNOW.DESC: A wallpaper as unique as my colony.
SNOW.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Snowflake Print</link>

SQUARES_GREEN_KELLY_WHITE.DESC: Now with real simulated algae color!
SQUARES_GREEN_KELLY_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Algae Checkers</link>

SQUARES_ORANGE_SATSUMA_WHITE.DESC: Every tile feels like four tiles!
SQUARES_ORANGE_SATSUMA_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Bright Checkers</link>

SQUARES_YELLOW_LEMON_WHITE.DESC: Any brighter, and they'd be radioactive!
SQUARES_YELLOW_LEMON_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Yellowcake Checkers</link>

STRAWBERRY.DESC: Fruity freckles for naturally sweet spaces.
STRAWBERRY.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Strawberry Speckle</link>

STRIPES_BLUE.DESC: Thick stripes in alternating shades of blue.
STRIPES_BLUE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Blue Awning Stripe</link>

STRIPES_CIRCLE_BLUE.DESC: A stripe that curves to the right.
STRIPES_CIRCLE_BLUE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Blue Circle Stripe</link>

STRIPES_CIRCLE_MUSH.DESC: This wallpaper, like this colony's journey, is full of twists and turns.
STRIPES_CIRCLE_MUSH.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Mush Curves</link>

STRIPES_CIRCLE_PURPLE_BRAINFAT.DESC: This wallpaper, like this colony's journey, is full of twists and turns.
STRIPES_CIRCLE_PURPLE_BRAINFAT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Fainting Curves</link>

STRIPES_CIRCLE_ROSE.DESC: It's pronounced \"peeyoo-ss,\" a sound that Duplicants just can't seem to reproduce.
STRIPES_CIRCLE_ROSE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Puce Curves</link>

STRIPES_CIRCLE_YELLOW_TARTAR.DESC: This wallpaper, like this colony's journey, is full of twists and turns.
STRIPES_CIRCLE_YELLOW_TARTAR.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Ick Curves</link>

STRIPES_DIAGONAL_BLUE.DESC: Inspired by the ties worn during intraoffice sports.
STRIPES_DIAGONAL_BLUE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Blue Regimental Stripe</link>

STRIPES_DIAGONAL_MUSH.DESC: Diagonal stripes in alternating shades of mush bar.
STRIPES_DIAGONAL_MUSH.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Mush Diagonal</link>

STRIPES_DIAGONAL_PURPLE_BRAINFAT.DESC: Diagonal stripes in alternating shades of purple.
STRIPES_DIAGONAL_PURPLE_BRAINFAT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Fainting Diagonal</link>

STRIPES_DIAGONAL_ROSE.DESC: Some describe this color as \"squashed bug.\"
STRIPES_DIAGONAL_ROSE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Puce Diagonal</link>

STRIPES_DIAGONAL_YELLOW_TARTAR.DESC: Diagonal stripes in alternating shades of yellow.
STRIPES_DIAGONAL_YELLOW_TARTAR.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Ick Diagonal</link>

STRIPES_MUSH.DESC: The kind of green that makes one feel slightly nauseated.
STRIPES_MUSH.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Mush Stripe</link>

STRIPES_PURPLE_BRAINFAT.DESC: Vertical stripes make it quite obvious when nearby objects are askew.
STRIPES_PURPLE_BRAINFAT.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Fainting Stripe</link>

STRIPES_ROSE.DESC: Vertical stripes make it quite obvious when nearby objects are askew.
STRIPES_ROSE.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Puce Stripe</link>

STRIPES_YELLOW_TARTAR.DESC: Vertical stripes make it quite obvious when nearby objects are askew.
STRIPES_YELLOW_TARTAR.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Ick Stripe</link>

TICTACTOE_O.DESC: A crisp black 'O' on a clean white background. Ideal for monochromatic games rooms.
TICTACTOE_O.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">TicTacToe O</link>

TICTACTOE_X.DESC: A crisp black 'X' on a clean white background. Ideal for monochromatic games rooms.
TICTACTOE_X.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">TicTacToe X</link>

TOILETPAPER.DESC: Softly undulating lines create an undeniable air of loo-xury.
TOILETPAPER.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">De-loo-xe</link>

TROPICAL.DESC: The original scratch-and-sniff version was immediately recalled.
TROPICAL.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Sporechid Print</link>

WATERMELON.DESC: Far more practical than gluing real fruit on a wall.
WATERMELON.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Juicy Watermelon</link>

EXTERIORWALL.NAME: <link=\"EXTERIORWALL\">Drywall</link>

FABRICATEDWOODMAKER.DESC: Flattened plant bits are a useful wood substitute.
FABRICATEDWOODMAKER.EFFECT: Combines a Binder liquid and <link=\"PLANTFIBER\">Plant Husk</link> to create <link=\"FABRICATEDWOOD\">Plywood</link>.
FABRICATEDWOODMAKER.NAME: <link=\"FABRICATEDWOODMAKER\">Plywood Press</link>

FARMSTATION.DESC: This station only has an effect on crops grown within the same room.
FARMSTATION.EFFECT:
Produces <link="FARMSTATIONTOOLS">Micronutrient Fertilizer</link> to increase <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> growth rates.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="FARMING2">Crop Tending</link> trait.

This building is a necessary component of the Greenhouse room.
FARMSTATION.NAME: <link=\"FARMSTATION\">Farm Station</link>

FARMTILE.DESC: Duplicants can deliver fertilizer and liquids to farm tiles, accelerating plant growth.
FARMTILE.EFFECT: Grows one <link=\"PLANTS\">Plant</link> from a <link=\"PLANTS\">Seed</link>.\n\nCan be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.
FARMTILE.NAME: <link=\"FARMTILE\">Farm Tile</link>

FERTILIZERMAKER.DESC: Fertilizer synthesizers convert polluted dirt into fertilizer for domestic plants.
FERTILIZERMAKER.NAME: <link=\"FERTILIZERMAKER\">Fertilizer Synthesizer</link>

FIREPOLE.DESC: Build these in addition to ladders for efficient upward and downward movement.
FIREPOLE.EFFECT: Allows rapid Duplicant descent.\n\nSignificantly slows upward climbing.
FIREPOLE.NAME: <link=\"FIREPOLE\">Fire Pole</link>

FISHDELIVERYPOINT.DESC: A fish release must be built in liquid to prevent released fish from suffocating.
FISHDELIVERYPOINT.EFFECT: Releases trapped <link=\"PACU\">Pacu</link> back into the world.\n\nCan be used multiple times.
FISHDELIVERYPOINT.NAME: <link=\"FISHDELIVERYPOINT\">Fish Release</link>

FISHFEEDER.DESC: Build this feeder above a body of water to feed the fish within.
FISHFEEDER.EFFECT: Automatically dispenses stored <link=\"CREATURES\">Critter</link> food into the area below.\n\nDispenses continuously as food is consumed.
FISHFEEDER.NAME: <link=\"FISHFEEDER\">Fish Feeder</link>

FISHTRAP.DESC: Trapped fish will automatically be bagged for transport.
FISHTRAP.NAME: <link=\"FISHTRAP\">Fish Trap</link>

FLOORLAMP.DESC: Any building's light emitting radius can be viewed in the light overlay.
FLOORLAMP.EFFECT: Provides <link=\"LIGHT\">Light</link> when <link=\"POWER\">Powered</link>.\n\nIncreases Duplicant workspeed within light radius.

BRISTLEBLOSSOM.DESC: It's a bit prickly, but it casts a festive glow.
BRISTLEBLOSSOM.NAME: <link=\"FLOORLAMP\">Holiday Lamp</link>

DEFAULT_FLOORLAMP.DESC: Any building's light emitting radius can be viewed in the light overlay.
DEFAULT_FLOORLAMP.NAME: <link=\"FLOORLAMP\">Lamp</link>

LEG.DESC: This lamp blazes forth in unparalleled glory.
LEG.NAME: <link=\"FLOORLAMP\">Fragile Leg Lamp</link>

FLOORLAMP.NAME: <link=\"FLOORLAMP\">Lamp</link>

FLOORSWITCH.DESC: Weight plates can be used to turn on amenities only when Duplicants pass by.
FLOORSWITCH.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal when an object or Duplicant is placed atop of it.\n\nCannot be triggered by Gas or Liquids.
FLOORSWITCH.NAME: <link=\"FLOORSWITCH\">Weight Plate</link>

FLOWERVASE.DESC: Flower pots allow decorative plants to be moved to new locations.
FLOWERVASE.EFFECT: Houses a single <link=\"PLANTS\">Plant</link> when sown with a <link=\"PLANTS\">Seed</link>.\n\nIncreases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link> when in use, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.

DEFAULT_FLOWERVASE.DESC: The original container for plants on the move.
DEFAULT_FLOWERVASE.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Flower Pot</link>

RETRO_BOLD.DESC: A funky red flower pot for plants on the move.
RETRO_BOLD.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Bold Retro Flower Pot</link>

RETRO_BRIGHT.DESC: A funky green flower pot for plants on the move.
RETRO_BRIGHT.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Bright Retro Flower Pot</link>

RETRO_DREAMY.DESC: A funky blue flower pot for plants on the move.
RETRO_DREAMY.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Dreamy Retro Flower Pot</link>

RETRO_ELEGANT.DESC: A funky white flower pot for plants on the move.
RETRO_ELEGANT.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Elegant Retro Flower Pot</link>

RETRO_SUNNY.DESC: A funky yellow flower pot for plants on the move.
RETRO_SUNNY.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Sunny Retro Flower Pot</link>

FLOWERVASE.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASE\">Flower Pot</link>

FLOWERVASEHANGING.DESC: Hanging pots can add some Decor to a room, without blocking buildings on the floor.
FLOWERVASEHANGING.EFFECT:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link> when in use, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a ceiling.

BEAKER.DESC: A measured approach to indoor plant decor.
BEAKER.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Beaker Hanging Pot</link>

RETRO_BLUE.DESC: Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
RETRO_BLUE.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Dreamy Hanging Pot</link>

RETRO_GREEN.DESC: Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
RETRO_GREEN.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Bright Hanging Pot</link>

RETRO_RED.DESC: Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
RETRO_RED.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Bold Hanging Pot</link>

RETRO_WHITE.DESC: Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
RETRO_WHITE.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Elegant Hanging Pot</link>

RETRO_YELLOW.DESC: Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
RETRO_YELLOW.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Sunny Hanging Pot</link>

RUBIKS.DESC: The real puzzle is how to keep indoor plants alive.
RUBIKS.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Puzzle Cube Hanging Pot</link>

FLOWERVASEHANGING.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGING\">Hanging Pot</link>

FLOWERVASEHANGINGFANCY.DESC: Aero pots can be hung from the ceiling and have extremely high Decor.
FLOWERVASEHANGINGFANCY.EFFECT:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link> even when empty, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a ceiling.
FLOWERVASEHANGINGFANCY.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEHANGINGFANCY\">Aero Pot</link>

FLOWERVASEWALL.DESC: Placing a plant in a wall pot can add a spot of Decor to otherwise bare walls.
FLOWERVASEWALL.EFFECT:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link> when in use, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a wall.
FLOWERVASEWALL.NAME: <link=\"FLOWERVASEWALL\">Wall Pot</link>

FLUSHTOILET.DESC: Lavatories transmit fewer germs to Duplicants' skin and require no emptying.
FLUSHTOILET.EFFECT: Gives Duplicants a place to relieve themselves.\n\nSpreads very few <link=\"DISEASE\">Germs</link>.

BLUE_BABYTEARS.DESC: A private place to feel big feelings.
BLUE_BABYTEARS.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Weepy Lavatory</link>

DEFAULT_FLUSHTOILET.DESC: Lavatories transmit fewer germs to Duplicants' skin and require no emptying.
DEFAULT_FLUSHTOILET.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Lavatory</link>

POLKA_DARKPURPLERESIN.DESC: For those who've really got to a-go-go.
POLKA_DARKPURPLERESIN.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Mod Dot Lavatory</link>

PURPLE_BRAINFAT.DESC: It's like pooping inside Hexalent fruit!
PURPLE_BRAINFAT.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Faint Purple Lavatory</link>

RED_ROSE.DESC: The scented pink toilet paper smells like a rosebush in a sewage plant.
RED_ROSE.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Puce Pink Lavatory</link>

YELLOW_TARTAR.DESC: Someone thought it'd be a good idea to have the outside match the inside.
YELLOW_TARTAR.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Ick Yellow Lavatory</link>

FLUSHTOILET.NAME: <link=\"FLUSHTOILET\">Lavatory</link>

FLYINGCREATUREBAIT.DESC: The type of critter attracted by critter bait depends on the construction material.
FLYINGCREATUREBAIT.EFFECT: Attracts one type of airborne critter.\n\nSingle use.
FLYINGCREATUREBAIT.NAME: <link=\"FLYINGCREATUREBAIT\">Airborne Critter Bait</link>

FOODDEHYDRATOR.DESC: Some of the eliminated liquid inevitably ends up on the floor.
FOODDEHYDRATOR.EFFECT: Uses low, even heat to eliminate moisture from eligible <link=\"FOOD\">Foods</link> and render them shelf-stable.\n\nDehydrated meals must be processed at the <link=\"FOODREHYDRATOR\">Rehydrator</link> before they can be eaten.
FOODDEHYDRATOR.NAME: <link=\"FOODDEHYDRATOR\">Dehydrator</link>
FOODDEHYDRATOR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION: Dehydrated portions of {0} do not require refrigeration.

FOODREHYDRATOR.DESC: Rehydrated food is nutritious and only slightly less delicious.
FOODREHYDRATOR.EFFECT: Restores moisture to convert shelf-stable packaged meals into edible <link=\"FOOD\">Food</link>.
FOODREHYDRATOR.NAME: <link=\"FOODREHYDRATOR\">Rehydrator</link>

FOSSILDIG.EFFECT: Contains a partial <link=\"FOSSIL\">Fossil</link> left behind by a giant critter.\n\nStudying the full skeleton could yield the information required to access a valuable new resource.
FOSSILDIG.NAME: Ancient Specimen

FOSSILDIG_COMPLETED.DESC: There sure are a lot of old bones in this area.
FOSSILDIG_COMPLETED.EFFECT: Contains a deep cache of harvestable <link=\"FOSSIL\">Fossils</link>.
FOSSILDIG_COMPLETED.NAME: <link=\"STORYTRAITFOSSILHUNT\">Fossil Quarry</link>

FOSSILSCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
FOSSILSCULPTURE.EFFECT: Majorly increases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.\n\nMust be sculpted by a Duplicant.
FOSSILSCULPTURE.NAME: <link=\"FOSSILSCULPTURE\">Fossil Block</link>

FOUNTAINPEN.DESCRIPTION: Cuts through red tape better than a sword ever could.
FOUNTAINPEN.LORE_DLC2: The handcrafted gold nib features a triangular logo with the letters V and I inside.\n\nIts owner was too proud to report it stolen, and would be shocked to learn of its whereabouts.
FOUNTAINPEN.NAME: Fountain Pen

GAMMARAYOVEN.EFFECT: Cooks a variety of <link=\"FOOD\">Foods</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
GAMMARAYOVEN.NAME: <link=\"GAMMARAYOVEN\">Gamma Ray Oven</link>

GANTRY.DESC: A gantry can be built over rocket pieces where ladders and tile cannot.
GANTRY.EFFECT: Provides scaffolding across rocket modules to allow Duplicant access.
GANTRY.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Extends gantry when a Green Signal signal is received
GANTRY.LOGIC_PORT_INACTIVE: Retracts gantry when a Red Signal signal is received
GANTRY.NAME: <link=\"GANTRY\">Gantry</link>

GASBOTTLER.DESC: Canisters allow Duplicants to manually deliver gases from place to place.
GASBOTTLER.EFFECT: Automatically stores piped <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gases</link> into canisters for manual transport.
GASBOTTLER.NAME: <link=\"GASBOTTLER\">Canister Filler</link>

GASCARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
GASCARGOBAY.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to store any <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.\n\nStored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
GASCARGOBAY.NAME: <link=\"GASCARGOBAY\">Gas Cargo Canister</link>

GASCARGOBAYCLUSTER.DESC: Holds more than a typical gas cargo canister.
GASCARGOBAYCLUSTER.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store most of the <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
GASCARGOBAYCLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"GASCARGOBAYCLUSTER\">Large Gas Cargo Canister</link>

GASCARGOBAYSMALL.DESC: Duplicants fill cargo canisters with any resources they find during space missions.
GASCARGOBAYSMALL.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store some of the <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
GASCARGOBAYSMALL.NAME: <link=\"GASCARGOBAYSMALL\">Gas Cargo Canister</link>

GASCONDUIT.DESC: Gas pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of ventilated buildings.
GASCONDUIT.EFFECT: Carries <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> between <link=\"GASPIPING\">Outputs</link> and <link=\"GASPIPING\">Intakes</link>.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
GASCONDUIT.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUIT\">Gas Pipe</link>

GASCONDUITBRIDGE.DESC: Separate pipe systems prevent mingled contents from causing building damage.
GASCONDUITBRIDGE.EFFECT: Runs one <link=\"GASPIPING\">Gas Pipe</link> section over another without joining them.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
GASCONDUITBRIDGE.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITBRIDGE\">Gas Bridge</link>

GASCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.DESC: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.
GASCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on the internal Germ count of the pipe.
GASCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the number of Germs in the pipe is within the selected range
GASCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITDISEASESENSOR\">Gas Pipe Germ Sensor</link>

GASCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.DESC: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific gas in a pipe.
GASCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal when the selected Gas is detected within a pipe.
GASCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the configured Gas is detected
GASCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR\">Gas Pipe Element Sensor</link>

GASCONDUITOVERFLOW.DESC: Overflow valves can be used to prioritize which buildings should receive precious resources first.
GASCONDUITOVERFLOW.EFFECT: Fills a secondary<link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> output only when its primary output is blocked.
GASCONDUITOVERFLOW.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITOVERFLOW\">Gas Overflow Valve</link>

GASCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW.DESC: Priority flows ensure important buildings are filled first when on a system with other buildings.
GASCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW.EFFECT: Diverts <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> to a secondary input when its primary input overflows.
GASCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW\">Priority Gas Flow</link>

GASCONDUITRADIANT.DESC: Radiant pipes pumping cold gas can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.
GASCONDUITRADIANT.EFFECT: Carries <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>, allowing extreme <link=\"HEAT\">Temperature</link> exchange with the surrounding environment.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
GASCONDUITRADIANT.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITRADIANT\">Radiant Gas Pipe</link>

GASCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.DESC: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their pipe contents reach a certain temperature.
GASCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when pipe contents enter the chosen Temperature range.
GASCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the contained Gas is within the selected Temperature range
GASCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.NAME: <link=\"GASCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR\">Gas Pipe Thermo Sensor</link>

GASFILTER.DESC: All gases are sent into the building's output pipe, except the gas chosen for filtering.
GASFILTER.EFFECT: Sieves one <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> from the air, sending it into a dedicated <link=\"GASPIPING\">Pipe</link>.
GASFILTER.NAME: <link=\"GASFILTER\">Gas Filter</link>

GASLIMITVALVE.DESC: Meter Valves let an exact amount of gas pass through before shutting off.
GASLIMITVALVE.EFFECT: Connects to an <link=\"LOGIC\">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> flow off when the specified amount has passed through it.
GASLIMITVALVE.NAME: <link=\"GASLIMITVALVE\">Gas Meter Valve</link>
GASLIMITVALVE.OUTPUT_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if limit has been reached

GASLOGICVALVE.DESC: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
GASLOGICVALVE.EFFECT: Connects to an <link=\"LOGIC\">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> flow on or off.
GASLOGICVALVE.NAME: <link=\"GASLOGICVALVE\">Gas Shutoff</link>

GASMINIPUMP.DESC: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of gas with minimum power.
GASMINIPUMP.EFFECT: Draws in a small amount of <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> and runs it through <link=\"GASPIPING\">Pipes</link>.\n\nMust be immersed in <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
GASMINIPUMP.NAME: <link=\"GASMINIPUMP\">Mini Gas Pump</link>

GASPERMEABLEMEMBRANE.DESC: Building with airflow tile promotes better gas circulation within a colony.
GASPERMEABLEMEMBRANE.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.\n\nBlocks <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> flow without obstructing <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
GASPERMEABLEMEMBRANE.NAME: <link=\"GASPERMEABLEMEMBRANE\">Airflow Tile</link>

GASPUMP.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.
GASPUMP.EFFECT: Draws in <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> and runs it through <link=\"GASPIPING\">Pipes</link>.\n\nMust be immersed in <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
GASPUMP.NAME: <link=\"GASPUMP\">Gas Pump</link>

GASRESERVOIR.DESC: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
GASRESERVOIR.EFFECT: Stores any <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> resources piped into it.

BLUE_BABYTEARS.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BLUE_BABYTEARS.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Weepy Blue Gas Reservoir</link>

DEFAULT_GASRESERVOIR.DESC: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
DEFAULT_GASRESERVOIR.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Gas Reservoir</link>

GREEN_MUSH.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
GREEN_MUSH.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Mush Green Gas Reservoir</link>

LIGHTCOBALT.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
LIGHTCOBALT.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Bluemoon Gas Reservoir</link>

LIGHTGOLD.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
LIGHTGOLD.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Golden Gas Reservoir</link>

PEAGREEN.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
PEAGREEN.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Greenpea Gas Reservoir</link>

POLKA_DARKNAVYNOOKGREEN.DESC: Safe gas storage doesn't have to be dull.
POLKA_DARKNAVYNOOKGREEN.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Party Dot Gas Reservoir</link>

POLKA_DARKPURPLERESIN.DESC: It sports the cheeriest of paint jobs. What a gas!
POLKA_DARKPURPLERESIN.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Mod Dot Gas Reservoir</link>

PURPLE_BRAINFAT.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
PURPLE_BRAINFAT.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Faint Purple Gas Reservoir</link>

RED_ROSE.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
RED_ROSE.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Puce Pink Gas Reservoir</link>

YELLOW_TARTAR.DESC: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
YELLOW_TARTAR.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Ick Yellow Gas Reservoir</link>

GASRESERVOIR.NAME: <link=\"GASRESERVOIR\">Gas Reservoir</link>

GASVALVE.DESC: Valves control the amount of gas that moves through pipes, preventing waste.
GASVALVE.NAME: <link=\"GASVALVE\">Gas Valve</link>

GASVENT.DESC: Vents are an exit point for gases from ventilation systems.
GASVENT.NAME: <link=\"GASVENT\">Gas Vent</link>

GASVENTHIGHPRESSURE.DESC: High pressure vents can expel gas into more highly pressurized environments.
GASVENTHIGHPRESSURE.EFFECT: Releases <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> from <link=\"GASPIPING\">Gas Pipes</link> into high pressure locations.
GASVENTHIGHPRESSURE.NAME: <link=\"GASVENTHIGHPRESSURE\">High Pressure Gas Vent</link>

GENERATOR.DESC: Burning coal produces more energy than manual power, but emits heat and exhaust.
GENERATOR.NAME: <link=\"GENERATOR\">Coal Generator</link>

GENERICFABRICATOR.DESC: Omniprinters are incapable of printing organic matter.
GENERICFABRICATOR.EFFECT: Converts <link=\"RAWMINERAL\">Raw Mineral</link> into unique materials and objects.
GENERICFABRICATOR.NAME: <link=\"GENERICFABRICATOR\">Omniprinter</link>

GENESHUFFLER.DESC: A massive synthetic brain, suspended in saline solution.\n\nThere is a chair attached to the device with room for one person.
GENESHUFFLER.NAME: Neural Vacillator

GENETICANALYSISSTATION.DESC: Would a mutated rose still smell as sweet?
GENETICANALYSISSTATION.NAME: <link=\"GENETICANALYSISSTATION\">Botanical Analyzer</link>

GEOTHERMALCONTROLLER.DESC: What comes out depends very much on the initial temperature of what goes in.
GEOTHERMALCONTROLLER.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link> from the planet's core to dramatically increase the temperature of <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> inputs.\n\nMaterials will be emitted at connected Geo Vents.
GEOTHERMALCONTROLLER.NAME: <link=\"GEOTHERMALCONTROLLER\">Geothermal Heat Pump</link>

GEOTHERMALVENT.BLOCKED_DESC: Blocked geo vents can be cleared by pumping in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">liquids</link> that are hot enough to melt <link=\"LEAD\">Lead</link>.
GEOTHERMALVENT.DESC: Geo vents must finish their current emission before accepting new materials.
GEOTHERMALVENT.EFFECT: Emits high-<link=\"HEAT\">temperature</link> materials received from the Geothermal Heat Pump.
GEOTHERMALVENT.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when geo vent has materials to emit
GEOTHERMALVENT.NAME: <link=\"GEOTHERMALVENT\">Geo Vent</link>

GEOTUNER.DESC: The targeted geyser receives stored amplification data when it is erupting.
GEOTUNER.EFFECT: Increases the <link=\"HEAT\">Temperature</link> and output of an analyzed <link=\"GEYSERS\">Geyser</link>.\n\nMultiple Geotuners can be directed at a single <link=\"GEYSERS\">Geyser</link> anywhere on an asteroid.
GEOTUNER.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when geyser is erupting
GEOTUNER.NAME: <link=\"GEOTUNER\">Geotuner</link>

GLASSFORGE.DESC: Glass can be used to construct window tile.
GLASSFORGE.EFFECT:
Produces <link="MOLTENGLASS">Molten Glass</link> from raw <link="SAND">Sand</link>.

Outputs <link="HEAT">High Temperature</link> <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
GLASSFORGE.NAME: <link=\"GLASSFORGE\">Glass Forge</link>

GLASSTILE.DESC: Window tiles provide a barrier against liquid and gas and are completely transparent.
GLASSTILE.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.\n\nAllows <link=\"LIGHT\">Light</link> and <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link> to pass through.
GLASSTILE.NAME: <link=\"GLASSTILE\">Window Tile</link>

GOURMETCOOKINGSTATION.DESC: Luxury meals increase Duplicants' morale and prevent them from becoming stressed.
GOURMETCOOKINGSTATION.EFFECT: Cooks a wide variety of quality <link=\"FOOD\">Foods</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
GOURMETCOOKINGSTATION.NAME: <link=\"GOURMETCOOKINGSTATION\">Gas Range</link>

GRAVE.DESC: Burying dead Duplicants reduces health hazards and stress on the colony.
GRAVE.EFFECT: Provides a final resting place for deceased Duplicants.\n\nLiving Duplicants will automatically place an unburied corpse inside.
GRAVE.NAME: <link=\"GRAVE\">Tasteful Memorial</link>

GRAVITASBATHROOMSTALL.EFFECT: A private toilet for senior scientists.\n\nIt was the site of many great scientific breakthroughs.
GRAVITASBATHROOMSTALL.NAME: Toilet

GRAVITASCONTAINER.EFFECT: A clothing storage unit.\n\nIt contains ultra-soft sleepwear.
GRAVITASCONTAINER.NAME: Pajama Cubby

GRAVITASCREATUREMANIPULATOR.EFFECT: An experimental DNA manipulator.\n\nAnalyzes <link=\"CREATURES\">Critters</link> to transform base morphs into random variants of their species.
GRAVITASCREATUREMANIPULATOR.NAME: <link=\"GRAVITASCREATUREMANIPULATOR\">Critter Flux-O-Matic</link>

GRAVITASDOOR.EFFECT: An office door to an office that no longer exists.
GRAVITASDOOR.NAME: Gravitas Door

GRAVITASLABLIGHT.EFFECT: An overhead light therapy lamp designed to soothe the minds.
GRAVITASLABLIGHT.NAME: LED Light

GRAVITASPEDESTAL.DESC: Perception can be drastically changed by a bit of thoughtful presentation.
GRAVITASPEDESTAL.EFFECT: Displays a single object, doubling its <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link> value.\n\nObjects with negative Decor will gain some positive Decor when displayed.
GRAVITASPEDESTAL.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Gravitas Pedestal</link>

GUNKEMPTIER.DESC: Bionic Duplicants are much more relaxed after a visit to the gunk extractor.
GUNKEMPTIER.EFFECT: Cleanses stale <link=\"LIQUIDGUNK\">Gunk</link> build-up from Duplicants' bionic parts.
GUNKEMPTIER.NAME: <link=\"GUNKEMPTIER\">Gunk Extractor</link>

HABITATMODULEMEDIUM.DESC: Allows Duplicants to survive space travel... Hopefully.
HABITATMODULEMEDIUM.EFFECT:
Functions as a Command Module.

Holds up to 10 Duplicant travellers.

One Command Module may be installed per rocket. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
HABITATMODULEMEDIUM.NAME: <link=\"HABITATMODULEMEDIUM\">Spacefarer Module</link>

HABITATMODULESMALL.DESC: One lucky Duplicant gets the best view from the whole rocket.
HABITATMODULESMALL.EFFECT:
Functions as a Command Module and a Nosecone.

Holds one Duplicant traveller.

One Command Module may be installed per rocket.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Must be built at the top of a rocket.
HABITATMODULESMALL.NAME: <link=\"HABITATMODULESMALL\">Solo Spacefarer Nosecone</link>

HANDSANITIZER.DESC: Hand sanitizers kill germs more effectively than wash basins.
HANDSANITIZER.EFFECT: Removes most <link=\"DISEASE\">Germs</link> from Duplicants.\n\nGerm-covered Duplicants use Hand Sanitizers when passing by in the selected direction.
HANDSANITIZER.NAME: <link=\"HANDSANITIZER\">Hand Sanitizer</link>

HEADQUARTERS.DESC: New Duplicants come out here, but thank goodness, they never go back in.
HEADQUARTERS.EFFECT: An exceptionally advanced bioprinter of unknown origin.\n\nIt periodically produces new Duplicants or care packages containing resources.
HEADQUARTERS.NAME: <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Printing Pod</link>

HEADQUARTERSCOMPLETE.NAME: <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Printing Pod</link>
HEADQUARTERSCOMPLETE.UNIQUE_POPTEXT: A clone of the cloning machine? What a novel thought.\n\nAlas, it won't work.

HEATCOMPRESSOR.EFFECT: Heats or cools <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> to match ambient <link=\"HEAT\">Air Temperature</link>.
HEATCOMPRESSOR.NAME: <link=\"HEATCOMPRESSOR\">Liquid Heatquilizer</link>

HEPBATTERY.DESC: Particles packed up and ready to go.
HEPBATTERY.EFFECT: Stores Radbolts in a high-energy state, ready for transport. Requires a Green Signal to release radbolts from storage when the Radbolt threshold is reached. Radbolts in storage will rapidly decay while this building is disabled.
HEPBATTERY.LOGIC_PORT_STORAGE_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when its Radbolt Storage is full
HEPBATTERY.NAME: <link=\"HEPBATTERY\">Radbolt Chamber</link>

HEPBRIDGETILE.DESC: Allows Radbolts to pass through walls.
HEPBRIDGETILE.EFFECT: Receives <link=\"RADIATION\">Radbolts</link> from <link=\"HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER\">Radbolt Generators</link> and directs them through walls. All other materials and elements will be blocked from passage.
HEPBRIDGETILE.NAME: <link=\"HEPBRIDGETILE\">Radbolt Joint Plate</link>

HEPENGINE.DESC: Radbolt-fueled rockets support few modules, but travel exceptionally far.
HEPENGINE.EFFECT:
Injects <link="RADIATION">Radbolts</link> into a reaction chamber to propel rockets for long-range space exploration.

Radbolt Engines are faster than <link="HYDROGENENGINE">Hydrogen Engines</link> but with a more restrictive height allowance.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
HEPENGINE.LOGIC_PORT_STORAGE_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when its Radbolt Storage is full
HEPENGINE.NAME: <link=\"HEPENGINE\">Radbolt Engine</link>

HIGHENERGYPARTICLEREDIRECTOR.DESC: We were all out of mirrors.
HIGHENERGYPARTICLEREDIRECTOR.EFFECT: Receives and redirects Radbolts from <link=\"HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER\">Radbolt Generators</link>.
HIGHENERGYPARTICLEREDIRECTOR.NAME: <link=\"HIGHENERGYPARTICLEREDIRECTOR\">Radbolt Reflector</link>

HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER.DESC: Radbolts are necessary for producing Materials Science research.
HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER.EFFECT:
Attracts nearby <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link> to generate Radbolts.

Emits generated Radbolts in the direction of your choosing when the set Radbolt threshold is reached.

Radbolts collected will gradually decay while this building is disabled.
HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER.NAME: <link=\"HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER\">Radbolt Generator</link>

HIGHWATTAGEWIRE.DESC: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.
HIGHWATTAGEWIRE.EFFECT: Carries more <link=\"POWER\">Wattage</link> than regular <link=\"WIRE\">Wire</link> without overloading.\n\nCannot be run through wall and floor tile.
HIGHWATTAGEWIRE.NAME: <link=\"HIGHWATTAGEWIRE\">Heavi-Watt Wire</link>

HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS.DESC: The access code required to reboot it for testing is located somewhere on this world.
HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS.EFFECT: An unsanctioned bioprinter that runs on power siphoned from the <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Printing Pod</link>.
HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS.NAME: <link=\"HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS\">Printerceptor</link>

HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS_COMPLETED.EFFECT: Intercepts and stores <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> charges from the <link=\"HEADQUARTERS\">Printing Pod</link>.\n\nConverts stored charges and <link=\"DATABANK\">Data Banks</link> into <link=\"CREATURES\">Seeds</link> and <link=\"CREATURES\">Eggs</link>.
HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS_COMPLETED.NAME: <link=\"HIJACKEDHEADQUARTERS\">Printerceptor</link>

HOTTUB.DESC: Relaxes Duplicants with massaging jets of heated liquid.
HOTTUB.EFFECT:
Requires <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link> to and from tub and <link="POWER">Power</link> to run the jets.

Water must be a comfortable temperature and will cool rapidly.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link> and leaves them feeling deliciously warm.
HOTTUB.NAME: <link=\"HOTTUB\">Hot Tub</link>
HOTTUB.TEMPERATURE_REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: The Hot Tub will only be usable if supplied with {temperature} {element}. If the {element} gets too cold, the Hot Tub will drain and require refilling with {element}.
HOTTUB.WATER_REQUIREMENT_TOOLTIP: This building must be filled with {amount} {element} in order to function.

HYDROGENENGINE.DESC: Hydrogen engines can propel rockets further than steam or petroleum engines.
HYDROGENENGINE.EFFECT:
Burns <link="LIQUIDHYDROGEN">Liquid Hydrogen</link> to propel rockets for long-range space exploration.

Hydrogen Engines have the same generous height restrictions as <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engines</link> but are slightly faster.

The engine must be built first before more rocket modules can be added.
HYDROGENENGINE.NAME: <link=\"HYDROGENENGINE\">Hydrogen Engine</link>

HYDROGENENGINECLUSTER.DESC: Hydrogen engines can propel rockets further than steam or petroleum engines.
HYDROGENENGINECLUSTER.EFFECT:
Burns <link="LIQUIDHYDROGEN">Liquid Hydrogen</link> to propel rockets for long-range space exploration.

Hydrogen Engines have the same generous height restrictions as <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engines</link> but are slightly faster.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>, and requires an oxidizer tank.

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
HYDROGENENGINECLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"HYDROGENENGINECLUSTER\">Hydrogen Engine</link>

HYDROGENGENERATOR.DESC: Hydrogen generators are extremely efficient, emitting next to no waste.
HYDROGENGENERATOR.NAME: <link=\"HYDROGENGENERATOR\">Hydrogen Generator</link>

HYDROPONICFARM.DESC: Hydroponic farms reduce Duplicant traffic by automating irrigating crops.
HYDROPONICFARM.EFFECT:
Grows one <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> from a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.

Must be irrigated through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Liquid Piping</link>.
HYDROPONICFARM.NAME: <link=\"HYDROPONICFARM\">Hydroponic Farm</link>

ICECOOLEDFAN.DESC: A Duplicant can work an Ice-E fan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.
ICECOOLEDFAN.EFFECT: Uses <link=\"ICEORE\">Ice</link> to dissipate a small amount of the <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link>.
ICECOOLEDFAN.NAME: <link=\"ICECOOLEDFAN\">Ice-E Fan</link>

ICEKETTLE.DESC: The water never gets hot enough to burn the tongue.
ICEKETTLE.EFFECT: Consumes <link=\"WOOD\">Wood</link> to melt <link=\"ICE\">Ice</link> into <link=\"WATER\">Water</link>, which can be bottled for transport.
ICEKETTLE.NAME: <link=\"ICEKETTLE\">Ice Liquefier</link>

ICEMACHINE.DESC: Ice makers can be used as a small renewable source of ice and snow.
ICEMACHINE.NAME: <link=\"ICEMACHINE\">Ice Maker</link>

ICESCULPTURE.EFFECT: Majorly increases <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link>, contributing to <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.\n\nMust be sculpted by a Duplicant.

ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_1.DESC: These incisors are the stuff of dental legend.
ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_1.NAME: <link=\"ICESCULPTUREAMAZING1\">Exquisite Chompers</link>

ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_2.DESC: A charming depiction of the mighty Pokeshell in mid-rampage.
ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_2.NAME: <link=\"ICESCULPTUREAMAZING2\">Frosty Crustacean</link>

ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_3.DESC: Some aquarists posit that Pacus are the original creators of the game now known as \"Tag.\"
ICESCULPTURE_AMAZING_3.NAME: <link=\"ICESCULPTUREAMAZING3\">The Chase</link>

ICESCULPTURE_CRAP.DESC: It's structurally unsound, but otherwise not entirely terrible.
ICESCULPTURE_CRAP.NAME: <link=\"ICESCULPTURECRAP\">Cubi I</link>

ICESCULPTURE.NAME: <link=\"ICESCULPTURE\">Ice Block</link>

INSULATEDDOOR.DESC: A slow-moving door that works best when it's closed.
INSULATEDDOOR.EFFECT: Significantly reduces <link=\"HEAT\">Temperature</link> exchange between climate-controlled rooms.
INSULATEDDOOR.NAME: <link=\"INSULATEDDOOR\">Insulated Door</link>

INSULATEDGASCONDUIT.DESC: Pipe insulation prevents gas contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.
INSULATEDGASCONDUIT.EFFECT: Carries <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> with minimal change in <link=\"HEAT\">Temperature</link>.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
INSULATEDGASCONDUIT.NAME: <link=\"INSULATEDGASCONDUIT\">Insulated Gas Pipe</link>

INSULATEDLIQUIDCONDUIT.DESC: Pipe insulation prevents liquid contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.
INSULATEDLIQUIDCONDUIT.EFFECT: Carries <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> with minimal change in <link=\"HEAT\">Temperature</link>.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
INSULATEDLIQUIDCONDUIT.NAME: <link=\"INSULATEDLIQUIDCONDUIT\">Insulated Liquid Pipe</link>

INSULATEDWIRE.DESC: This stuff won't go melting if things get heated.
INSULATEDWIRE.EFFECT: Connects buildings to <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> sources in extreme <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link>.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
INSULATEDWIRE.NAME: <link=\"INSULATEDWIRE\">Insulated Wire</link>

INSULATIONTILE.DESC: The low thermal conductivity of insulated tiles slows any heat passing through them.
INSULATIONTILE.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.\n\nReduces <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link> transfer between walls, retaining ambient heat in an area.
INSULATIONTILE.NAME: <link=\"INSULATIONTILE\">Insulated Tile</link>

ITEMPEDESTAL.DESC: Perception can be drastically changed by a bit of thoughtful presentation.
ITEMPEDESTAL.EFFECT: Displays a single object, doubling its <link=\"DECOR\">Decor</link> value.\n\nObjects with negative Decor will gain some positive Decor when displayed.

DEFAULT_ITEMPEDESTAL.DESC: Perception can be drastically changed by a bit of thoughtful presentation.
DEFAULT_ITEMPEDESTAL.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Pedestal</link>

HAND.DESC: This pedestal cradles precious objects in the palm of its hand.
HAND.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Hand of Dupe Pedestal</link>

ITEMPEDESTAL.NAME: <link=\"ITEMPEDESTAL\">Pedestal</link>

JETSUITLOCKER.DESC: Jet suit docks can refill jet suits with air and fuel, or empty them of waste.
JETSUITLOCKER.EFFECT:
Stores <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suits</link> and refuels them with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="COMBUSTIBLELIQUID">Combustible Liquid</link>.

Empties suits of <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.

Build next to a <link="JETSUITMARKER">Jet Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
JETSUITLOCKER.NAME: <link=\"JETSUITLOCKER\">Jet Suit Dock</link>

JETSUITMARKER.DESC: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
JETSUITMARKER.EFFECT:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suits</link>.

Must be built next to a <link="JETSUITLOCKER">Jet Suit Dock</link>.

Can be rotated before construction.
JETSUITMARKER.NAME: <link=\"JETSUITMARKER\">Jet Suit Checkpoint</link>

JUICER.DESC: Fruity juice can really brighten a Duplicant's breaktime
JUICER.EFFECT: Provides refreshment for Duplicants on their breaks.\n\nDrinking juice increases Duplicant <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.
JUICER.NAME: <link=\"JUICER\">Juicer</link>

KEROSENEENGINE.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
KEROSENEENGINE.EFFECT:
Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Petroleum Engines have generous height restrictions, ideal for hauling many modules.

The engine must be built first before more rocket modules can be added.
KEROSENEENGINE.NAME: <link=\"KEROSENEENGINE\">Petroleum Engine</link>

KEROSENEENGINECLUSTER.DESC: More powerful rocket engines can propel heavier burdens.
KEROSENEENGINECLUSTER.EFFECT:
Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Petroleum Engines have generous height restrictions, ideal for hauling many modules.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>, and requires an oxidizer tank. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
KEROSENEENGINECLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"KEROSENEENGINECLUSTER\">Petroleum Engine</link>

KEROSENEENGINECLUSTERSMALL.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
KEROSENEENGINECLUSTERSMALL.EFFECT:
Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Small Petroleum Engines possess the same speed as a <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engines</link> but have smaller height restrictions.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>, and requires an oxidizer tank.

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
KEROSENEENGINECLUSTERSMALL.NAME: <link=\"KEROSENEENGINECLUSTERSMALL\">Small Petroleum Engine</link>

KILN.EFFECT: Fires <link=\"CLAY\">Clay</link> to produce <link=\"CERAMIC\">Ceramic</link>, and <link=\"CARBON\">Coal</link> or <link=\"WOOD\">Wood</link> to produce <link=\"REFINEDCARBON\">Refined Carbon</link>.\n\nDuplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
KILN.NAME: <link=\"KILN\">Kiln</link>

LADDERBED.DESC: Duplicant's sleep will be interrupted if another Duplicant uses the ladder.
LADDERBED.EFFECT: Provides a sleeping area for one Duplicant and also functions as a ladder.\n\nDuplicants will automatically sleep in their assigned beds at night.
LADDERBED.NAME: <link=\"LADDERBED\">Ladder Bed</link>

LADDERFAST.DESC: Plastic ladders are mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.
LADDERFAST.NAME: <link=\"LADDERFAST\">Plastic Ladder</link>

LANDINGBEACON.DESC: Microtarget where your <link=\"RAILGUNPAYLOAD\">Interplanetary Payload</link> lands on a Planetoid surface.
LANDINGBEACON.EFFECT: Guides <link=\"RAILGUNPAYLOAD\">Interplanetary Payloads</link> and <link=\"ORBITALCARGOMODULE\">Orbital Cargo Modules</link> to land nearby.\n\n<link=\"RAILGUNPAYLOAD\">Interplanetary Payloads</link> must be launched from a <link=\"RAILGUN\">Interplanetary Launcher</link>.
LANDINGBEACON.NAME: <link=\"LANDINGBEACON\">Targeting Beacon</link>

LANDING_POD.EFFECT: Contains a Duplicant deployed from orbit.\n\nPod will disintegrate on arrival.
LANDING_POD.NAME: Spacefarer Deploy Pod

LARGEELECTROBANKDISCHARGER.DESC: It's basically its own power grid.
LARGEELECTROBANKDISCHARGER.EFFECT: Efficiently converts stored energy from <link=\"ELECTROBANK\">Power Banks</link> into power for connected buildings.
LARGEELECTROBANKDISCHARGER.NAME: <link=\"LARGEELECTROBANKDISCHARGER\">Large Discharger</link>

LAUNCHPAD.DESC: A platform from which rockets can be launched and on which they can land.
LAUNCHPAD.EFFECT:
Precursor to construction of all other Rocket modules.

Allows Rockets to launch from or land on the host Planetoid.

Automatically links up to <link="MODULARLAUNCHPADPORTSOLID">Rocket Port</link><link="MODULARLAUNCHPADPORTSOLID">s</link> built to either side of the platform.
LAUNCHPAD.LOGIC_PORT_LANDED_ROCKET_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket is on the <link=\"LAUNCHPAD\">Rocket Platform</link>
LAUNCHPAD.LOGIC_PORT_READY_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket is ready for flight
LAUNCHPAD.NAME: <link=\"LAUNCHPAD\">Rocket Platform</link>

LEADSUITLOCKER.DESC: Lead suit docks can refill lead suits with air and empty them of waste.
LEADSUITLOCKER.EFFECT:
Stores <link="LEADSUIT">Lead Suits</link> and refuels them with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Empties suits of <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.

Build next to a <link="LEADSUITMARKER">Lead Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
LEADSUITLOCKER.NAME: <link=\"LEADSUITLOCKER\">Lead Suit Dock</link>

LEADSUITMARKER.DESC: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
LEADSUITMARKER.EFFECT:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="LEADSUIT">Lead Suits</link>.

Must be built next to a <link="LEADSUITLOCKER">Lead Suit Dock</link>

Can be rotated before construction.
LEADSUITMARKER.NAME: <link=\"LEADSUITMARKER\">Lead Suit Checkpoint</link>

LIQUIDBOTTLER.DESC: Bottle fillers allow Duplicants to manually deliver liquids from place to place.
LIQUIDBOTTLER.EFFECT: Automatically stores piped <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquids</link> into bottles for manual transport.
LIQUIDBOTTLER.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDBOTTLER\">Bottle Filler</link>

LIQUIDCARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
LIQUIDCARGOBAY.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to store any <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.\n\nStored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
LIQUIDCARGOBAY.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCARGOBAY\">Liquid Cargo Tank</link>

LIQUIDCARGOBAYCLUSTER.DESC: Holds more than a regular cargo tank.
LIQUIDCARGOBAYCLUSTER.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store most of the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
LIQUIDCARGOBAYCLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCARGOBAYCLUSTER\">Large Liquid Cargo Tank</link>

LIQUIDCARGOBAYSMALL.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo tanks with whatever resources they find during space missions.
LIQUIDCARGOBAYSMALL.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store some of the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
LIQUIDCARGOBAYSMALL.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCARGOBAYSMALL\">Liquid Cargo Tank</link>

LIQUIDCONDITIONER.DESC: A thermo aquatuner cools liquid and outputs the heat elsewhere.
LIQUIDCONDITIONER.EFFECT: Cools the <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> piped through it, but outputs <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link> in its immediate vicinity.
LIQUIDCONDITIONER.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDITIONER\">Thermo Aquatuner</link>

LIQUIDCONDUIT.DESC: Liquid pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of plumbed buildings.
LIQUIDCONDUIT.EFFECT: Carries <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> between <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Outputs</link> and <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Intakes</link>.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
LIQUIDCONDUIT.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUIT\">Liquid Pipe</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITBRIDGE.DESC: Separate pipe systems help prevent building damage caused by mingled pipe contents.
LIQUIDCONDUITBRIDGE.EFFECT: Runs one <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Liquid Pipe</link> section over another without joining them.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
LIQUIDCONDUITBRIDGE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITBRIDGE\">Liquid Bridge</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.DESC: Germ sensors can help control automation behavior in the presence of germs.
LIQUIDCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on the internal Germ count of the pipe.
LIQUIDCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the number of Germs in the pipe is within the selected range
LIQUIDCONDUITDISEASESENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITDISEASESENSOR\">Liquid Pipe Germ Sensor</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.DESC: Element sensors can be used to detect the presence of a specific liquid in a pipe.
LIQUIDCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal when the selected Liquid is detected within a pipe.
LIQUIDCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the configured Liquid is detected within the pipe
LIQUIDCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITELEMENTSENSOR\">Liquid Pipe Element Sensor</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITOVERFLOW.DESC: Overflow valves can be used to prioritize which buildings should receive precious resources first.
LIQUIDCONDUITOVERFLOW.EFFECT: Fills a secondary<link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> output only when its primary output is blocked.
LIQUIDCONDUITOVERFLOW.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITOVERFLOW\">Liquid Overflow Valve</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW.DESC: Priority flows ensure important buildings are filled first when on a system with other buildings.
LIQUIDCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW.EFFECT: Diverts <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> to a secondary input when its primary input overflows.
LIQUIDCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITPREFERENTIALFLOW\">Priority Liquid Flow</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITRADIANT.DESC: Radiant pipes pumping cold liquid can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.
LIQUIDCONDUITRADIANT.EFFECT: Carries <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>, allowing extreme <link=\"HEAT\">Temperature</link> exchange with the surrounding environment.\n\nCan be run through wall and floor tile.
LIQUIDCONDUITRADIANT.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITRADIANT\">Radiant Liquid Pipe</link>

LIQUIDCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.DESC: Thermo sensors disable buildings when their pipe contents reach a certain temperature.
LIQUIDCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when pipe contents enter the chosen Temperature range.
LIQUIDCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the contained Liquid is within the selected Temperature range
LIQUIDCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCONDUITTEMPERATURESENSOR\">Liquid Pipe Thermo Sensor</link>

LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN.DESC: A Duplicant can work a hydrofan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.
LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN.EFFECT: Dissipates a small amount of the <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link>.
LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN\">Hydrofan</link>

LIQUIDFILTER.DESC: All liquids are sent into the building's output pipe, except the liquid chosen for filtering.
LIQUIDFILTER.EFFECT: Sieves one <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> out of a mix, sending it into a dedicated <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Filtered Output Pipe</link>.\n\nCan only filter one liquid type at a time.
LIQUIDFILTER.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDFILTER\">Liquid Filter</link>

LIQUIDFUELTANK.DESC: Storing additional fuel increases the distance a rocket can travel before returning.
LIQUIDFUELTANK.EFFECT: Stores the <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> fuel piped into it to supply rocket engines.\n\nThe stored fuel type is determined by the rocket engine it is built upon.
LIQUIDFUELTANK.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDFUELTANK\">Liquid Fuel Tank</link>

LIQUIDFUELTANKCLUSTER.DESC: Storing additional fuel increases the distance a rocket can travel before returning.
LIQUIDFUELTANKCLUSTER.EFFECT:
Stores the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> fuel piped into it to supply rocket engines.

The stored fuel type is determined by the rocket engine it is built upon. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
LIQUIDFUELTANKCLUSTER.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDFUELTANKCLUSTER\">Large Liquid Fuel Tank</link>

LIQUIDHEATER.DESC: Tepidizers heat liquid which can kill waterborne germs.
LIQUIDHEATER.EFFECT: Warms large bodies of <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.\n\nMust be fully submerged.
LIQUIDHEATER.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDHEATER\">Liquid Tepidizer</link>

LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.DESC: Meter Valves let an exact amount of liquid pass through before shutting off.
LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.EFFECT: Connects to an <link=\"LOGIC\">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> flow off when the specified amount has passed through it.
LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDLIMITVALVE\">Liquid Meter Valve</link>
LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.OUTPUT_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if limit has been reached

LIQUIDLOGICVALVE.DESC: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
LIQUIDLOGICVALVE.EFFECT: Connects to an <link=\"LOGIC\">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> flow on or off.
LIQUIDLOGICVALVE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDLOGICVALVE\">Liquid Shutoff</link>

LIQUIDMINIPUMP.DESC: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of liquid with minimum power.
LIQUIDMINIPUMP.EFFECT: Draws in a small amount of <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Pipes</link>.\n\nMust be submerged in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.
LIQUIDMINIPUMP.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDMINIPUMP\">Mini Liquid Pump</link>

LIQUIDPUMP.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.
LIQUIDPUMP.EFFECT: Draws in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link=\"LIQUIDPIPING\">Pipes</link>.\n\nMust be submerged in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.
LIQUIDPUMP.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDPUMP\">Liquid Pump</link>

LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION.DESC: Pitcher pumps allow Duplicants to bottle and deliver liquids from place to place.
LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION.EFFECT: Manually pumps <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> into bottles for transport.\n\nDuplicants can only carry liquids that are bottled.
LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION\">Pitcher Pump</link>

LIQUIDRESERVOIR.DESC: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
LIQUIDRESERVOIR.EFFECT: Stores any <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> resources piped into it.
LIQUIDRESERVOIR.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDRESERVOIR\">Liquid Reservoir</link>

LIQUIDVALVE.DESC: Valves control the amount of liquid that moves through pipes, preventing waste.
LIQUIDVALVE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDVALVE\">Liquid Valve</link>

LIQUIDVENT.DESC: Vents are an exit point for liquids from plumbing systems.
LIQUIDVENT.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDVENT\">Liquid Vent</link>

LOGICALARM.DESC: Sends a notification when it receives a Green Signal.
LOGICALARM.EFFECT: Attach to sensors to send a notification when certain conditions are met.\n\nNotifications can be customized.
LOGICALARM.NAME: <link=\"LOGICALARM\">Automated Notifier</link>

LOGICCLUSTERLOCATIONSENSOR.DESC: Starmap Location sensors can signal when a spacecraft is at a certain location
LOGICCLUSTERLOCATIONSENSOR.EFFECT: Send Green Signals at the chosen Starmap locations and Red Signals everywhere else.
LOGICCLUSTERLOCATIONSENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signalwhen a spacecraft is at the chosen Starmap locations
LOGICCLUSTERLOCATIONSENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LOGICCLUSTERLOCATIONSENSOR\">Starmap Location Sensor</link>

LOGICCOUNTER.DESC: For numbers higher than ten connect multiple counters together.
LOGICCOUNTER.EFFECT: Counts how many times a Green Signal has been received up to a chosen number.\n\nWhen the chosen number is reached it sends a Green Signal until it receives another Green Signal, when it resets automatically and begins counting again.
LOGICCOUNTER.NAME: <link=\"LOGICCOUNTER\">Signal Counter</link>
LOGICCOUNTER.OUTPUT_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal when the counter matches the selected value

LOGICCRITTERCOUNTSENSOR.DESC: Detecting critter populations can help adjust their automated feeding and care regimens.
LOGICCRITTERCOUNTSENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on the number of eggs and critters in a room.
LOGICCRITTERCOUNTSENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the number of Critters and Eggs in the Room is greater than the selected threshold.
LOGICCRITTERCOUNTSENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LOGICCRITTERCOUNTSENSOR\">Critter Sensor</link>

LOGICDISEASESENSOR.DESC: Detecting germ populations can help block off or clean up dangerous areas.
LOGICDISEASESENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on quantity of surrounding Germs.
LOGICDISEASESENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal if the number of Germs is within the selected range
LOGICDISEASESENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LOGICDISEASESENSOR\">Germ Sensor</link>

LOGICDUPLICANTSENSOR.DESC: Motion sensors save power by only enabling buildings when Duplicants are nearby.
LOGICDUPLICANTSENSOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal based on whether a Duplicant is in the sensor's range.
LOGICDUPLICANTSENSOR.LOGIC_PORT_ACTIVE: Sends a Green Signal while a Duplicant is in the sensor's tile range
LOGICDUPLICANTSENSOR.NAME: <link=\"LOGICDUPLICANTSENSOR\">Duplicant Motion Sensor</link>

LOGICELEMENTSENSORGAS.DESC: These sensors can detect the presence of a specific gas and alter systems accordingly.
