SOREBACK.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant feels achy from sleeping on the floor last night and would like a bed

SPACEBUZZ.NAME: Thrilling Flight
SPACEBUZZ.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is getting a real adrenaline rush from being in space!

SPACETOURIST.NAME: Visited Space
SPACETOURIST.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant went on a trip to space and saw the wonders of the universe

STALEFOOD.NAME: Bad leftovers
STALEFOOD.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is in a bad mood from having to eat stale <style=\"KKeyword\">Food</style>

STARRYEYED.NAME: Starry Eyed
STARRYEYED.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant loves being in space!

STARVING.NAME: Starving
STARVING.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant needs to eat something, soon

STEPPEDINCONTAMINATEDWATER.NAME: Stepped in polluted water
STEPPEDINCONTAMINATEDWATER.TOOLTIP: Gross! This Duplicant stepped in something yucky

STRESSED_BY_COLD_WATER.CAUSE: Obtained by exposure to icy water
STRESSED_BY_COLD_WATER.NAME: Numb
STRESSED_BY_COLD_WATER.TOOLTIP: Brr! This Duplicant was showered or doused in water that was way too cold

STRESSFULYEMPTYINGBLADDER.NAME: Making a mess
STRESSFULYEMPTYINGBLADDER.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant had no choice but to empty their <style=\"KKeyword\">Bladder</style>

STRESSREDUCTION.NAME: Receiving Massage
STRESSREDUCTION.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant's <style=\"KKeyword\">Stress</style> is just melting away

STRESSREDUCTION_CLINIC.NAME: Receiving Clinic Massage
STRESSREDUCTION_CLINIC.TOOLTIP: Clinical facilities are improving the effectiveness of this massage\n\nThis Duplicant's <style=\"KKeyword\">Stress</style> is just melting away

STRESSSHOCKER.NAME: Shocking Temper
STRESSSHOCKER.NOTIFICATION_TOOLTIP: These Duplicants became so <link=\"STRESS\">Stressed</link> they began emitting electrical zaps:
STRESSSHOCKER.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is short-circuiting as a result of <style=\"KKeyword\">Stress</style>

SUDDENMORALEHELPER.NAME: Morale Upgrade Helper
SUDDENMORALEHELPER.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant will receive a temporary <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style> bonus to buffer the new <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style> system introduction

SUNLIGHT_BURNING.NAME: Intensely Bright
SUNLIGHT_BURNING.TOOLTIP: The bright <style=\"KKeyword\">Light</style> is significantly improving this Duplicant's mood, but prolonged exposure may result in burning

SUNLIGHT_PLEASANT.NAME: Bright and Cheerful
SUNLIGHT_PLEASANT.TOOLTIP: The strong natural <style=\"KKeyword\">Light</style> is making this Duplicant feel light on their feet

TELEPHONEBABBLE.NAME: Less Anxious
TELEPHONEBABBLE.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant got some things off their chest by talking to themselves on the phone\n\nLeisure activities increase Duplicants' <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style>

TELEPHONECHAT.NAME: Full of Gossip
TELEPHONECHAT.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant chatted on the phone with at least one other Duplicant\n\nLeisure activities increase Duplicants' <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style>

TELEPHONELONGDISTANCE.NAME: Sociable
TELEPHONELONGDISTANCE.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is feeling sociable after chatting on the phone with someone across space\n\nLeisure activities increase Duplicants' <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style>

TERRIBLESLEEP.NAME: Dead Tired: Snoring Friend
TERRIBLESLEEP.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant didn't get any shuteye last night because of all the racket from a friend's snoring

THRIVER.NAME: Clutchy
THRIVER.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is <style=\"KKeyword\">Stressed</style> and has kicked into hyperdrive

TOOKABREAK.NAME: Downtime
TOOKABREAK.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant has a bit of time off from work to attend to personal matters

UGLY_CRYING.NAME: Ugly Crying
UGLY_CRYING.NOTIFICATION_TOOLTIP: These Duplicants became so <link=\"STRESS\">Stressed</link> they broke down crying:
UGLY_CRYING.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is having a cathartic ugly cry as a result of <style=\"KKeyword\">Stress</style>

UNCOMFORTABLEFEET.CAUSE: This Duplicant got so good at their job that their feet became sensitive
UNCOMFORTABLEFEET.NAME: Aching Feet
UNCOMFORTABLEFEET.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant recently walked across floor without tile, much to their chagrin

UNCOMFORTABLESLEEP.NAME: Sleeping Uncomfortably
UNCOMFORTABLESLEEP.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant collapsed on the floor from sheer exhaustion

UNFASHIONABLECLOTHING.CAUSE: This Duplicant got so good at their job that they became incapable of tolerating unfashionable clothing
UNFASHIONABLECLOTHING.NAME: Fashion Crime
UNFASHIONABLECLOTHING.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant had to wear something that was an affront to fashion

VERTICALWINDTUNNEL.NAME: Wind Swept
VERTICALWINDTUNNEL.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant recently had an exhilarating wind tunnel experience\n\nLeisure activities increase Duplicants' <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style>

VERTICALWINDTUNNELFLYING.NAME: Airborne
VERTICALWINDTUNNELFLYING.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is having an exhilarating time in the wind tunnel\n\nWhoosh!

VERTIGO.CAUSE: This Duplicant got so good at their job they became bad at ladders
VERTIGO.NAME: Vertigo
VERTIGO.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant had to climb a tall ladder that left them dizzy and unsettled

VOMITING.NAME: Vomiting
VOMITING.TOOLTIP: Better out than in, as they say

WAILEDAT.NAME: Disturbed by Wailing
WAILEDAT.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is feeling <style=\"KKeyword\">Stressed</style> by someone's Banshee Wail

WARMINGUP.NAME: Warming Up
WARMINGUP.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is trying to warm back up

WARMTOUCH.NAME: Frost Resistant
WARMTOUCH.PROVIDERS_TOOLTIP: Using this building provides temporary immunity to <style=\"KKeyword\">Chilly Surroundings</style> and <style=\"KKeyword\">Soggy Feet</style>
WARMTOUCH.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant recently visited a warming station, sauna, or hot tub\n\nThey are impervious to <style=\"KKeyword\">Chilly Surroundings</style> and <style=\"KKeyword\">Soggy Feet</style> as a result

WARMTOUCHFOOD.CAUSE: Obtained by eating a very spicy meal
WARMTOUCHFOOD.DESCRIPTION: Eating this provides temporary immunity to <style=\"KKeyword\">Chilly Surroundings</style> and <style=\"KKeyword\">Soggy Feet</style>
WARMTOUCHFOOD.NAME: Frost Resistant: Spicy Diet
WARMTOUCHFOOD.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant ate spicy food and feels so warm inside that they don't even notice the cold right now

WASATTACKED.NAME: Recently assailed
WASATTACKED.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is stressed out after having been attacked

WELLFED.NAME: Well fed
WELLFED.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant feels satisfied after having a big meal

WORKENCOURAGED.NAME: Appreciated
WORKENCOURAGED.TOOLTIP: Someone saw how hard this Duplicant was working and gave them a compliment\n\nThis Duplicant feels great about themselves now!

WORKING.NAME: Working
WORKING.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant is working up a sweat

ZOMBIESICKNESSRECOVERY.NAME: Zombie Spores Antibodies
ZOMBIESICKNESSRECOVERY.TOOLTIP: This Duplicant recently recovered from <link=\"ZOMBIESICKNESS\">Zombie Spores</link> and is temporarily immune to the <style=\"KKeyword\">Disease</style>

DECOR.EXPECTATION_TOOLTIP: Most objects have Decor values that alter Duplicants' opinions of their surroundings.\nThis Duplicant desires Decor values of {0} or higher, and becomes Stressed in areas with lower Decor.
DECOR.NAME: Decor Expectation

FOOD_QUALITY.EXPECTATION_TOOLTIP: Each Duplicant has a minimum quality of <style=\"KKeyword\">Food</style> they'll tolerate eating.\nThis Duplicant desires <b>Tier {0}<b> or better <style=\"KKeyword\">Food</style>, and becomes <style=\"KKeyword\">Stressed</style> when they eat meals of lower quality.
FOOD_QUALITY.FOODQUALITY_EXPECTATION: \nThis Duplicant is content to eat Food with a Food Quality of {0} or higher
FOOD_QUALITY.NAME: Food Quality

QUALITYOFLIFE.EXPECTATION_TOOLTIP: The more responsibilities and stressors a Duplicant has, the more they will desire additional leisure time and improved amenities.\n\nFailing to keep a Duplicant's <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale</style> at or above their <style=\"KKeyword\">Morale Need</style> means they will not be able to unwind, causing them <style=\"KKeyword\">Stress</style> over time.
QUALITYOFLIFE.NAME: Morale Requirements

ABE.DESC: {0}s are sweet, delicate flowers. They need to be treated gingerly, with great consideration for their feelings.
ABE.NAME: Abe

ADA.DESC: {0}s enjoy writing poetry in their downtime. Dark poetry.
ADA.NAME: Ada

AMARI.DESC: {0}s likes to keep the peace. Ironically, they're a riot at parties.
AMARI.NAME: Amari

ARI.DESC: {0}s tend to space out from time to time, but they always pay attention when it counts.
ARI.NAME: Ari

ASHKAN.DESC: {0}s have what can only be described as a \"seriously infectious giggle\".
ASHKAN.NAME: Ashkan

BANHI.DESC: The \"cool loner\" vibes that radiate off a {0} never fail to make the colony swoon.
BANHI.NAME: Banhi

BUBBLES.DESC: This {0} is constantly challenging others to fight her, regardless of whether or not she can actually take them.
BUBBLES.NAME: Bubbles

BURT.DESC: This {0} always feels great after a bubble bath and a good long cry.
BURT.NAME: Burt

CAMILLE.DESC: This {0} loves anything that makes her feel nostalgic, including things that haven't aged well.
CAMILLE.NAME: Camille

CATALINA.DESC: A {0} is admired by all for her seemingly tireless work ethic. Little do people know, she's dying on the inside.
CATALINA.NAME: Catalina

CHIP.DESC: This {0} is extremely good at guessing their friends' passwords.
CHIP.NAME: Chip

DEVON.DESC: This {0} dreams of owning their own personal computer so they can start a blog full of pictures of toast.
DEVON.NAME: Devon

EDWIREDO.DESC: This {0} once rolled his eye so hard that he powered himself off and on again.
EDWIREDO.NAME: Edwiredo

ELLIE.DESC: Nothing makes an {0} happier than a big tin of glitter and a pack of unicorn stickers.
ELLIE.NAME: Ellie

FRANKIE.DESC: There's nothing {0}s are more proud of than their thick, dignified eyebrows.
FRANKIE.NAME: Frankie

FREYJA.DESC: This {0} has never stopped anyone from eating yellow snow.
FREYJA.NAME: Freyja

GIZMO.DESC: {0}s love nothing more than a big juicy info dump.
GIZMO.NAME: Gizmo

GOSSMANN.DESC: {0}s are major goofballs who can make anyone laugh.
GOSSMANN.NAME: Gossmann

HAROLD.DESC: Get a bunch of {0}s together in a room, and you'll have... a bunch of {0}s together in a room.
HAROLD.NAME: Harold

HASSAN.DESC: If someone says something nice to a {0} he'll think about it nonstop for no less than three weeks.
HASSAN.NAME: Hassan

HIGBY.DESC: This {0}'s got a song in his heart. Now if only he could remember how it goes.
HIGBY.NAME: Higby

JEAN.DESC: Just because {0}s are a little slow doesn't mean they can't suffer from soul-crushing existential crises.
JEAN.NAME: Jean

JORGE.DESC: {0} loves his new colony, even if their collective body odor makes his eyes water.
JORGE.NAME: Jorge

JOSHUA.DESC: {0}s are precious goobers. Other Duplicants are strangely incapable of cursing in a {0}'s presence.
JOSHUA.NAME: Joshua

LEIRA.DESC: {0}s just want everyone to be happy.
LEIRA.NAME: Leira

LIAM.DESC: No matter how much this {0} scrubs, he can never truly feel clean.
LIAM.NAME: Liam

LINDSAY.DESC: A {0} is a charming woman, unless you make the mistake of messing with one of her friends.
LINDSAY.NAME: Lindsay

MAE.DESC: There's nothing a {0} can't do if she sets her mind to it.
MAE.NAME: Mae

MARIE.DESC: This {0} is positively glowing! What's her secret? Radioactive isotopes, of course.
MARIE.NAME: Marie

MAX.DESC: At any given moment a {0} is viscerally reliving ten different humiliating memories.
MAX.NAME: Max

MAYA.DESC: This {0} got her hand crushed in a pneumatic door once. It was the most alive she's ever felt.
MAYA.NAME: Maya

MEEP.DESC: {0}s have a face only a two tonne Printing Pod could love.
MEEP.NAME: Meep

MIMA.DESC: Ol' {0} here can't stand lookin' at people's knees.
MIMA.NAME: Mi-Ma

NAILS.DESC: People often expect a Duplicant named \"{0}\" to be tough, but they're all pretty huge wimps.
NAILS.NAME: Nails

NIKOLA.DESC: This {0} once claimed he could build a laser so powerful it would rip the colony in half. No one asked him to prove it.
NIKOLA.NAME: Nikola

NISBET.DESC: This {0} likes to punch people to show her affection. Everyone's too afraid of her to tell her it hurts.
NISBET.NAME: Nisbet

OTTO.DESC: {0}s always insult people by accident and generally exist in a perpetual state of deep regret.
OTTO.NAME: Otto

PEI.DESC: Every {0} spends at least half the day pretending that they remember what they came into this room for.
PEI.NAME: Pei

QUINN.DESC: This {0}'s favorite genre of music is \"festive power ballad\".
QUINN.NAME: Quinn

REN.DESC: Every {0} has this unshakable feeling that his life's already happened and he's just watching it unfold from a memory.
REN.NAME: Ren

ROWAN.DESC: {0}s have exceptionally large hearts and express their emotions most efficiently by yelling.
ROWAN.NAME: Rowan

RUBY.DESC: This {0} asks the pressing questions, like \"Where can I get a leather jacket in space?\"
RUBY.NAME: Ruby

SENA.DESC: {0}s only care about three things: gold accents, true crime, and the advancement of nuclear physics.
SENA.NAME: Sena

SONYAR.DESC: {0}s would sooner burn down the colony than read an instruction manual.
SONYAR.NAME: Sonyar

STEELA.DESC: {0}s aren't programmed to put up with nonsense, but they do enjoy the occasional shenanigan.
STEELA.NAME: Steela

STEVE.DESC: This {0} is convinced that he has psychic powers. And he knows exactly what his friends think about that.

GREASEMONKEY.DESC: This Duplicant likes to throw a wrench into the colony's plans... in a good way
GREASEMONKEY.NAME: Grease Monkey

GREENTHUMB.DESC: This Duplicant regards every plant as a potential friend
GREENTHUMB.NAME: Green Thumb

HAPPYSINGER.DESC: This Duplicant belts out catchy tunes when they are <style=\"KKeyword\">Overjoyed</style>
HAPPYSINGER.NAME: Yodeler

HEMOPHOBIA.DESC: This Duplicant is of delicate disposition and cannot tend to the sick
HEMOPHOBIA.NAME: Squeamish

INTERIORDECORATOR.DESC: \"Move it a little to the left...\"
INTERIORDECORATOR.NAME: Interior Decorator

IRONGUT.DESC: This Duplicant can eat just about anything without getting sick
IRONGUT.NAME: Iron Gut
IRONGUT.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: Eating food contaminated with <link=\"FOODSICKNESS\">Food Poisoning</link> Germs will not affect this Duplicant

IRRITABLEBOWEL.DESC: This Duplicant needs a little extra time to \"do their business\"
IRRITABLEBOWEL.NAME: Irritable Bowel

LONER.NAME: Loner
LONER.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: Only Duplicant on a world: +4 bonus to all Attributes

MACHINERYDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant always invites friends over just to make them hook up their electronics
MACHINERYDOWN.NAME: Luddite

METEORPHILE.DESC: Meteor showers get this Duplicant really, really hyped
METEORPHILE.EXTENDED_DESC: • During meteor showers: {0} bonus to all Attributes
METEORPHILE.NAME: Rock Fan
METEORPHILE.SHORT_DESC: Gains Attribute bonuses during meteor showers.
METEORPHILE.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: During meteor showers: +3 bonus to all Attributes

MOLEHANDS.DESC: They're great for tunneling, but finding good gloves is a nightmare
MOLEHANDS.NAME: Mole Hands

MOUTHBREATHER.DESC: This Duplicant sucks up way more than their fair share of <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link>
MOUTHBREATHER.NAME: Mouth Breather

NARCOLEPSY.DESC: This Duplicant can and will fall asleep anytime, anyplace
NARCOLEPSY.NAME: Narcoleptic
NARCOLEPSY.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: This Duplicant's work will be periodically interrupted by naps

CLAUSTROPHOBIC.DESC: This Duplicant feels suffocated in spaces fewer than four tiles high or three tiles wide
CLAUSTROPHOBIC.NAME: Claustrophobic

CLIMACOPHOBIC.DESC: Climbing ladders more than four tiles tall makes this Duplicant's stomach do flips
CLIMACOPHOBIC.NAME: Vertigo Prone

FASHIONABLE.DESC: This Duplicant dies a bit inside when forced to wear unstylish clothing
FASHIONABLE.NAME: Fashionista

PREFERSCOOLER.DESC: This Duplicant has some extra <style=\"KKeyword\">Insulation</style>, so the room <style=\"KKeyword\">Temperature</style> affects them a little less
PREFERSCOOLER.NAME: Pudgy

PREFERSWARMER.DESC: This Duplicant doesn't have much <style=\"KKeyword\">Insulation</style>, so they are more <style=\"KKeyword\">Temperature</style> sensitive than others
PREFERSWARMER.NAME: Skinny

SENSITIVEFEET.DESC: This Duplicant is a sensitive sole and would rather walk on tile than raw bedrock
SENSITIVEFEET.NAME: Delicate Feetsies

SOLITARYSLEEPER.DESC: This Duplicant prefers to sleep alone
SOLITARYSLEEPER.NAME: Solitary Sleeper

WORKAHOLIC.DESC: This Duplicant gets antsy when left idle
WORKAHOLIC.NAME: Workaholic

NIGHTLIGHT.DESC: This Duplicant will imagine scary shapes in the dark all night if no one leaves a light on
NIGHTLIGHT.NAME: Nyctophobic
NIGHTLIGHT.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: This Duplicant can't sleep in complete darkness

NIGHTOWL.DESC: This Duplicant does their best work when they'd ought to be sleeping
NIGHTOWL.EXTENDED_DESC: • Nighttime: {0} bonus to all Attributes\n• Duration: All Night
NIGHTOWL.NAME: Night Owl
NIGHTOWL.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: Nighttime: +3 bonus to all Attributes\n• Duration: All Night

NOODLEARMS.DESC: This Duplicant's arms have all the tensile strength of overcooked linguine
NOODLEARMS.NAME: Noodle Arms

RADIATIONEATER.DESC: This Duplicant eats radiation for breakfast (and dinner)
RADIATIONEATER.NAME: Radiation Eater

RANCHINGDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant just doesn't trust those beady little eyes
RANCHINGDOWN.NAME: Critter Aversion

RANCHINGUP.DESC: The fuzzy snoots! The little claws! The chitinous exoskeletons! This Duplicant's never met a critter they didn't like
RANCHINGUP.NAME: Animal Lover

REGENERATION.DESC: This robust Duplicant is constantly regenerating health
REGENERATION.NAME: Regenerative

ROBODANCER.DESC: This Duplicant breaks into dance when they are <style=\"KKeyword\">Overjoyed</style>
ROBODANCER.NAME: Flash Mobber

ROCKCRUSHER.DESC: This Duplicant's got muscles on their muscles!
ROCKCRUSHER.NAME: Beefsteak

SIMPLETASTES.DESC: This Duplicant could lick a Puft's backside and taste nothing
SIMPLETASTES.NAME: Shrivelled Tastebuds

SLOWLEARNER.DESC: This Duplicant's a little slow on the uptake, but gosh do they try
SLOWLEARNER.NAME: Slow Learner

SMALLBLADDER.DESC: This Duplicant has a tiny, pea-sized <style=\"KKeyword\">Bladder</style>. Adorable!
SMALLBLADDER.NAME: Small Bladder

SNORER.DESC: In space, everyone can hear you snore
SNORER.NAME: Loud Sleeper
SNORER.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: This Duplicant's snoring will rudely awake nearby friends

SPARKLESTREAKER.DESC: This Duplicant leaves a trail of happy sparkles when they are <style=\"KKeyword\">Overjoyed</style>
SPARKLESTREAKER.NAME: Sparkle Streaker

STARRYEYED.DESC: This Duplicant loves being in space
STARRYEYED.NAME: Starry Eyed

STARTWITHBOOSTER_SUITS1.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP:
Bionic Duplicants use boosters to increase their skills and attributes

Boosters can be crafted at the <link="CRAFTINGTABLE">Crafting Station</link> and <link="ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE">Soldering Station</link>

Preinstalled booster effects:

STICKERBOMBER.DESC: This Duplicant will spontaneously redecorate a room when they are <style=\"KKeyword\">Overjoyed</style>
STICKERBOMBER.NAME: Sticker Bomber

STRESSSHOCKER.DESC: This Duplicant emits electrical shocks when <style=\"KKeyword\">Stressed</style>
STRESSSHOCKER.NAME: Stunner

STRESSVOMITER.DESC: This Duplicant is liable to puke everywhere when <style=\"KKeyword\">Stressed</style>
STRESSVOMITER.NAME: Vomiter

STRONGARM.DESC: This Duplicant has muscles on their muscles
STRONGARM.NAME: Buff

STRONGIMMUNESYSTEM.DESC: This Duplicant's immune system bounces back faster than most
STRONGIMMUNESYSTEM.NAME: Germ Resistant

SUNNYDISPOSITION.DESC: This Duplicant has an unwaveringly positive outlook on life
SUNNYDISPOSITION.NAME: Sunny Disposition

SUPERPRODUCTIVE.DESC: This Duplicant is super productive when they are <style=\"KKeyword\">Overjoyed</style>
SUPERPRODUCTIVE.NAME: Super Productive

THRIVER.DESC: This Duplicant kicks into hyperdrive when the stress is on
THRIVER.NAME: Duress to Impress
THRIVER.SHORT_DESC_TOOLTIP: More than 60% Stress: +7 bonus to all Attributes

TWINKLETOES.DESC: This Duplicant is light as a feather on their feet
TWINKLETOES.NAME: Twinkletoes

UGLYCRIER.DESC: If this Duplicant gets too <style=\"KKeyword\">Stressed</style> it won't be pretty
UGLYCRIER.NAME: Ugly Crier

UNCULTURED.DESC: This Duplicant has simply no appreciation for the arts
UNCULTURED.NAME: Uncultured

WEAKIMMUNESYSTEM.DESC: All the vitamin C in space couldn't stop this Duplicant from getting sick
WEAKIMMUNESYSTEM.NAME: Biohazardous

ALGAE.DESC: Algae is a cluster of non-motile, single-celled lifeforms.\n\nIt can be used to produce <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> when used in an <link=\"MINERALDEOXIDIZER\">Oxygen Diffuser</link>.
ALGAE.NAME: <link=\"ALGAE\">Algae</link>

ALUMINUM.DESC: (Al) Aluminum is a low density <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt has high Thermal Conductivity and is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
ALUMINUM.NAME: <link=\"ALUMINUM\">Aluminum</link>

ALUMINUMGAS.DESC: (Al) Aluminum Gas is a low density <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
ALUMINUMGAS.NAME: <link=\"ALUMINUMGAS\">Aluminum Gas</link>

ALUMINUMORE.DESC: Aluminum ore, also known as Bauxite, is a sedimentary rock high in metal content.\n\nIt can be refined into <link=\"ALUMINUM\">Aluminum</link>.
ALUMINUMORE.NAME: <link=\"ALUMINUMORE\">Aluminum Ore</link>

AMBER.DESC: Amber is a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> organic composite of <link=\"NATURALRESIN\">Resin</link> and <link=\"FOSSIL\">Fossil</link>.
AMBER.NAME: <link=\"AMBER\">Amber</link>

BITUMEN.DESC: Bitumen is a sticky viscous residue left behind from <link=\"PETROLEUM\">Petroleum</link> production.
BITUMEN.NAME: <link=\"BITUMEN\">Bitumen</link>

BLEACHSTONE.DESC: Bleach stone is an unstable compound that emits unbreathable <link=\"CHLORINEGAS\">Chlorine Gas</link>.\n\nIt is often used in <link=\"HANDSANITIZER\">Hygienic</link> processes.
BLEACHSTONE.NAME: <link=\"BLEACHSTONE\">Bleach Stone</link>

BRICK.DESC: Brick is a hard, brittle material formed from heated Clay.\n\nIt is a reliable Construction Material.
BRICK.NAME: <link=\"BRICK\">Brick</link>

BRINE.DESC: Brine is a natural, highly concentrated solution of <link=\"SALT\">Salt</link> dissolved in <link=\"WATER\">Water</link>.\n\nIt can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.
BRINE.NAME: <link=\"BRINE\">Brine</link>

BRINEICE.DESC: Brine Ice is a natural, highly concentrated solution of <link=\"SALT\">Salt</link> dissolved in <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> and frozen into a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.\n\nIt can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.
BRINEICE.NAME: <link=\"BRINEICE\">Brine Ice</link>

CARBON.DESC: (C) Coal is a combustible fossil fuel composed of carbon.\n\nIt is useful in <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> production.
CARBON.NAME: <link=\"CARBON\">Coal</link>

CARBONDIOXIDE.DESC: (CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an atomically heavy chemical compound in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.\n\nIt tends to sink below other gases.
CARBONDIOXIDE.NAME: <link=\"CARBONDIOXIDE\">Carbon Dioxide</link>

CARBONFIBRE.DESC: Carbon Fiber is a <link=\"REFINEDMINERAL\">Manufactured Material</link> with high tensile strength.
CARBONFIBRE.NAME: <link=\"CARBONFIBRE\">Carbon Fiber</link>

CARBONGAS.DESC: (C) Carbon is an abundant, versatile element heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
CARBONGAS.NAME: <link=\"CARBONGAS\">Carbon Gas</link>

CEMENT.DESC: Cement is a refined building material used for assembling advanced buildings.
CEMENT.NAME: <link=\"CEMENT\">Cement</link>

CEMENTMIX.DESC: Cement Mix can be used to create <link=\"CEMENT\">Cement</link> for advanced building assembly.
CEMENTMIX.NAME: <link=\"CEMENTMIX\">Cement Mix</link>

CERAMIC.DESC: Ceramic is a hard, brittle material formed from heated Clay.\n\nIt is a reliable Construction Material.
CERAMIC.NAME: <link=\"CERAMIC\">Ceramic</link>

CHLORINE.DESC: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural <link=\"DISEASE\">Germ</link>-killing element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
CHLORINE.NAME: <link=\"CHLORINE\">Liquid Chlorine</link>

CHLORINEGAS.DESC: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural <link=\"DISEASE\">Germ</link>-killing element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
CHLORINEGAS.NAME: <link=\"CHLORINEGAS\">Chlorine Gas</link>

CINNABAR.DESC: (HgS) Cinnabar Ore, also known as mercury sulfide, is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> that can be refined into <link=\"MERCURY\">Mercury</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
CINNABAR.NAME: <link=\"CINNABAR\">Cinnabar Ore</link>

CLAY.DESC: Clay is a soft, naturally occurring composite of stone and soil that hardens at high Temperatures.\n\nIt is a reliable Construction Material.
CLAY.NAME: <link=\"CLAY\">Clay</link>

COBALT.DESC: (Co) Cobalt is a <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Refined Metal</link> made from <link=\"COBALTITE\">Cobalt Ore</link>.
COBALT.NAME: <link=\"COBALT\">Cobalt</link>

COBALTGAS.DESC: (Co) Cobalt is a <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Refined Metal</link>, heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
COBALTGAS.NAME: <link=\"COBALTGAS\">Cobalt Gas</link>

COBALTITE.DESC: (Co) Cobalt Ore is a blue-hued <link=\"BUILDINGMATERIALCLASSES\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
COBALTITE.NAME: <link=\"COBALTITE\">Cobalt Ore</link>

COMPOSITION.DESC: A mixture of two or more elements.
COMPOSITION.NAME: <link=\"COMPOSITION\">Composition</link>

CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN.DESC: (O<sub>2</sub>) Polluted Oxygen is dirty, unfiltered air.\n\nIt is breathable.
CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN.NAME: <link=\"CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN\">Polluted Oxygen</link>

COPPER.DESC: (Cu) Copper is a conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
COPPER.NAME: <link=\"COPPER\">Copper</link>

COPPERGAS.DESC: (Cu) Copper Gas is a conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> state.
COPPERGAS.NAME: <link=\"COPPERGAS\">Copper Gas</link>

CORIUM.DESC: A radioactive mixture of nuclear waste and melted reactor materials.\n\nReleases <link=\"FALLOUT\">Nuclear Fallout</link> gas.
CORIUM.NAME: <link=\"CORIUM\">Corium</link>

CREATURE.DESC: (DuPe) Ooze is a slurry of water, carbon, and dozens and dozens of trace elements.\n\nDuplicants are printed from pure Ooze.
CREATURE.NAME: <link=\"CREATURE\">Genetic Ooze</link>

CRUDEOIL.DESC: Crude Oil is a raw potential <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> source composed of billions of dead, primordial organisms.\n\nIt is also a useful lubricant for certain types of machinery.
CRUDEOIL.NAME: <link=\"CRUDEOIL\">Crude Oil</link>

CRUSHEDICE.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) A slush of crushed, semi-solid ice.
CRUSHEDICE.NAME: <link=\"CRUSHEDICE\">Crushed Ice</link>

CRUSHEDROCK.DESC: Crushed Rock is <link=\"IGNEOUSROCK\">Igneous Rock</link> crushed into a mechanical mixture.
CRUSHEDROCK.NAME: <link=\"CRUSHEDROCK\">Crushed Rock</link>

CUPRITE.DESC: (Cu<sub>2</sub>O) Copper Ore is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
CUPRITE.NAME: <link=\"CUPRITE\">Copper Ore</link>

DEPLETEDURANIUM.DESC: (U) Depleted Uranium is <link=\"URANIUMORE\">Uranium</link> with a low U-235 content.\n\nIt is created as a byproduct of <link=\"ENRICHEDURANIUM\">Enriched Uranium</link> and is no longer suitable as fuel.
DEPLETEDURANIUM.NAME: <link=\"DEPLETEDURANIUM\">Depleted Uranium</link>

DIAMOND.DESC: (C) Diamond is industrial-grade, high density carbon.\n\nIt is very difficult to excavate.
DIAMOND.NAME: <link=\"DIAMOND\">Diamond</link>

DIRT.DESC: Dirt is a soft, nutrient-rich substance capable of supporting life.\n\nIt is necessary in some forms of <link=\"FOOD\">Food</link> production.
DIRT.NAME: <link=\"DIRT\">Dirt</link>

DIRTYICE.DESC: Polluted Ice is dirty, unfiltered water frozen into a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
DIRTYICE.NAME: <link=\"DIRTYICE\">Polluted Ice</link>

DIRTYWATER.DESC: Polluted Water is dirty, unfiltered <link=\"WATER\">Water</link>.\n\nIt is not fit for consumption.
DIRTYWATER.NAME: <link=\"DIRTYWATER\">Polluted Water</link>

ELECTRUM.DESC: Electrum is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> alloy composed of gold and silver.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
ELECTRUM.NAME: <link=\"ELECTRUM\">Electrum</link>

ENRICHEDURANIUM.DESC: (U) Enriched Uranium is a refined substance primarily used to <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> potent research reactors.\n\nIt becomes highly <link=\"RADIATION\">Radioactive</link> when consumed.
ENRICHEDURANIUM.NAME: <link=\"ENRICHEDURANIUM\">Enriched Uranium</link>

ETHANOL.DESC: (C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Ethanol is an advanced chemical compound in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.\n\nIt can be used as a highly effective fuel source when burned.
ETHANOL.NAME: <link=\"ETHANOL\">Ethanol</link>

ETHANOLGAS.DESC: (C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Ethanol Gas is an advanced chemical compound heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
ETHANOLGAS.NAME: <link=\"ETHANOLGAS\">Ethanol Gas</link>

FABRICATEDWOOD.DESC: Plywood is a good source of Heat and Power.\n\nIts insulation properties make it a useful Construction Material.
FABRICATEDWOOD.NAME: <link=\"FABRICATEDWOOD\">Plywood</link>

FALLOUT.DESC: Nuclear Fallout is a highly toxic gas full of <link=\"RADIATION\">Radioactive Contaminants</link>. Condenses into <link=\"NUCLEARWASTE\">Liquid Nuclear Waste</link>.
FALLOUT.NAME: <link=\"FALLOUT\">Nuclear Fallout</link>

FERTILIZER.DESC: Fertilizer is a processed mixture of biological nutrients.\n\nIt aids in the growth of certain <link=\"PLANTS\">Plants</link>.
FERTILIZER.NAME: <link=\"FERTILIZER\">Fertilizer</link>

FOOLSGOLD.DESC: (FeS<sub>2</sub>) Pyrite is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nAlso known as \"Fool's Gold\", is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
FOOLSGOLD.NAME: <link=\"FOOLSGOLD\">Pyrite</link>

FOSSIL.DESC: Fossil is organic matter, highly compressed and hardened into a mineral state.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
FOSSIL.NAME: <link=\"FOSSIL\">Fossil</link>

FROZENPHYTOOIL.DESC: Frozen Phyto Oil is thick, slippery <link=\"SLIME\">Slime</link> extract, frozen into a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
FROZENPHYTOOIL.NAME: <link=\"FROZENPHYTOOIL\">Frozen Phyto Oil</link>

FULLERENE.DESC: (C<sub>60</sub>) Fullerene is a form of <link=\"CARBON\">Coal</link> consisting of spherical molecules.
FULLERENE.NAME: <link=\"FULLERENE\">Fullerene</link>

GLASS.DESC: Glass is a brittle, transparent substance formed from <link=\"SAND\">Sand</link> fired at high temperatures.
GLASS.NAME: <link=\"GLASS\">Glass</link>

GOLD.DESC: (Au) Gold is a conductive precious <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
GOLD.NAME: <link=\"GOLD\">Gold</link>

GOLDAMALGAM.DESC: Gold Amalgam is a conductive amalgam of gold and mercury.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
GOLDAMALGAM.NAME: <link=\"GOLDAMALGAM\">Gold Amalgam</link>

GOLDGAS.DESC: (Au) Gold Gas is a conductive precious <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>, heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
GOLDGAS.NAME: <link=\"GOLDGAS\">Gold Gas</link>

GRANITE.DESC: Granite is a dense composite of Igneous Rock.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
GRANITE.NAME: <link=\"GRANITE\">Granite</link>

GRAPHITE.DESC: (C) Graphite is the most stable form of carbon.\n\nIt has high thermal conductivity and is useful as a Construction Material.
GRAPHITE.NAME: <link=\"GRAPHITE\">Graphite</link>

GUNK.DESC: Solid Gunk is the built-up grime and grit produced by Duplicants' bionic mechanisms, which has been frozen into a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
GUNK.NAME: <link=\"GUNK\">Solid Gunk</link>

HARDPOLYPROPYLENE.DESC: <link=\"HARDPOLYPROPYLENE\">Plastium</link> is an advanced thermoplastic polymer made from <link=\"TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID\">Thermium</link>, <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link> and <link=\"MILKFAT\">Brackwax</link>.\n\nIt is highly heat-resistant and suitable for use in space buildings.
HARDPOLYPROPYLENE.NAME: <link=\"HARDPOLYPROPYLENE\">Plastium</link>

HELIUM.DESC: (He) Helium is an atomically lightweight, chemical <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
HELIUM.NAME: <link=\"HELIUM\">Helium</link>

HYDROGEN.DESC: (H) Hydrogen Gas is the universe's most common and atomically light element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
HYDROGEN.NAME: <link=\"HYDROGEN\">Hydrogen Gas</link>

ICE.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Ice is clean water frozen into a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
ICE.NAME: <link=\"ICE\">Ice</link>

IGNEOUSROCK.DESC: Igneous Rock is a composite of solidified volcanic rock.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
IGNEOUSROCK.NAME: <link=\"IGNEOUSROCK\">Igneous Rock</link>

IRIDIUM.DESC: (Ir) Iridium is a firm and highly conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link> that can withstand extreme  <link=\"HEAT\">Heat</link>.
IRIDIUM.NAME: <link=\"IRIDIUM\">Iridium</link>

IRIDIUMGAS.DESC: (Ir) Iridium Gas is a highly conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link> heated into a  <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> state.
IRIDIUMGAS.NAME: <link=\"IRIDIUMGAS\">Iridium Gas</link>

IRONGAS.DESC: (Fe) Iron Gas is a common industrial <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>, heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
IRONGAS.NAME: <link=\"IRONGAS\">Iron Gas</link>

IRONORE.DESC: (Fe) Iron Ore is a soft <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
IRONORE.NAME: <link=\"IRONORE\">Iron Ore</link>

ISORESIN.DESC: Isosap is a crystallized sap composed of long-chain polymers.\n\nIt is used in the production of rare, high grade materials.
ISORESIN.NAME: <link=\"ISORESIN\">Isosap</link>

KATAIRITE.DESC: (Ab) Abyssalite is a resilient, crystalline element.
KATAIRITE.NAME: <link=\"KATAIRITE\">Abyssalite</link>

LEAD.DESC: (Pb) Lead is a soft yet extremely dense <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Refined Metal</link>.\n\nIt has a low Overheat Temperature and is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
LEAD.NAME: <link=\"LEAD\">Lead</link>

LEADGAS.DESC: (Pb) Lead Gas is a soft yet extremely dense <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Refined Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link>.
LEADGAS.NAME: <link=\"LEADGAS\">Lead Gas</link>

LIME.DESC: (CaCO3) Lime is a mineral commonly found in Critter egg shells.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
LIME.NAME: <link=\"LIME\">Lime</link>

LIQUIDCARBONDIOXIDE.DESC: (CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an unbreathable chemical compound.\n\nThis selection is currently in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
LIQUIDCARBONDIOXIDE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDCARBONDIOXIDE\">Liquid Carbon Dioxide</link>

LIQUIDGUNK.DESC: Gunk is the built-up grime and grit produced by Duplicants' bionic mechanisms.\n\nIt is unpleasantly viscous.
LIQUIDGUNK.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDGUNK\">Gunk</link>

LIQUIDHELIUM.DESC: (He) Helium is an atomically lightweight chemical element cooled into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
LIQUIDHELIUM.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDHELIUM\">Helium</link>

LIQUIDHYDROGEN.DESC: (H) Hydrogen in its <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.\n\nIt freezes most substances that come into contact with it.
LIQUIDHYDROGEN.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDHYDROGEN\">Liquid Hydrogen</link>

LIQUIDMETHANE.DESC: (CH<sub>4</sub>) Methane is an alkane.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
LIQUIDMETHANE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDMETHANE\">Liquid Methane</link>

LIQUIDOXYGEN.DESC: (O<sub>2</sub>) Oxygen is a breathable chemical.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
LIQUIDOXYGEN.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDOXYGEN\">Liquid Oxygen</link>

LIQUIDPHOSPHORUS.DESC: (P) Phosphorus is a chemical element.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
LIQUIDPHOSPHORUS.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDPHOSPHORUS\">Liquid Phosphorus</link>

LIQUIDPROPANE.DESC:
(C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Propane is an alkane.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.

It is useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
LIQUIDPROPANE.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDPROPANE\">Liquid Propane</link>

LIQUIDSULFUR.DESC: (S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of <link=\"METHANE\">Natural Gas</link> production.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
LIQUIDSULFUR.NAME: <link=\"LIQUIDSULFUR\">Liquid Sulfur</link>

MAFICROCK.DESC: Mafic Rock is a variation of Igneous Rock that is rich in Iron.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
MAFICROCK.NAME: <link=\"MAFICROCK\">Mafic Rock</link>

MAGMA.DESC: Magma is a composite of <link=\"IGNEOUSROCK\">Igneous Rock</link> heated into a molten, <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MAGMA.NAME: <link=\"MAGMA\">Magma</link>

TOOLTIP.DECOR: This material will add {0} to the finished building's Decor
TOOLTIP.EFFECTS_HEADER: Buildings constructed from this material will have these properties
TOOLTIP.EXCELLENT_RADIATION_SHIELD: <style=\"KKeyword\">Excellent Radiation Shield</style> radiation has a hard time passing through materials with a high <style=\"KKeyword\">Radiation Absorption Factor</style> value. \n\nRadiation Absorption Factor: {1}
TOOLTIP.HIGH_SPECIFIC_HEAT_CAPACITY: <style=\"KKeyword\">Slow Heating</style> materials require a large amount of energy to raise in <style=\"KKeyword\">Temperature</style>, and therefore heat and cool slowly\n\nSpecific Heat Capacity: {1} DTU to raise 1g by 1K
TOOLTIP.HIGH_THERMAL_CONDUCTIVITY: This material disperses Heat because energy transfers quickly through materials with high Thermal Conductivity Between two objects, the rate of Heat transfer will be determined by the object with the lowest Thermal Conductivity Thermal Conductivity: {1} W per degree K difference (Oxygen: 0.024 W)
TOOLTIP.LOW_SPECIFIC_HEAT_CAPACITY: <style=\"KKeyword\">Thermally Reactive</style> materials require little energy to raise in <style=\"KKeyword\">Temperature</style>, and therefore heat and cool quickly\n\nSpecific Heat Capacity: {1} DTU to raise 1g by 1K
TOOLTIP.LOW_THERMAL_CONDUCTIVITY: This material retains Heat because energy transfers slowly through materials with low Thermal Conductivity Between two objects, the rate of Heat transfer will be determined by the object with the lowest Thermal Conductivity Thermal Conductivity: {1} W per degree K difference (Oxygen: 0.024 W)
TOOLTIP.OVERHEATTEMPERATURE: This material will add {0} to the finished building's Overheat Temperature

MERCURYGAS.DESC: (Hg) Mercury Gas is a <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
MERCURYGAS.NAME: <link=\"MERCURYGAS\">Mercury Gas</link>

METHANE.DESC: Natural Gas is a mixture of various alkanes in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.\n\nIt is useful in <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> production.
METHANE.NAME: <link=\"METHANE\">Natural Gas</link>

MILK.DESC: Brackene is a sodium-rich <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.\n\nIt is useful in <link=\"RANCHING\">Ranching</link>.
MILK.NAME: <link=\"MILK\">Brackene</link>

MILKICE.DESC: Frozen Brackene is <link=\"MILK\">Brackene</link> frozen into a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
MILKICE.NAME: <link=\"MILKICE\">Frozen Brackene</link>

MOLTENALUMINUM.DESC: (Al) Molten Aluminum is a low density <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENALUMINUM.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENALUMINUM\">Molten Aluminum</link>

MOLTENCARBON.DESC: (C) Liquid Carbon is an abundant, versatile element heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENCARBON.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENCARBON\">Liquid Carbon</link>

MOLTENCOBALT.DESC: (Co) Molten Cobalt is a <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Refined Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENCOBALT.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENCOBALT\">Molten Cobalt</link>

MOLTENCOPPER.DESC: (Cu) Molten Copper is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENCOPPER.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENCOPPER\">Molten Copper</link>

MOLTENGLASS.DESC: Molten Glass is a composite of granular rock, heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENGLASS.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENGLASS\">Molten Glass</link>

MOLTENGOLD.DESC: (Au) Gold, a conductive precious <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>, heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENGOLD.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENGOLD\">Molten Gold</link>

MOLTENIRIDIUM.DESC: (Ir) Molten Iridium is a highly conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link> heated to a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>  state.
MOLTENIRIDIUM.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENIRIDIUM\">Molten Iridium</link>

MOLTENIRON.DESC: (Fe) Molten Iron is a common industrial <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENIRON.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENIRON\">Molten Iron</link>

MOLTENLEAD.DESC: (Pb) Lead is an extremely dense <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Refined Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENLEAD.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENLEAD\">Molten Lead</link>

MOLTENNICKEL.DESC: (Ni) Molten Nickel is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENNICKEL.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENNICKEL\">Molten Nickel</link>

MOLTENNIOBIUM.DESC: (Nb) Molten Niobium is a rare metal heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENNIOBIUM.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENNIOBIUM\">Molten Niobium</link>

MOLTENSALT.DESC: (NaCl) Molten Salt is an edible chemical compound that has been heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENSALT.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENSALT\">Molten Salt</link>

MOLTENSTEEL.DESC: Molten Steel is a <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> alloy of iron and carbon, heated into a hazardous <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENSTEEL.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENSTEEL\">Molten Steel</link>

MOLTENSUCROSE.DESC: (C<sub>12</sub>H<sub>22</sub>O<sub>11</sub>) Liquid Sucrose is the raw form of sugar, heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENSUCROSE.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENSUCROSE\">Liquid Sucrose</link>

MOLTENSYNGAS.DESC: Molten Synthesis Gas is an artificial, unbreathable <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.\n\nIt can be converted into an efficient fuel.
MOLTENSYNGAS.NAME: <link=\"SYNGAS\">Molten Synthesis Gas</link>

MOLTENTUNGSTEN.DESC: (W) Molten Tungsten is a crystalline <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENTUNGSTEN.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENTUNGSTEN\">Molten Tungsten</link>

MOLTENTUNGSTENDISELENIDE.DESC: (WSe<sub>2</sub>) Tungsten Diselenide is an inorganic <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> compound heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
MOLTENTUNGSTENDISELENIDE.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENTUNGSTENDISELENIDE\">Tungsten Diselenide</link>

MOLTENURANIUM.DESC: (U) Liquid Uranium is a highly <link=\"RADIATION\">Radioactive</link> substance, heated into a hazardous <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.\n\nIt is a byproduct of <link=\"ENRICHEDURANIUM\">Enriched Uranium</link>.
MOLTENURANIUM.NAME: <link=\"MOLTENURANIUM\">Liquid Uranium</link>

MUD.DESC: A mixture of <link=\"DIRT\">Dirt</link> and <link=\"WATER\">Water</link>.\n\nCan be separated into its base elements using a <link=\"SLUDGEPRESS\">Sludge Press</link>.
MUD.NAME: <link=\"MUD\">Mud</link>

NAPHTHA.DESC: Naphtha a distilled hydrocarbon mixture produced from the burning of <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link>.
NAPHTHA.NAME: <link=\"NAPHTHA\">Liquid Naphtha</link>

NATURALRESIN.DESC: Resin is a viscous organic <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link>.\n\nIt can be treated to become <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link> in the <link=\"POLYMERIZER\">Polymer Press</link>.
NATURALRESIN.NAME: <link=\"NATURALRESIN\">Resin</link>

NATURALSOLIDRESIN.DESC: Resin that has been cooled to a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.\n\nIt can be treated to become <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link> in the <link=\"POLYMERIZER\">Polymer Press</link>.
NATURALSOLIDRESIN.NAME: <link=\"NATURALSOLIDRESIN\">Solid Resin</link>

NICKEL.DESC: (Ni) Nickel is a conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
NICKEL.NAME: <link=\"NICKEL\">Nickel</link>

NICKELGAS.DESC: (Ni) Nickel Gas is a conductive <link=\"METAL\">Metal</link> heated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> state.
NICKELGAS.NAME: <link=\"NICKELGAS\">Nickel Gas</link>

NICKELORE.DESC: (Ni) Nickel Ore is a conductive <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt can be refined into <link=\"NICKEL\">Nickel</link> and is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
NICKELORE.NAME: <link=\"NICKELORE\">Nickel Ore</link>

NIOBIUM.DESC: (Nb) Niobium is a rare metal with many practical applications in metallurgy and superconductor <link=\"RESEARCH\">Research</link>.
NIOBIUM.NAME: <link=\"NIOBIUM\">Niobium</link>

NIOBIUMGAS.DESC: (Nb) Niobium Gas is a rare metal.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
NIOBIUMGAS.NAME: <link=\"NIOBIUMGAS\">Niobium Gas</link>

NUCLEARWASTE.DESC: Highly toxic liquid full of <link=\"RADIATION\">Radioactive Contaminants</link> which emit <link=\"RADIATION\">Radiation</link> that can be absorbed by <link=\"HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER\">Radbolt Generators</link>.
NUCLEARWASTE.NAME: <link=\"NUCLEARWASTE\">Liquid Nuclear Waste</link>

OBSIDIAN.DESC: Obsidian is a brittle composite of volcanic <link=\"GLASS\">Glass</link>.
OBSIDIAN.NAME: <link=\"OBSIDIAN\">Obsidian</link>

OXYGEN.DESC: (O<sub>2</sub>) Oxygen is an atomically lightweight and breathable <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>, necessary for sustaining life.\n\nIt tends to rise above other gases.
OXYGEN.NAME: <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link>

OXYROCK.DESC: (Ir<sub>3</sub>O<sub>2</sub>) Oxylite is a chemical compound that slowly emits breathable <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link>.\n\nExcavating <link=\"OXYROCK\">Oxylite</link> increases its emission rate, but depletes the ore more rapidly.
OXYROCK.NAME: <link=\"OXYROCK\">Oxylite</link>

PEAT.DESC: Peat is a densely packed material made up of partially decomposed organic matter.\n\nIt is a combustible fuel, useful in <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> production.
PEAT.NAME: <link=\"PEAT\">Peat</link>

PETROLEUM.DESC: Petroleum is a <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> source refined from <link=\"CRUDEOIL\">Crude Oil</link>.\n\nIt is also an essential ingredient in the production of <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link>.
PETROLEUM.NAME: <link=\"PETROLEUM\">Petroleum</link>

PHOSPHATENODULES.DESC: (PO<sup>3-</sup><sub>4</sub>) Nodules of sedimentary rock containing high concentrations of phosphate.
PHOSPHATENODULES.NAME: <link=\"PHOSPHATENODULES\">Phosphate Nodules</link>

PHOSPHORITE.DESC: Phosphorite is a composite of sedimentary rock, saturated with phosphate.
PHOSPHORITE.NAME: <link=\"PHOSPHORITE\">Phosphorite</link>

PHOSPHORUS.DESC: (P) Refined Phosphorus is a chemical element in its <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
PHOSPHORUS.NAME: <link=\"PHOSPHORUS\">Refined Phosphorus</link>

PHOSPHORUSGAS.DESC: (P) Phosphorus Gas is the <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state of <link=\"PHOSPHORUS\">Refined Phosphorus</link>.
PHOSPHORUSGAS.NAME: <link=\"PHOSPHORUSGAS\">Phosphorus Gas</link>

PHYTOOIL.DESC: Phyto Oil is a thick, slippery <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> extracted from pureed <link=\"SLIME\">Slime</link>.
PHYTOOIL.NAME: <link=\"PHYTOOIL\">Phyto Oil</link>

POLYPROPYLENE.BUILD_DESC: Buildings made of this <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link> have antiseptic properties
POLYPROPYLENE.DESC: (C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>6</sub>)<sub>n</sub> <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link> is a thermoplastic polymer.\n\nIt is useful for constructing a variety of advanced buildings and equipment.
POLYPROPYLENE.NAME: <link=\"POLYPROPYLENE\">Plastic</link>

PONDSCUM.DESC: Pondscum is a soft, naturally occurring composite of biological nutrients.\n\nIt may be processed into <link=\"FERTILIZER\">Fertilizer</link> and aids in the growth of certain <link=\"PLANTS\">Plants</link>.
PONDSCUM.NAME: <link=\"PONDSCUM\">Pondscum</link>

PROPANE.DESC:
(C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Propane Gas is a natural alkane.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.

It is useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
PROPANE.NAME: <link=\"PROPANE\">Propane Gas</link>

RADIUM.DESC: (Ra) Radium is a <link=\"LIGHT\">Light</link> emitting radioactive substance.\n\nIt is useful as a <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> source.
RADIUM.NAME: <link=\"RADIUM\">Radium</link>

REFINEDCARBON.DESC: (C) Refined carbon is solid element purified from raw <link=\"CARBON\">Coal</link>.
REFINEDCARBON.NAME: <link=\"REFINEDCARBON\">Refined Carbon</link>

REFINEDLIPID.DESC: Biodiesel is a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> composed of highly processed fatty acids derived from purified natural oils.\n\nIts <link=\"COMBUSTIBLELIQUID\">combustibility</link> makes it useful for <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> production.
REFINEDLIPID.NAME: <link=\"REFINEDLIPID\">Biodiesel</link>

REGOLITH.DESC: Regolith is a sandy substance composed of the various particles that collect atop terrestrial objects.\n\nIt is useful as a <link=\"FILTER\">Filtration Medium</link>.
REGOLITH.NAME: <link=\"REGOLITH\">Regolith</link>

RESIN.DESC: Sticky goo harvested from a grumpy tree.\n\nIt can be polymerized into <link=\"ISORESIN\">Isosap</link> by boiling away its excess moisture.
RESIN.NAME: <link=\"RESIN\">Sap</link>

ROCKGAS.DESC: Rock Gas is rock that has been superheated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
ROCKGAS.NAME: <link=\"ROCKGAS\">Rock Gas</link>

RUST.DESC: Rust is an iron oxide that forms from the breakdown of <link=\"IRON\">Iron</link>.\n\nIt is useful in some <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> production processes.
RUST.NAME: <link=\"RUST\">Rust</link>

SALT.DESC: (NaCl) Salt, also known as sodium chloride, is an edible chemical compound.\n\nWhen refined, it can be eaten with meals to increase Duplicant <link=\"MORALE\">Morale</link>.
SALT.NAME: <link=\"SALT\">Salt</link>

SALTGAS.DESC: (NaCl) Salt Gas is an edible chemical compound that has been superheated into a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
SALTGAS.NAME: <link=\"SALTGAS\">Salt Gas</link>

SALTWATER.DESC: Salt Water is a natural, lightly concentrated solution of <link=\"SALT\">Salt</link> dissolved in <link=\"WATER\">Water</link>.\n\nIt can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.
SALTWATER.NAME: <link=\"SALTWATER\">Salt Water</link>

SAND.DESC: Sand is a composite of granular rock.\n\nIt is useful as a <link=\"FILTER\">Filtration Medium</link>.
SAND.NAME: <link=\"SAND\">Sand</link>

SANDSTONE.DESC: Sandstone is a composite of relatively soft sedimentary rock.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
SANDSTONE.NAME: <link=\"SANDSTONE\">Sandstone</link>

SEDIMENTARYROCK.DESC: Sedimentary Rock is a hardened composite of sediment layers.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
SEDIMENTARYROCK.NAME: <link=\"SEDIMENTARYROCK\">Sedimentary Rock</link>

SHALE.DESC: Shale is a brittle composite of sediment layers.\n\nIt is useful as a Construction Material.
SHALE.NAME: <link=\"SHALE\">Shale</link>

SLABS.DESC: Slabs are a refined mineral building block used for assembling advanced buildings.
SLABS.NAME: <link=\"SLABS\">Building Slab</link>

SLIMEMOLD.DESC: Slime is a thick biomixture of algae, fungi, and mucopolysaccharides.\n\nIt can be distilled into <link=\"ALGAE\">Algae</link> and emits <link=\"CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN\">Polluted Oxygen</link> once dug up.
SLIMEMOLD.NAME: <link=\"SLIMEMOLD\">Slime</link>

SNOW.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Snow is a mass of loose, crystalline ice particles.\n\nIt becomes <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> when melted.
SNOW.NAME: <link=\"SNOW\">Snow</link>

SOLIDCARBONDIOXIDE.DESC: (CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an unbreathable compound in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDCARBONDIOXIDE.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDCARBONDIOXIDE\">Solid Carbon Dioxide</link>

SOLIDCHLORINE.DESC: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural <link=\"DISEASE\">Germ</link>-killing element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDCHLORINE.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDCHLORINE\">Solid Chlorine</link>

SOLIDETHANOL.DESC: (C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Solid Ethanol is an advanced chemical compound.\n\nIt can be used as a highly effective fuel source when burned.
SOLIDETHANOL.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDETHANOL\">Solid Ethanol</link>

SOLIDHYDROGEN.DESC: (H) Solid Hydrogen is the universe's most common element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDHYDROGEN.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDHYDROGEN\">Solid Hydrogen</link>

SOLIDMERCURY.DESC: (Hg) Mercury is a rare <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDMERCURY.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDMERCURY\">Mercury</link>

SOLIDMETHANE.DESC: (CH<sub>4</sub>) Methane is an alkane in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDMETHANE.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDMETHANE\">Solid Methane</link>

SOLIDNAPHTHA.DESC: Naphtha is a distilled hydrocarbon mixture in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDNAPHTHA.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDNAPHTHA\">Solid Naphtha</link>

SOLIDNUCLEARWASTE.DESC: Highly toxic solid full of <link=\"RADIATION\">Radioactive Contaminants</link>.
SOLIDNUCLEARWASTE.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDNUCLEARWASTE\">Solid Nuclear Waste</link>

SOLIDOXYGEN.DESC: (O<sub>2</sub>) Solid Oxygen is a breathable element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDOXYGEN.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDOXYGEN\">Solid Oxygen</link>

SOLIDPETROLEUM.DESC: Petroleum is a <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> source.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDPETROLEUM.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDPETROLEUM\">Solid Petroleum</link>

SOLIDPROPANE.DESC: (C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Solid Propane is a natural gas in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDPROPANE.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDPROPANE\">Solid Propane</link>

SOLIDRESIN.DESC: Solidified goo harvested from a grumpy tree.\n\nIt is used in the production of <link=\"ISORESIN\">Isosap</link>.
SOLIDRESIN.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDRESIN\">Solid Sap</link>

SOLIDSUPERCOOLANT.DESC: Super Coolant is an industrial-grade <link=\"FULLERENE\">Fullerene</link> coolant.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDSUPERCOOLANT.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDSUPERCOOLANT\">Solid Super Coolant</link>

SOLIDSYNGAS.DESC: Solid Synthesis Gas is an artificial, unbreathable <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link>.\n\nIt can be converted into an efficient fuel.
SOLIDSYNGAS.NAME: <link=\"SYNGAS\">Solid Synthesis Gas</link>

SOLIDVISCOGEL.DESC: Visco-Gel is a polymer that has high surface tension when in <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> form.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SOLIDVISCOGEL.NAME: <link=\"SOLIDVISCOGEL\">Solid Visco-Gel</link>

SOURGAS.DESC: Sour Gas is a hydrocarbon <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> containing high concentrations of hydrogen sulfide.\n\nIt is a byproduct of highly heated <link=\"PETROLEUM\">Petroleum</link>.
SOURGAS.NAME: <link=\"SOURGAS\">Sour Gas</link>

STABLESNOW.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Snow is a mass of loose, crystalline ice particles.\n\nIt becomes <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> when melted.
STABLESNOW.NAME: Packed <link=\"SNOW\">Snow</link>

STEAM.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Steam is <link=\"WATER\">Water</link> that has been heated into a scalding <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.
STEAM.NAME: <link=\"STEAM\">Steam</link>

STEEL.DESC: Steel is a <link=\"REFINEDMETAL\">Metal Alloy</link> composed of iron and carbon.
STEEL.NAME: <link=\"STEEL\">Steel</link>

STEELGAS.DESC: Steel Gas is a superheated <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link> composed of iron and carbon.
STEELGAS.NAME: <link=\"STEELGAS\">Steel Gas</link>

SUCROSE.DESC: (C<sub>12</sub>H<sub>22</sub>O<sub>11</sub>) Sucrose is the raw form of sugar.\n\nIt can be used for cooking higher-quality <link=\"FOOD\">Food</link>.
SUCROSE.NAME: <link=\"SUCROSE\">Sucrose</link>

SUGARWATER.DESC: Nectar is a natural, lightly concentrated solution of <link=\"SUCROSE\">Sucrose</link> dissolved in <link=\"WATER\">Water</link>.
SUGARWATER.NAME: <link=\"SUGARWATER\">Nectar</link>

SULFUR.DESC: (S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of <link=\"METHANE\">Natural Gas</link> production.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.
SULFUR.NAME: <link=\"SULFUR\">Sulfur</link>

SULFURGAS.DESC: (S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of <link=\"METHANE\">Natural Gas</link> production.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
SULFURGAS.NAME: <link=\"SULFURGAS\">Sulfur Gas</link>

SUPERCOOLANT.DESC: Super Coolant is an industrial-grade coolant that utilizes the unusual energy states of <link=\"FULLERENE\">Fullerene</link>.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> state.
SUPERCOOLANT.NAME: <link=\"SUPERCOOLANT\">Super Coolant</link>

SUPERCOOLANTGAS.DESC: Super Coolant is an industrial-grade <link=\"FULLERENE\">Fullerene</link> coolant.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
SUPERCOOLANTGAS.NAME: <link=\"SUPERCOOLANTGAS\">Super Coolant Gas</link>

SUPERINSULATOR.DESC: Insulite reduces <link=\"HEAT\">Heat Transfer</link> and is composed of recrystallized <link=\"KATAIRITE\">Abyssalite</link>.
SUPERINSULATOR.NAME: <link=\"SUPERINSULATOR\">Insulite</link>

SYNGAS.DESC: Synthesis Gas is an artificial, unbreathable <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gas</link>.\n\nIt can be converted into an efficient fuel.
SYNGAS.NAME: <link=\"SYNGAS\">Synthesis Gas</link>

TALLOW.DESC: A chunk of raw grease that can be used in <link=\"FOOD\">Food</link> production or industrial processes.
TALLOW.NAME: <link=\"TALLOW\">Tallow</link>

TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID.DESC: Thermium is an industrial metal alloy formulated to maximize <link=\"HEAT\">Heat Transfer</link> and thermal dispersion.
TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID.NAME: <link=\"TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID\">Thermium</link>

TESTELEMENT.DESC: ((Fe,Mn)WO<sub>4</sub>) Wolframite is a dense Metallic element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.\n\nIt is a source of <link=\"TUNGSTEN\">Tungsten</link> and is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
TESTELEMENT.NAME: <link=\"TESTELEMENT\">Test Element</link>

TOXICMUD.DESC: A mixture of <link=\"TOXICSAND\">Polluted Dirt</link> and <link=\"DIRTYWATER\">Polluted Water</link>.\n\nCan be separated into its base elements using a <link=\"SLUDGEPRESS\">Sludge Press</link>.
TOXICMUD.NAME: <link=\"TOXICMUD\">Polluted Mud</link>

TOXICSAND.DESC: Polluted Dirt is unprocessed biological waste.\n\nIt emits <link=\"CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN\">Polluted Oxygen</link> over time.
TOXICSAND.NAME: <link=\"TOXICSAND\">Polluted Dirt</link>

TUNGSTEN.DESC: (W) Tungsten is an extremely tough crystalline <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
TUNGSTEN.NAME: <link=\"TUNGSTEN\">Tungsten</link>

TUNGSTENDISELENIDE.DESC: (WSe<sub>2</sub>) Tungsten Diselenide is an inorganic <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> compound with a crystalline structure.\n\nIt is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
TUNGSTENDISELENIDE.NAME: <link=\"TUNGSTENDISELENIDE\">Tungsten Diselenide</link>

TUNGSTENDISELENIDEGAS.DESC: (WSe<sub>2</sub>) Tungsten Diselenide Gasis a superheated <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link> compound in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
TUNGSTENDISELENIDEGAS.NAME: <link=\"TUNGSTENDISELENIDEGAS\">Tungsten Diselenide Gas</link>

TUNGSTENGAS.DESC: (W) Tungsten is a superheated crystalline <link=\"RAWMETAL\">Metal</link>.\n\nThis selection is in a <link=\"ELEMENTSGAS\">Gaseous</link> state.
TUNGSTENGAS.NAME: <link=\"TUNGSTENGAS\">Tungsten Gas</link>

UNOBTANIUM.DESC: (Nt) Neutronium is a mysterious and extremely resilient element.\n\nIt cannot be excavated by any Duplicant mining tool.
UNOBTANIUM.NAME: <link=\"UNOBTANIUM\">Neutronium</link>

URANIUMORE.DESC: (U) Uranium Ore is a highly <link=\"RADIATION\">Radioactive</link> substance.\n\nIt can be refined into fuel for research reactors.
URANIUMORE.NAME: <link=\"URANIUMORE\">Uranium Ore</link>

VACUUM.DESC: A vacuum is a space devoid of all matter.
VACUUM.NAME: <link=\"VACUUM\">Vacuum</link>

VISCOGEL.DESC: Visco-Gel Fluid is a <link=\"ELEMENTSLIQUID\">Liquid</link> polymer with high surface tension, preventing typical liquid flow and allowing for unusual configurations.
VISCOGEL.NAME: <link=\"VISCOGEL\">Visco-Gel Fluid</link>

WOLFRAMITE.DESC: ((Fe,Mn)WO<sub>4</sub>) Wolframite is a dense Metallic element in a <link=\"ELEMENTSSOLID\">Solid</link> state.\n\nIt is a source of <link=\"TUNGSTEN\">Tungsten</link> and is suitable for building <link=\"POWER\">Power</link> systems.
WOLFRAMITE.NAME: <link=\"WOLFRAMITE\">Wolframite</link>

WOODLOG.DESC: Wood is a good source of Heat and Power.\n\nIts insulation properties and positive Decor also make it a useful Construction Material.
WOODLOG.NAME: <link=\"WOOD\">Wood</link>

YELLOWCAKE.DESC:
(U<sub>3</sub>O<sub>8</sub>) Yellowcake is a byproduct of <link="URANIUM">Uranium</link> mining.

It is useful in preparing fuel for <link="NUCLEARREACTOR">Research Reactors</link>.

Note: Do not eat.
YELLOWCAKE.NAME: <link=\"YELLOWCAKE\">Yellowcake</link>

AQUA_SUIT.DESC: Because breathing underwater is better than... not.
AQUA_SUIT.EFFECT: Supplies Duplicants with <style=\"oxygen\">Oxygen</style> in underwater environments.\n\nMust be refilled with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> at an <link=\"SUITLOCKER\">Atmo Suit Dock</link> when depleted.
AQUA_SUIT.NAME: <link=\"AQUASUIT\">Aqua Suit</link>
AQUA_SUIT.RECIPE_DESC: Supplies Duplicants with <style=\"oxygen\">Oxygen</style> in underwater environments.
AQUA_SUIT.WORN_DESC: A worn out <link=\"AQUASUIT\">Aqua Suit</link>.\n\nSuits can be repaired at a <link=\"CRAFTINGTABLE\">Crafting Station</link>.

ATMO_SUIT.DESC: Ensures my Duplicants can breathe easy, anytime, anywhere.
ATMO_SUIT.EFFECT: Supplies Duplicants with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments, and protects against extreme temperatures.\n\nMust be refilled with oxygen at an <link=\"SUITLOCKER\">Atmo Suit Dock</link> when depleted.
ATMO_SUIT.NAME: <link=\"ATMOSUIT\">Atmo Suit</link>
ATMO_SUIT.RECIPE_DESC: Supplies Duplicants with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.
ATMO_SUIT.REPAIR_WORN_DESC: Restore a <link=\"ATMOSUIT\">Worn Atmo Suit</link> to working order.
ATMO_SUIT.WORN_DESC: A worn out <link=\"ATMOSUIT\">Atmo Suit</link>.\n\nSuits can be repaired at an <link=\"SUITFABRICATOR\">Exosuit Forge</link>.

BASIC_GOLD.DESC: Better to be overdressed than underdressed.
BASIC_GOLD.NAME: Gold Atmo Belt

CANTALOUPE.DESC: A tribute to the cucumis melo cantalupensis.

JET_SUIT.DESC: Allows my Duplicants to take to the skies, for a time.
JET_SUIT.EFFECT: Supplies Duplicants with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.\n\nMust be refilled with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> and <link=\"COMBUSTIBLELIQUID\">Combustible Liquid</link> at a <link=\"JETSUITLOCKER\">Jet Suit Dock</link> when depleted.
JET_SUIT.NAME: <link=\"JETSUIT\">Jet Suit</link>
JET_SUIT.RECIPE_DESC: Supplies Duplicants with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.\n\nAllows Duplicant flight.
JET_SUIT.REPAIR_WORN_DESC: Restore a <link=\"JETSUIT\">Worn Jet Suit</link> to working order.
JET_SUIT.WORN_DESC: A worn out <link=\"JETSUIT\">Jet Suit</link>.\n\nSuits can be repaired at an <link=\"SUITFABRICATOR\">Exosuit Forge</link>.

JET_SUIT_BODY.DESC: Default top and bottom of a jet suit.
JET_SUIT_BODY.NAME: Default Jet Uniform

LEAD_SUIT.DESC: Because exposure to radiation doesn't grant Duplicants superpowers.
LEAD_SUIT.EFFECT: Supplies Duplicants with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> and protection in areas with <link=\"RADIATION\">Radiation</link>.\n\nMust be refilled with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> at a <link=\"LEADSUITLOCKER\">Lead Suit Dock</link> when depleted.
LEAD_SUIT.NAME: <link=\"LEADSUIT\">Lead Suit</link>
LEAD_SUIT.RECIPE_DESC: Supplies Duplicants with <link=\"OXYGEN\">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.\n\nProtects Duplicants from <link=\"RADIATION\">Radiation</link>.
LEAD_SUIT.REPAIR_WORN_DESC: Restore a <link=\"LEADSUIT\">Worn Lead Suit</link> to working order.
LEAD_SUIT.WORN_DESC: A worn out <link=\"LEADSUIT\">Lead Suit</link>.\n\nSuits can be repaired at an <link=\"SUITFABRICATOR\">Exosuit Forge</link>.

OXYGEN_MASK.DESC: Ensures my Duplicants can breathe easy... for a little while, anyways.
OXYGEN_MASK.EFFECT: Supplies Duplicants with <style=\"oxygen\">Oxygen</style> in toxic and low breathability environments.\n\nMust be refilled with oxygen at an <link=\"OXYGENMASKLOCKER\">Oxygen Mask Dock</link> when depleted.
OXYGEN_MASK.NAME: <link=\"OXYGENMASK\">Oxygen Mask</link>
OXYGEN_MASK.RECIPE_DESC: Supplies Duplicants with <style=\"oxygen\">Oxygen</style> in toxic and low breathability environments.

OXYGEN_MASK.WORN_DESC: A worn out <link=\"OXYGENMASK\">Oxygen Mask</link>.\n\nMasks can be repaired at a <link=\"CRAFTINGTABLE\">Crafting Station</link>.
